[\[164a.6\]]sems dpa' yang de dang 'dra ste/_lus kyi dur la mi chags mi mos so/_/rigs kyi bu dper na rigs ngan dag rabs bdun gyi bar du rigs ngan gyi las byed na thams cad kyis smad par 'gyur ba ltar lus kyi sa bon yang de dang 'dra ste/_sa bon khu ba dang khrag las gyur pas 
[\[164a.7\]]mthar mi gtsang ngo /_/de ltar mi gtsang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su smod do/_/rigs kyi bu lus 'di ni ri ma la ya dang mi mtshungs te/_tsan dan dang /_me tog ud pa la dang /_pun da rI ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_ma li ka dang /_
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]pa ri sha ka mi skye ste/_bu ga dgu nas rtag tu khrag dang /_rnag dang /_mi gtsang ba zag ste/_mnam pa sme ba'i gnas su skyes te/_mi sdug pa skyo bar rung ba rtag tu srin bu rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na 'jig rten na skyed mos tshal gyi ra ba 
[\[164b.2\]]dam pa gtsang mar mi ro bzhag na de gtsang bar mi 'gyur te/_mang po kun gyis spangs nas chags pa'i sems mi skye ba ltar gzugs kyi khams kyang de dang 'dra ste gtsang la bzang mod kyi/_lus yod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su spong 
[\[164b.3\]]ngo /_/rigs kyi bu gang de ltar rtog mi nus pa ni lus sgom pa zhes mi bya'o/_/de la tshul khrims mi sgom pa ni rigs kyi bu gang gis tshul khrims 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi skas kyi them pa'o/_/dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/_ji ltar sa chen po ni shing 
[\[164b.4\]]dang nags tshal thams cad kyi skye ba'i gnas dang mtshungs so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ste/_ji ltar tshong dpon tshong pa thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba dang mtshungs so/_/tshul khrims ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan yin te/_ji ltar 
[\[164b.5\]]brgya byin gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba bzhin no/_/tshul khrims kyis mi dge ba'i las thams cad dang /_ngan song gsum gyi las yun du gcod pa'o/_/mi dge ba'i nad gso ba ste ji ltar sman gyi sdong po bzhin no/_/tshul khrims ni 'khor ba'i lam nyam nga ba'i rgyags 
[\[164b.6\]]tshogs lta bu'o/_/tshul khrims ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra gzhom pa'i go mtshon no/_/tshul khrims ni nyon mongs pa'i sbrul gdug pa med par byed pa'i rig sngags so/_/tshul khrims ni mi dge ba'i las spyod pa las sgrol ba'i zam pa lta bur rtog mi nus pa ni tshul khrims 
[\[164b.7\]]sgom pa zhes mi bya'o/_/de la sems mi sgom pa ni sems g.yeng ba dang /_'phyar ba dang /_'gyur ba dang /_gzung dka' ba dang /_gdul dka' ba ste/_kun tu rgyu la ji ltar bal glang ma rungs pa bzhin no/_/skad cig skad cig mar myur te glog gi 'od dang mtshungs so/_/
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]sems ni rgod cing mi gnas te spre'u dang mtshungs so/_/sems ni sgyu ma smig rgyu dang mtshungs te/_mi dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba'o/_/'dod pa lnga ni chog dka' ste me dang shing bu phrad pa dang mtshungs so/_/sems ni rgya mtsho dang mtshungs te 'bab chu thams 
[\[165a.2\]]cad shong ba'o/_/sems ni ri ma da dang mtshungs te rtswa shing mang po skye ba'i gnas lta bur rtog mi nus shing 'khor ba yang dag pa ma yin pa slu ba la chags pas gnod par 'gyur te/_ji ltar nya dag mchil pas zin pa bzhin no/_/rtag tu thog mar 'gro ba'i rjes su las 'brang ba 
[\[165a.3\]]ni ji ltar nya mo thog mar song na bu rnams phyi bzhin du 'brang ba bzhin no/_/'dod pa lnga la chags nas mya ngan las 'das pa la mi mos pa ni ji ltar rnga mos sbrang rtsi zos na shi ba la thug gi bar du yang rtswa la mi lta'o/_/da ltar bde ba la chags shing phyi ma'i nyes pa la mi rtog ste/_ji 
[\[165a.4\]]ltar ba lang ljang bu la chags pa dbyug pas brdegs kyang mi 'jigs pa dang /_srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar kun tu 'khor zhing rgyug pa ni ji ltar rlung drag pos shing bal 'bud pa bzhin no/_/tshol bar mi rigs pa tshol ba la chog mi shes pa ni ji ltar blun po glen pa dag mi tsha ba'i 
[\[165a.5\]]me tshol ba bzhin no/_/rtag tu 'khor ba la dga' zhing rnam par grol ba la mi dga' ba ni ji ltar srin bu 'ji ba zhes bya ba shing 'ji ba la chags pa bzhin no/_/bslad cing 'khor ba'i mnam po la sred cing chags pa ni ji ltar btson dag btson dpon gyi bu mo la dga' ba 
[\[165a.6\]]'am phag mi gtsang ba la chags pa bzhin te/_gang gis de ltar rtog mi nus pa ni sems mi sgom pa zhes bya'o/_/de la shes rab mi sgom pa ni bya nam mkha' lding lta bu'i mthu stobs chen pos las ngan pa thams cad 'joms pa dang /_nyi ma'i 'od ltar ma rig pa'i mun pa 
[\[165a.7\]]gzhom pa dang /_phung po'i shing gi rtsa ba rtsa nas 'don pa ni ji ltar klung drag pos g.yeng ba lta bu dang /_log par lta ba sreg pa ni me mar mur dang 'dra ba'i mthu stobs yod par mi rtog pa dang /_shes rab ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi yum dang sa bon yin par rtog mi nus pa ni shes rab sgom pa zhes mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu don dam pa la gal te lus dang /_lus kyi mtshan nyid dang /_lus kyi rgyu dang /_lus kyi 'bras bu dang /_lus kyi phung po dang /_lus gcig pa dang /_
[\[165b.2\]]lus gnyis pa dang /_lus 'di dang /_lus pha rol dang /_lus 'gog pa dang /_lus mnyam pa dang /_lus kyis lus bsgom par lta ba ni lus sgom pa zhes mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims kyi mtshan nyid dang /_tshul khrims kyi rgyu dang /_
[\[165b.3\]]tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu dang /_tshul khrims rab dang /_'bring dang /_tshul khrims tha ma dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang /_tshul khrims gcig pa dang /_tshul khrims gnyis pa dang /_tshul khrims 'di dang /_tshul khrims pha rol dang /_tshul khrims 'gog pa dang /_
[\[165b.4\]]tshul khrims mnyam pa dang /_tshul khrims kyis tshul khrims sgom pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba ni tshul khrims sgom pa zhes mi bya'o/_/gang gis sems dang /_sems kyi mtshan nyid dang /_sems kyi rgyu dang /_sems kyi 'bras bu dang /_sems 
[\[165b.5\]]kyi tshogs dang /_sems dang /_sems las byung ba dang /_sems gcig pa dang /_sems gnyis pa dang /_sems 'di dang /_sems pha rol dang /_sems 'gog pa dang /_sems mnyam pa dang /_sems kyis sems sgom pa dang /_sems rab dang /_sems 
[\[165b.6\]]'bring dang /_tha ma dang /_mi dge ba'i sems dang /_mi dge ba'i sems su lta na de ni sems sgom pa zhes mi bya'o//_//bam po bzhi bcu gnyis pa/_rigs kyi bu gang shes rab dang /_shes rab kyi mtshan nyid dang /_shes rab kyi rgyu dang /_shes 
[\[165b.7\]]rab kyi 'bras bu dang /_shes rab kyi tshogs dang /_shes rab gcig pa dang /_shes rab gnyis pa dang /_shes rab 'di dang /_shes rab pha rol dang /_shes rab 'gog pa dang /_shes rab mnyam pa dang /_shes rab rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma dang /_shes rab 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]rtul ba dang /_shes rab rno ba dang /_shes rab kyis shes rab bsgom par lta ba ni shes rab bsgom pa zhes mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang gis lus dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sems dang /_shes rab mi sgom pa de ni mi dge ba'i las chung ngus kyang mi 
[\[166a.2\]]dge ba'i rnam par smin pa chen por 'gyur te/_'di ltar 'jigs pa'i phyir rtag tu 'di snyam du bdag sems can dmyal bar gtogs pas sems can dmyal ba'i spyad pa spyod do snyam sems te/_mkhas pa shes rab can gyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bstan pa thos kyang rtag par 
[\[166a.3\]]'di snyam du ji ltar lcags kyis lcags brdung ba dang /_rdos rdo brdeg pa dang /_shing gis shing brdeg pa dang /_me'i srin bu me la dga' ba bzhin du sems can dmyal ba'i lus kyang sems can dmyal ba dang mtshungs te/_de ltar sems can dmyal ba dang mtshungs na sdug bsngal gyi 
[\[166a.4\]]dngos po ci zhig yod ces sems so/_/dper na sbrang bu ngar snabs la 'byar te 'byung mi nus pa ltar de yang de dang 'dra ste/_kha na ma tho ba chung ngu las 'byung mi nus shing thog ma nas 'gyod pa'i sems med de/_dge ba spyod mi nus shing skyon bcabs pas sngon gyi dge ba'i las 
[\[166a.5\]]yod pa rnams kyang kha na ma tho bas sme bar byas te/_de la da ltar gyi dus su myong bar rigs pa'i rnam par smin pa yang bar bsgyur te/_sems can dmyal ba'i mi dge ba'i 'bras bu shin tu lci bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar snod chung ngu'i chu nyung zad kyi nang du lan tshwa phul 
[\[166a.6\]]gang btab na ro shin tu kha bas btung rab tu dka' ba ltar de'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na mi zhig gzhan la dong tse gcig chags pa las skyin po 'jal mi phod pa'i phyir bcings drags te/_sdug bsngal mang du myong ba ltar de'i kha na ma tho ba'i 
[\[166a.7\]]las kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge sgras gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du da ltar myong bar rigs pa'i rnam par smin pa yang ba sems can dmyal bar myong bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sems can thams 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]cad kyis dngos po 'di lnga dang ldan na da ltar gyi rnam par smin pa yang ba sems can dmyal bar myong bar 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_gti mug can dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba nyung ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las lci ba dang /_'gyod tshangs ma byas pa dang /_thog ma'i 
[\[166b.2\]]dge ba'i las mi spyod pa'o/_/yang rnam pa lnga ste/_mi dge ba'i las spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi nor med pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba spong ba dang /_lus dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sems dang /_shes rab mi sgom pa dang /_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[166b.3\]]la bsten pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de bas na da ltar gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang ba sems can dmyal ba'i lci ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ge sgras gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu gang dag ni sems can dmyal ba'i rnam par smin pa lci ba bsgyur te/_
[\[166b.4\]]da ltar gyi tshe na yang ba myong bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang gis lus dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sems dang /_shes rab sgom zhing gong du bshad pa ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar rtogs te/_shes rab tu 
[\[166b.5\]]mi lta/_shes rab can du mi lta/_gti mug tu mi lta/_gti mug can du mi lta/_bsgom par mi lta/_bsgom pa can du mi lta ba de ni shes rab can zhes bya ste/_des ni lus dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sems dang /_shes rab sgom zhing des ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[166b.6\]]rnam par smin pa lci ba da ltar gyi tshe na yang ba myong ba ste/_des gal te mi dge ba'i las rab tu lci ba byas kyang 'di snyam du bdag gi las 'di shin tu lci mod kyi/_dge ba'i las tsam mi phod do snyam du sems pa ni 'di lta ste/_dper na ras kyi bal ni pho re brgya yang gser yang 
[\[166b.7\]]dag pa srang gcig gi dor med pa'am/_ji ltar gang gA klung gi nang du lan tshwa phul gang btab na lan tshwa mi bro ste 'thung ba dag mi tshor ba'am/_dper na shin tu phyug pos rin po che brgya stong gzhan la chags kyang sus kyang bcings drags te sdug bsngal bar byed mi nus pa'am/_
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]ji ltar spos kyi bal glang chen po lcags kyu bcag nas rang nyam du 'gro nus pa ltar shes rab can yang de dang 'dra ste/_rtag tu 'di snyam du bdag ni dge ba'i stobs che la/_mi dge ba'i las ni zhan pas bdag gis mthol zhing bshags na sdig pa 
[\[167a.2\]]byang bar 'gyur te/_shes rab bsgoms na shes rab kyi stobs che zhing ma rig pa'i stobs chung bar 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen te/_yang dag pa'i lta ba la goms par byed cing mdo sde sde bcu gnyis gzungs su 'dzin te/_klog 
[\[167a.3\]]pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yi ger bris shing gzhan la ston pa dang /_gzhan dag gzungs su 'dzin cing klog gam/_'don tam/_yi ger 'dri'am/_gzhan la yang ston pa dag mthong na bkur sti'i sems bskyed do/_/gos dang /_zas dang /_gnas khang dang /_mal 
[\[167a.4\]]cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_me tog dang /_spos kyis mchod de/_bsti stang dang /_rim gro byed do/_/gang nas gang du phyin pa'i gnas su legs pa brjod kyi/_nyes pa mi brjod de/_dkon mchog gsum la mchod cing shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo mya ngan las 'das 
[\[167a.5\]]pa las de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /_mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba dang /_sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod par lhag par yid ches pa de ni/_sems can dmyal ba'i rnam par smin pa lci ba da ltar gyi dus na yang ba myong bar byed pa'o/_/rigs 
[\[167a.6\]]kyi bu don de lta bas na las thams cad nges par 'bras bu yod pa ma yin la/_sems can thams cad kyis nges par myong ba ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge sgras gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te las thams cad la nges par 'bras bu yang ba 
[\[167a.7\]]mchis la/_sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mchis pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad sgom par 'gyur na/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su ma thob/_bcom ldan 'das gal te sems 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mchis na/_gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur na/_'phags pa'i lam brgyad bsgom yang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di las nad pa dag gal te sman dang /_sman pa dang /_
[\[167b.2\]]nad g.yog dang /_nad ji lta ba bzhin du gsos na nad byang bar 'gyur ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams las 
[\[167b.3\]]chos thos te/_'phags pa'i lam bsgoms sam/_gal te ma phrad dam/_ma thos sam/_lam ma bsgoms kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/
[\[167b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das dper na nyi ma dang zla ba ni ri an tar du ma phyin par bar du gcod nus pa'am/_klung chen po bzhi yang rgya mtshor ma phyin par dgag nus pa'am/_log sred can dag sems can dmyal bar mi 'gro bar dgag nus pa ma mchis pa ltar sems can thams 
[\[167b.5\]]cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_sus kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro ba'i bar du gcod nus pa ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das don de lta bas na sems can thams cad lam 
[\[167b.6\]]bsgom mi 'tshal bar sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyi mthus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i rigs kyi/_'phags pa'i lam bsgom pa'i mthu la rag ma lus so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te log sred can dang /_phas pham pa bzhi nyams pa 
[\[167b.7\]]dang /_mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa la sogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi thob pa ni bsgom 'tshal na/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyi rgyus nges par thob par 'gyur bas bsgom pa'i phyir thob par 'gyur ba ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]dper na rdo khab len lta bu lcags dang mi nye mod kyi/_de'i mthus lcags 'dzin to/_/sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra ste/_de bas na 'phags pa'i lam la brtson mi 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[168a.2\]]pa/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu dper na gang gA'i klung gi 'gram na mi rnam pa bdun zhig khrus byed dam/_dgras 'jigs pa'i phyir ram/_me tog brnga ba'i phyir chu'i nang du zhugs na/_de la gcig ni chur zhugs ma thag tu nub par gyur to/_/de ci'i 
[\[168a.3\]]phyir zhe na/_zhan la mthu rtsal med de rkyal ma bslabs pa'i phyir ro/_/de la gcig ni zhugs nas nub mod kyi nub nas phyir yang 'byung ste/_byung nas phyir nub bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mthu rtsal che bas nub nas phyir 'byung ngo /_/rkyal ma bslabs pas byung 
[\[168a.4\]]nas phyir yang nub bo/_/de la gcig ni nub nas phyir byung ste/_byung nas phyir ma nub bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus lci bas nub kyang mthu rtsal che bas slar byung ngo /_/rkyal bslabs pas yang ma nub bo/_/de la gcig ni zhugs nas nub ste/_nub nas phyir byung 
[\[168a.5\]]ngo /_/byung nas chags te phyogs bzhi kun tu lta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus lci bas nub kyang mthu rtsal che bas byung ngo /_/rkyal bslabs pas chags te 'byung ba'i gnas mi shes pas phyogs bzhir lta ba'o/_/de la gcig ni zhugs nas nub ste/_nub nas phyir 
[\[168a.6\]]yang byung /_byung nas chags so/_/chags nas phyogs bzhir bltas so/_/bltas nas song ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de la gcig ni zhugs nas song ngo /_/gting tshugs pa na sdod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dgra nye ring lta ba'i phyir 
[\[168a.7\]]ro/_/de la gcig ni pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin nas ri mthon por 'dzegs te/_dgra dang bral nas 'jigs pa med cing rab tu bde bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du 'khor ba'i klung chen po yang de dang 'dra ste/_mi rnam pa bdun yod do/_/de dag kyang nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]dgras 'jigs pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i klung chen po rgal snyam bsams nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_skra dang /_kha spu bregs nas lus la chos gos gyon to/_/de ltar rab tu byung nas mi dge ba'i grogs dang bsten te/_de'i ngag nyan cing log pa'i 
[\[168b.2\]]chos 'di dag 'dzin to/_/sems can gyi lus ni lnga phung ste/_lnga phung de ni chen po lnga'o/_/gal te sems can shi na chen po lnga yun du bcad pa yin no/_/chen po lnga yun du bcad na dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las rnams bsgom ci dgos zhes zer te/_de bas na 
[\[168b.3\]]dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa med par rig go zhes zer te/_de lta bu ni log sred can zhes bya'o/_/log sred can zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gcod pa zhes bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pa'i phyir 'khor 
[\[168b.4\]]ba'i klung du nub ste 'byung mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi dge ba'i las lci ba'i phyir dad pa'i stobs med pa'i phyir te/_gang gA'i klung gi mi dang po dang mtshungs so/_/rigs kyi bu log sred can dag ni rgyu rkyen rnam pa drug gis ngan song gsum du nub ste 'byung 
[\[168b.5\]]mi nus so/_/drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi dge ba'i sems 'bar ba dang /_'jig rten phyi ma mi mthong ba dang /_nyon mongs pa spyod pa na dga' ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba spong ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las kyis bsgribs shing chod pa dang /_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten 
[\[168b.6\]]pa'o/_/yang dngos po rnam pa lngas ngan song gsum du nub bo/_/lnga gang zhe na/_dge slong la chos ma yin par byed pa dang /_dge slong ma la chos ma yin par byed pa dang /_dbang du byas te dge 'dun gyi rdzas la spyod pa dang /_ma la chos ma yin pa spyod pa dang /_dge 'dun sde 
[\[168b.7\]]mi 'thun pa lnga la yin pa dang ma yin pa bskyed pa'o/_/yang dngos po rnam pa lngas ngan song gsum du ltung ngo /_/lnga gang zhe na/_rtag tu dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i 'bras bu med do zhes 'chad pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can gyi srog gcod pa dang /_
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]chos smra ba'i skyon 'dru ba dang /_chos la chos ma yin par bshad cing chos ma yin pa la chos su bshad pa dang /_chos la skyon tshol ba'i phyir nyan pa'o/_/yang dngos po rnam pa gsum gyis ngan song gsum du nub bo/_/gsum gang zhe na/_de bzhin 
[\[169a.2\]]gshegs pa mi rtag pa ste 'gog pa'o zhes smra ba dang dam pa'i chos kyang mi rtag pa ste 'gyur zhing 'pho ba'o zhes smra ba dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog 'gog par 'gyur ro zhes smra ba ste/_de bas na rtag tu ngan song gsum du nub bo/_/de'i 'og mas 'khor ba'i klung las rgal 
[\[169a.3\]]bar 'dod pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pas nub nas 'byung mi nus so/_/de la 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen nas dad pa'i sems thob pa'o/_/de la dad pa'i sems ni sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la yid ches pa dang /_dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu la 
[\[169a.4\]]yid ches pa dang /_mi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu la yid ches pa dang /_'khor ba la sdug bsngal ba dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_'jig par yid ches pa ste/_de ni dad pa zhes bya'o/_/dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir tshul khrims gtsang ba spyod cing gzungs su 
[\[169a.5\]]'dzin te klog gam/_'don tam/_yi ger bris sam/_dgrol zhing bshad de/_rtag tu sbyin pa byed cing shes rab sgom yang dbang po rtul ba'i phyir mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad na lus dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sems dang /_shes rab mi sgom zhing log pa'i 
[\[169a.6\]]chos 'dzin to/_/yang dus ngan pa'i tshe yul ngan par skyes na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gcod do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pa'i phyir rtag tu 'khor bar nub ste/_de ni gang gA'i klung gi mi gnyis pa dang mtshungs so/_/de la gcig ni 'khor ba'i klung chen po las rgal bar 'dod pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[169a.7\]]bcad pa'i phyir nub par gyur kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pas na byung ba zhes bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin/_rtag par mi 'gyur ba ste/_sems can gyi phyir bla na med pa'i chos ston to/_/sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod do/_/
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la 'gog pa ma yin no zhes yid ches shing dad de/_log sred can ni chos de dag ma bcad na nams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi 'thob ste/_rnam par spangs na gdod thob bo snyam yid ches shing dad pa'i 
[\[169b.2\]]sems kyis tshul khrims gtsang ba sgom ste/_tshul khrims gtsang ba bsgoms nas mdo sde sde bcu gnyis gzungs su 'dzin cing klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yi ger bris shing rnam par 'byed de/_sems can thams cad la rgyas par ston to/_/sbyin pa la dga' 
[\[169b.3\]]zhing shes rab sgom par byed do/_/de ltar dbang po rno bas dad pa dang /_shes rab brtan par gyur nas phyir ldog pa'i sems med pa de ni gang gA'i klung gi mi gsum pa dang mtshungs so/_/de la gcig ni 'khor ba'i klung chen po la rgal 'dod pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad 
[\[169b.4\]]pa'i phyir der nub par gyur kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten pas dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni 'byung ba zhes bya ste/_dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir mdo sde sde bcu gnyis gzungs su 'dzin cing klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yi ger bris shing rnam par 'byed de/_sems 
[\[169b.5\]]can thams cad la rgyas par ston to/_/sbyin pa la dga' zhing shes rab sgom par byed do/_/de ltar dbang po rno ba'i phyir dad pa dang /_shes rab la brten par gyur nas phyir ldog pa'i sems med pas phyogs bzhir lta'o/_/de la phyogs bzhir lta ba zhes bya ba ni dge 
[\[169b.6\]]sbyong gi 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi ste/_ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi mi bzhi pa dang mtshungs so/_/de la gcig ni 'khor ba'i klung chen po de rgal 'dod pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pa'i phyir der nub par gyur kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsnyen pa'i phyir dad pa'i sems dang ldan 
[\[169b.7\]]pas na de ni 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/de ltar dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir mdo sde sde bcu gnyis gzungs su 'dzin cing klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yi ger bris shing rnam par 'byed de/_sems can thams cad la rgyas par ston to/_/sbyin pa la dga' zhing shes rab 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]sgom par byed do/_/de ltar dbang po rno bar gyur pa'i phyir dad pa dang shes rab brtan par gyur nas phyir ldog pa'i sems med par gyur to/_/de ltar phyir ldog pa med pas gong nas gong du 'phar ro/_/de la gong nas gong du 'phar ba ni rang sangs rgyas te/_
[\[170a.2\]]de ltar bdag grol mod kyi/_sems can thams cad la ma yin pas de ni song ba zhes bya ste/_ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi mi lnga dang mtshungs so/_/de la gcig ni 'khor ba'i klung chen po rgal 'dod pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pas der nub kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten 
[\[170a.3\]]pas dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to/_/dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/de ltar dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir mdo sde sde bcu gnyis gzungs su 'dzin cing klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yi ger bris shing rnam par phye ste/_sems can 
[\[170a.4\]]thams cad la rgyas par ston to/_/sbyin pa la dga' zhing shes rab sgom par byed do/_/de ltar dbang po rnon por gyur pa'i phyir dad pa dang shes rab brtan par gyur nas phyir ldog pa'i sems med do/_/da ltar phyir ldog pa med pas gong nas gong du 'phar te gting tshugs 
[\[170a.5\]]par phyin to/_/gting tshugs par phyin nas der sdod de mi 'gro'o/_/der sdod cing mi 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams sgrol ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa la rtog pa'o/_/de ni ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi mi drug pa dang mtshungs so/_/de la 
[\[170a.6\]]gcig ni 'khor ba'i klung chen po rgal 'dod pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad de der nub par gyur kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten pas na dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to/_/dad pa'i sems dang ldan pas na byung ba zhes bya ste/_dad pa'i sems kyis mdo sde sde bcu gnyis 
[\[170a.7\]]gzungs su 'dzin cing klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yi ger bris shing rnam par 'byed de/_sems can thams cad la rgyas par ston to/_/sbyin pa la dga' zhing shes rab sgom par byed do/_/da ltar dbang po rnon por gyur pa'i phyir dad pa dang /_shes rab brtan par gyur nas phyir 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]ldog pa'i sems med par gyur to/_/phyir ldog pa med pas gong nas gong du 'phar ro/_/gong nas gong du 'phar bas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin te/_ri mthon por 'dzegs nas 'jigs pa'i dgra rnams spangs te bde ba mang po myong bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu pha rol gyi 'gram 
[\[170b.2\]]du phyin pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/bde ba myong ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rtag pa'o/_/ri mthon por gnas pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i dpe'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang gA'i klung gi mi de dag kun la rkang lag dang ldan mod kyi/_rgal 
[\[170b.3\]]mi nus pa ltar sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_yang dag par sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog yod la/_de bzhin gshegs pas kyang chos rnams kyi mdo 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang /_yongs 
[\[170b.4\]]su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan mod kyi/_sems can rnams kyis thob par mi nus te/_'di ni ngas kyang ma nyes la 'phags pa'i lam gyis kyang ma nyes te/_sems can rnams kyi skyon dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis nyes par gyur par rig par bya'o/_/don de lta bas na 
[\[170b.5\]]sems can thams cad kyis mya ngan las 'das pa ma thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu dper na sman pa mkhas pas nad kyi dngos po rig nas sman ston te/_nad pas ma 'thungs na sman pas nyes pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gal te sbyin bdag gcig gis nor ci bdog pa thams cad mi 
[\[170b.6\]]thams cad la byin pa las kha cig gis ma blangs na sbyin bdag gis nyes pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dper na nyi ma shar ba na grag grog zab mo thams cad kyang snang bar gyur la/_dmus long gis lam mi mthong ba ni nyi mas ma nyes so/_/rigs kyi bu dper na gang gA'i 
[\[170b.7\]]klung gi chus skom pa mang po ngoms par nus so/_/skom pa dag ma 'thungs na chus ma nyes so/_/rigs kyi bu dper na sa chen pos ni 'bras bu thams cad mnyam par skyed de gnyis su med na/_zhing pas ma rmos pa ni sas ma nyes so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]pas sems can thams cad la khyab par mdo sde sde bcu gnyis rgyas par 'byed cing bstan te/_sems can gyis ma bzung na de bzhin gshegs pas ma nyes so/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la lam sgom pa ni/_bla na med pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[171a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can kun la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod pas bla na med pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob ste/_ji ltar rdo khab len bzhin no zhes bya ba ni legs so legs so/_/sangs 
[\[171a.3\]]rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod pa'i rgyu'i stobs kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob kyi/_'phags pa'i lam bsgom mi dgos so zhes bya ba ni don de lta ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dper na mi la la zhig gis dbye dgon par song ba las skom pas gdungs te khron pa 
[\[171a.4\]]zhig dang phrad do/_/khron pa de shin tu zab ste/_chu mi mthong mod kyi nges par yod par shes so/_/mi des thabs kyis zo ba dang thag pa btsal te bcus nas gzod mthong ba ltar sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra ste/_sems can thams cad la yod mod kyi/_
[\[171a.5\]]zag pa med pa'i 'phags pa'i lam bsgoms pas gdod mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar til yod na mar yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/thabs rnams spangs na mi mthong ba bzhin du bu ram gyi shing yang de dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gnam 
[\[171a.6\]]gyi lha dang /_byang sgra mi snyan yod pa'i chos yin mod kyi/_dge ba'i las sam rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu med na mi mthong ngo /_/sa'i 'og na rtswa'i rtsa ba dang /_sa'i 'og gi chu ni sas khebs pas na mi mthong ba ltar sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra ste/_'phags pa'i 
[\[171a.7\]]lam ma bsgoms na ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar 'jig rten na nad pas gal te nad g.yog dang /_sman bzang po dang /_sman pa mkhas pa dang phrad de/_nad ji lta ba bzhin du sman btang ngam/_gal te ma phrad kyang rung ste 'tsho'o zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi bu 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]ngas byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa rnams la don de dag bstan to/_/rigs kyi bu dper na nam mkha' ni sems can thams cad kyi nang yang ma yin/_phyi rol yang ma yin/_phyi nang gnyis ka yang ma yin pa'i phyir thogs pa med de/_sems can gyi sangs 
[\[171b.2\]]rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na mi zhig la nor gnas gzhan zhig na yod la/_drung na med mod kyi/_yid bzhin du spyod pa la dbang ngo /_/gal te la la zhig gis dris na yang bdag dbang ngo zhes zer ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nges 
[\[171b.3\]]par dbang ba'i phyir te/_sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra ste/_'di yang ma yin/_pha rol yang ma yin te/_nges par thob pa'i phyir thams cad la yod ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dper na sems can gyis las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas pa 
[\[171b.4\]]yang nang na ma yin/_phyi rol na ma yin te/_de ltar las kyi rang bzhin de yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin/_thog ma med pa da ltar yod pa yang ma yin/_rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/_'dis byas pas 'dis myong ba yang ma yin/_'dis byas pas 
[\[171b.5\]]gzhan myong ba yang ma yin/_gzhan byas pas gzhan myong ba yang ma yin/_byas pa yang med/_myong ba yang med pa ma yin gyi/_dus dang rkyen 'dus pas 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba ltar/_sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra bar thog 
[\[171b.6\]]ma med la da ltar yod pa yang ma yin/_nang na ma yin/_phyi rol na ma yin/_yod pa ma yin/_med pa ma yin/_'di na ma yin/_pha rol na ma yin/_gzhan nas 'ongs pa ma yin/_rgyu med pa yang ma yin/_sems can thams cad kyis mthong ba yang ma yin te/_byang 
[\[171b.7\]]chub sems dpa' rnams dus dang rkyen 'dus pas mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de la dus zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa 'phags pa'i lam brgyad sgom zhing sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems thob pa de'i tshe na mthong ste/_
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]de ni byis pa zhes mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rdo khab len dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i don ni de lta ma yin gyi/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rdos lcags 'dzin pa ma yin no/_/de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems dang las med pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu chos 
[\[172a.2\]]tha dad pa yod pas chos tha dad par 'byung ngo /_/chos tha dad pa med pas chos tha dad pa 'gog ste/_byed pa yang med/_'jig pa yang med do/_/rigs kyi bu dper na/_me mur gyis shing tshig par mi nus mod kyi/_me byung nas shing 'jig pas tshig pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[172a.3\]]rigs kyi bu dper na lcam pa ni nyi ma ji lta ba ltar 'gyur te/_lcam pa de la 'dud pa'i sems kyang med/_rnam par shes pa yang med la/_las kyang med mod kyi/_chos tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rang 'khor zhing 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dper na chu shing gi sdong po ni 
[\[172a.4\]]'brug gi sgra bsgrags pa na skye ste/_sdong po de la rna ba med/_sems med/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa med kyang chos tha dad pa yod pas chos tha dad pa skyes so/_/chos tha dad pa med na chos tha dad pa 'gog go/_/rigs kyi bu dper na shing a sho ka la bud med kyis reg na 
[\[172a.5\]]me tog 'byung ste/_shing de la sems kyang med/_reg pa'i tshor ba yang med kyang /_chos tha dad pa yod pas chos tha dad pa 'byung ngo /_/chos tha dad pa med na chos tha dad pa 'gog go/_/rigs kyi bu dper na skyur rtsi'i shing ni ro dang 'bags na shing tog legs shing mang bar 
[\[172a.6\]]'gyur te/_skyur rtsi'i shing de la sems kyang med/_reg pa med mod kyi/_chos tha dad pa yod pas chos tha dad pa 'byung ngo /_/chos tha dad pa med na chos tha dad pa 'gog go/_/rigs kyi bu dper na bal po se'u'i shing 'dzugs pa so phag dang /_rus pa dang lud kyis smred byas 
[\[172a.7\]]na 'bras bu legs par 'gyur te/_bal po se'u'i shing de la sems dang reg pa med mod kyi/_chos tha dad pa yod pas chos tha dad pa 'byung ngo /_/chos tha dad pa med na chos tha dad pa 'gog ste/_rigs kyi bu rdo khab len gyis lcags len pa yang de dang 'dra bar chos 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]tha dad pa yod pas chos tha dad pa 'byung ngo /_/chos tha dad pa med na chos tha dad pa 'gog ste/_sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub len mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu ma rig pa yang 'du byed rnams len mi 
[\[172b.2\]]nus shing 'du byed kyis kyang rnam par shes pa len mi nus mod kyi/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas bzhugs kyang rung /_mi bzhugs kyang rung /_chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[172b.3\]]gal te sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin sems can gyi nang na gnas zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi bu rtag pa'i chos ni gnas med de/_gal te gnas yod na mi rtag par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis ni nges par gnas pa'i gnas med do/_/gal te 
[\[172b.4\]]gnas pa'i gnas yod na rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis rtag pa zhes mi bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku yang gnas pa'i gnas med/_chos kyi khams dang /_chos kyi skye mched dang /_chos kyi phung po dang /_nam mkha' yang gnas pa'i 
[\[172b.5\]]gnas med de/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra bar gnas pa'i gnas med do/_/rigs kyi bu dper na chen po bzhi ni stobs mnyam ste/_kun la sra ba dang /_dro ba dang /_gsher ba dang /_g.yo ba dang /_yang ba dang /_lci ba dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar 
[\[172b.6\]]po dang /_ser po dang /_nag po'i mtshan nyid 'dra bar yod mod kyi/_chen po bzhi la las med do/_/chos tha dad pa'i dbyings kyis so sor mi mtshungs pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra ba ste/_chos tha dad pa'i dbyings kyi phyir dus dang phrad na gdod mthong 
[\[172b.7\]]ngo /_/rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yod pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir/_yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_nges par thob pa'i phyir/_nges par mthong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/_sems can 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na rgyal po zhig gis blon po chen po gcig la khyod kyis bal glang gcig khrid la dmus long la ston cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas blon po chen po des rgyal po'i bka' 
[\[173a.2\]]bzhin du dmus long rnams bsdus te bal glang bstan pa dang /_dmus long de dag so so nas lag pas mnams so/_/de nas blon pos slar rgyal po la bdag gis bstan lags so zhes gsol nas/_de nas rgyal pos dmus long rnams bkug nas so sor khyed 
[\[173a.3\]]cag gis bal glang mthong ngam zhes smras pa dang /_dmus long rnams kyis so so nas bdag gis mthong ngo zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bal glang ji lta bur 'dug_/de la dmus long gang mche ba la reg pas ni bal glang yungs ma dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro/_/rna 
[\[173a.4\]]ba la reg pas ni bal glang ni zhib ma dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro/_/mgo la reg pas ni bal glang rdo dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro/_/sna la reg pas ni bal glang gnya' shing dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro/_/rkang pa la reg pas ni bal glang gi gzugs gtun dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro/_/
[\[173a.5\]]rgyab la reg pas ni bal glang khri dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro/_/lto ba la reg pas ni bal glang rdza ma dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro/_/mjug ma la reg pas ni bal glang gi gzugs thag pa dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro/_/rigs kyi bu dmus long de dag bal glang gi dngos po nyid mi smra mod kyi/_
[\[173a.6\]]mi smra ba yang ma yin no/_/gal te dngos po de dag bal glang ma yin na de dag spangs pa'i pha rol na bal glang gzhan med do/_/rigs kyi bu rgyal po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dpe'o/_/blon po ni shin tu rgyas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i dpe'o/_/
[\[173a.7\]]bal glang ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyi dpe'o/_/dmus long ni sems can ma rig pa rnams kyi dpe'o/_/sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas kha cig ni 'di skad du gzugs ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs de 'gog mod kyi/_
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]gcig gis gcig bsabs shing rgyun mi 'chad pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rtag pa thob pa'i phyir te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs ni rtag pa mi 'chad pa'i phyir de bas na 
[\[173b.2\]]gzugs ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes zer te/_dper na gser yang dag pa ji ltar bsgyur ba yang kha dog rtag cing mi 'gyur te/_gdu bu byas sam/_sbrul du byas sam/_gzhong bar byas kyang rung ste/_kha dog ser po thog ma nas ma gyur to/_/sems can gyi sangs 
[\[173b.3\]]rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra bar dbyibs mi rtag mod kyi/_gzugs ni rtag pa ste/_de'i phyir gzugs ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes smra'o/_/kha cig ni 'di skad du tshor ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes zer ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshor ba'i rgyu dang rkyen 
[\[173b.4\]]gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i bde ba thob ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshor ba ni mthar tshor ba don dam pa'i tshor ba ste/_sems can gyi tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi rtag mod kyi/_'on kyang gcig gis gcig bsabs te rgyun mi 'chad pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[173b.5\]]pa'i tshor ba rtag pa thob ste/_dper na/_mi'i rus ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba mi nyid mi rtag mod kyi/_rus rtag pa yin te/_rabs stong phrag brgyar yang mi 'gyur ba ltar/_sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra ste/_de bas na tshor ba ni sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[173b.6\]]rang bzhin no zhes smra'o/_/de la kha cig ni 'di skad du 'du shes ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes zer ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'du shes kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes yang dag par thob bo/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes ni 'du shes 
[\[173b.7\]]med pa'i 'du shes so/_/'du shes med pa'i 'du shes ni sems can du 'du shes pa ma yin/_bud med dang skyes par 'du shes pa ma yin/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes par 'du shes pa ma yin/_'du shes ma 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]yin/_'du shes chad pa'o/_/sems can gyi 'du shes mi rtag mod kyi/_'du shes rim gyis gcig gis gcig bsabs te rgyun mi 'chad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes ther zug rtag pa thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu dper na sems can gyi 
[\[174a.2\]]rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis dang mtshungs te/_sems can ni 'gog mod kyi/_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis ni rtag pa ltar sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra ste/_de bas na 'du shes ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes smra'o/_/de la 
[\[174a.3\]]kha cig ni 'di skad du 'du byed ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes zer ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'du byed ni 'tsho ba'i srog ces bya ste/_srog gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe rtag tu gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gyi srog mi rtag mod kyi/_'tsho ba'i 
[\[174a.4\]]srog rim gyis gcig gis gcig bsabs shing rgyun mi 'chad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i sku tshe rtag pa thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu dper na/_mdo sde sde bcu gnyis la mnyan pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_gnyis ka ni mi rtag mod kyi/_mdo sde nyid rtag tu gnas 
[\[174a.5\]]shing mi 'gyur ba ltar sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra bas na/_de'i phyir 'du byed ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes smra'o/_/de la kha cig ni 'di skad du rnam par shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes zer ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par shes 
[\[174a.6\]]pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs mnyam pa thob ste/_sems can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag mod kyi/_rnam par shes pa de gcig gis gcig bsabs shing rgyun mi 'chad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i thugs rtag pa thob par 'gyur 
[\[174a.7\]]ro/_/dper na mes tshos par byed pa dang 'dra ste/_me mi rtag pa yin yang tshos pa ni mi rtag pa ma yin pa ltar sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra ste/_don de lta bas na rnam par shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes smra'o/_/de la kha cig ni 'di skad 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]du phung po ma gtogs par bdag ces bya ba yod de/_bdag ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes zer ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag ces bya ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang sgyur ba brgyad thob par 'gyur ro/_/mu stegs can dag kha 
[\[174b.2\]]cig ni song ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_mya ngan dang /_dga' ba dang /_smra ba la bdag go zhes zer te/_bdag ces bya ba'i mtshan nyid de dag mi rtag mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag yang dag pa ni rtag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper 
[\[174b.3\]]na phung po dang skye mched dang khams mi rtag mod kyi ming du btags pa rtag pa yin pa ltar sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar dmus long de dag so so nas bal glang gi gzugs smra ba de dag thog tu bab par ma smras mod kyi/_bal 
[\[174b.4\]]glang las gzhan smras pa ma yin pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin smra ba yang de dang 'dra ste/_chos drug po ma yin mod kyi/_chos drug las gzhan pa'ang ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gzugs ma yin/_gzugs 
[\[174b.5\]]las gzhan pa'ang ma yin pa nas bdag ma yin/_bdag las gzhan pa'i bar du yang ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu mu stegs can dag ni bdag yod ces smra mod kyi/_yang dag par bdag ces bya ba med do/_/sems can gyi bdag ces bya ba ni 
[\[174b.6\]]phung po lnga nyid la bya ste/_phung po'i pha rol na bdag ces bya ba logs shig na med do/_/rigs kyi bu dper na lcug ma dang /_lo ma dang /_ge sar dang /_sdong bu 'dus pa las pad mor 'gyur te/_de dag spangs pa'i pha rol na pad mo zhes bya ba gzhan med pa ltar 
[\[174b.7\]]sems can gyi bdag kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na rtsig pa dang /_rtswa dang /_shing 'dus pa las khang pa zhes bya ste/_de dag spangs pa'i pha rol na khang pa zhes bya ba gzhan med do/_/dper na shing seng ldeng dang /_shing pa la sha dang /_shing n+ya gro d+ha dang /_
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]shing u dum bA ra la sogs pa 'dus pa la tshal zhes bya ste/_de dag spangs pa'i pha rol na tshal zhes bya ba gzhan med do/_/dper na shing rta'i tshogs dang /_bal glang gi tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_rkang thang gi tshogs 'dus pa las 
[\[175a.2\]]dmag ces bya ste/_de dag spangs pa'i pha rol na dmag ces bya ba gzhan med do/_/dper na kha che dar gyi tshon rnam pa lnga 'dus pa las za 'ug ces bya ste/_de dag spangs pa'i pha rol na za 'ug ces bya ba gzhan med do/_/dper na rigs rnam pa bzhi 'dus pa la tshogs 
[\[175a.3\]]chen po zhes bya ste/_de dag spangs pa'i pha rol na tshogs chen po zhes bya ba gzhan med pa ltar sems can gyi bdag ces bya ba yang de dang 'dra ste/_phung po lnga spangs pa'i pha rol na bdag ces bya ba gzhan med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu gnas pas 
[\[175a.4\]]bdag ces bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku ni mtha' yas/_thogs pa med/_mi skye mi 'gog cing dbang brgyad thob pas bdag ces bya ste/_sems can la ni yang dag par de lta bu'i bdag dang bdag gi ba med de/_mthar gdon mi za bar don dam pa'i stong 
[\[175a.5\]]pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po ni rtag tu grib ma bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[175a.6\]]la 'khor te/_sems can thams cad kyang gdon mi za bar byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod do zhes gsungs so/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin 
[\[175a.7\]]zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/de la dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos srid pa nyi shu rtsa lnga ma spangs na/_bla na 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi nus te/_sems can thams cad mthar thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod ces gsungs so/_/de la dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[175b.2\]]rang bzhin zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin nyid de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/yang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni dad pa'i sems chen po zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dad pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[175b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyang mthar gdon mi za bar dad pa'i sems chen po thob pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod ces gsungs so/_/de la dad pa'i 
[\[175b.4\]]sems ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin te/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/yang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni bu gcig pa'i sa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bu gcig pa'i sa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad 
[\[175b.5\]]la mnyam pa'i sems thob ste/_sems can thams cad kyang mthar gdon mi za bar bu gcig pa'i sa thob par 'gyur bas na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod de/_bu gcig pa'i sa ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin nyid ni 
[\[175b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/yang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni sa bzhi pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa bzhi pa'i stobs kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don byed par 'gyur te/_sems can thams cad 
[\[175b.7\]]kyang mthar gdon mi za bar sa bzhi pa'i stobs thob par 'gyur bas na de'i phyir sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod de/_sa bzhi pa'i stobs ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]yang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu gnas te/_sems can thams cad kyang gdon mi za bar rten cing 'brel 
[\[176a.2\]]te 'byung ba bcu gnyis po de dag thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod de/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[176a.3\]]yang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni so so yang dag par shes pa rnam pa bzhi'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis tshig dang don bshad pa la thogs pa med do/_/tshig dang don la thogs pa med pa'i phyir sems can gyi don byed par 'gyur te/_
[\[176a.4\]]de bas na so so yang dag par shes pa bzhi ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/yang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de bsgoms na sangs 
[\[176a.5\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par gyur te/_de lta bas na spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pas ting nge 'dzin bsgoms kyang yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong mod kyi/_gsal bar ma gyur 
[\[176a.6\]]to/_/sems can thams cad kyang mthar gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod ces gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar gong du smos pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs kyang sems can thams cad kyis gdon mi za 
[\[176a.7\]]bar thob par 'gyur bas na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod do zhes gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te ngas gzugs la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes bshad na sems can gyis thos ma thag tu phyin ci log pa bskyed do/_/phyin ci log pa'i phyir 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]tshe'i dus byas nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pas ni sems can dmyal ba bcad pa'i phyir te/_de bas na gzugs ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes mi gsungs pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma gsungs 
[\[176b.2\]]so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te sems can gyis sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gsal bar rtogs na lam sgom mi dgos te/_byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pas 'phags pa'i lam brgyad bsgoms pa yang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin cung zad cig mthong na/_ma bsgoms pas mthong 
[\[176b.3\]]bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pas bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du 'phags pa'i lam bsgoms pas gdod sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ga la mthong /_gal te sems 
[\[176b.4\]]can dag sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gsal bar mthong bar 'dod na sems rtse gcig tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo gzungs su 'dzin cing klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yi ger bris shing dgrol zhing bshad pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_rim gro dang /_bkur stir 
[\[176b.5\]]bya'o/_/gzhan gyis gzungs su 'dzin pa nas bkur sti la sogs pa'i bar du byed pa mthong na/_gnas khang bzang po dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman gyis mchod cing bsngags pa dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_gsong por smra ba yang bya'o/_/rigs 
[\[176b.6\]]kyi bu gang gis 'das pa'i dus na/_sangs rgyas tshad med mtha' yas pa snyed la bsnyen bkur dang mchod pa byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bskrun pas gdod mdo sde 'di'i ming tsam thos par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[176b.7\]]dang /_chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/_sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod la/_shes par mi nus pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag pa'i chos 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di la dad pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge sgras gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[177a.2\]]pa ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di la dad par ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i nang na sems can bye ba phrag brgyad khri lnga stong snyed mdo sde 'di la dad pa'i sems mi skye bas gang 
[\[177a.3\]]mdo sde 'di la dad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes bgyi'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sems can de dag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mdo sde 'di la yid ches par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[177a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bzhi bcu gsum pa/_seng ge sgras gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ji ltar bdag la 
[\[177a.5\]]gdon mi za bar phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dka' thub spyad pa'i sems kyis bdag la bdag brtags na rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/'di 
[\[177a.6\]]lta ste/_/nyin re zhing til 'bru re las mi za bar de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du 'bras nas sran ma'am/_gso ma'am/_khre'am/_sran ma dkar po'i bar du de dang 'dra bar zhag bdun bdun gyi bar du 'brum bu re las mi za ste/_nyin re zhing 'brum bu re za ba na 'di snyam du 
[\[177a.7\]]dka' ba spyod pa 'di ni phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba med de/_phan pa'i don du mi 'gyur yang de ltar spyod na phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba mi byed pa lta ci smos snyam sems te/_phan pa'i don du mi 'gyur ba yang nyams su len cing bzod pa byed de/_phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bas na gdon 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar zhag de snyed kyi bar du dka' ba spyod pa na lus kyi sha dang pags pa nyams shing rid pa ni ku ba brngas ma thag pa nyi ma la bzhag pa dang mtshungs so/_/mig rkong ba ni khron pa'i skar ma dang 
[\[177b.2\]]mtshungs so/_/sha kun zad de rtsa dang chu ba 'ba' zhig snang ba ni rtswa khyim zhig pa dang mtshungs so/_/sgal tshigs mngon par snang ba ni thag gu mdud pa bor ba dang mtshungs so/_/'dug 'dug pa'i gnas ni rta'i rmig rjes dang mtshungs te/_'dug pa'i tshe ni kha sbub tu 'gyel/_
[\[177b.3\]]langs pa'i tshe ni gan rkyal du 'gyel te/_de ltar phan pa'i don med pa'i sdug bsngal myong yang byang chub kyi sems las phyir ldog par mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdug bsngal gzhom zhing bde ba sbyin pa'i phyir phyi 
[\[177b.4\]]nang gi zang zing thams cad gtong ba nas lus dang srog gi bar du rtswa dang 'dra bar yongs su gtong bar byed do/_/gang de ltar lus dang srog la mi phangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni bdag la bdag phyir mi ldog pa'i sems gdon mi za bar yod pa dang /_nges par bla na med 
[\[177b.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par rtogs so/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas chos 'dod pa'i rkyen gyis lus kyis snang ba'i mar me 'dzugs pa ni lus la ras kyis dkris nas mar gyis byugs te me gtong bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpas de'i 
[\[177b.6\]]tshe de ltar sdug bsngal chen po myong ba na bdag gi sems la smad pa'i phyir 'di skad ces smra'o/_/sdug bsngal 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal brgya stong gi char yang mi phod na khyod kyi bskal pa tshad med pa brgya stong gi bar du phan pa'i don med pa'i sdug bsngal chen po 
[\[177b.7\]]yang bzod la/_sdug bsngal chung ngu 'di tsam la mi bzod na sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya zhes smra'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar yid la byed pa na lus kyis kyang sdug bsngal ba mi tshor 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]la/_sems kyang phyir mi ldog cing mi g.yo mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe na bdag ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[178a.2\]]de'i tshe na nyon mongs pa dang bcas te yongs su ma bcad kyang chos 'dod pa'i rkyen gyis lus kyi yan lag mgo bo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_rkang dang /_sha dang /_khrag gis sems can la sbyin par byed de/_lcags kyi gzer bus lus la 
[\[178a.3\]]'dzugs pa dang /_brag la mchongs pa dang /_me la mchongs pa yang byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe de lta bu'i sdug bsngal tshad med pa myong yang gal te sems phyir mi ldog cing mi g.yo mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' de ni gdon mi za bar phyir mi 
[\[178a.4\]]ldog pa'i sems dang ldan zhing /_nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i phyir shin tu 
[\[178a.5\]]che ba'i byol song gi lus su skye ba'i smon lam 'debs te/_lus kyi sha dang /_khrag gis sems can la sbyin par byed la/_sems can dag gis len pa'i tshe na de dag la byams shing snying rje'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe dbugs kyang rgyu bar mi 
[\[178a.6\]]byed de shi ba ltar byas nas gang sha len pa de dag las bsad par ma gyur tam snyam the tshom za ba'i sems kyang med par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpas de ltar byol song gi skye gnas su skyes kyang byol song gi skye gnas kyi las nam du yang mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[178a.7\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas phyir mi ldog pa'i sems thob pas nam du yang ngan song gsum gyi las mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_gnas ngan len gyi 'bras bu rdul phra mo tsam nges par myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa yang 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]smon lam chen po'i shugs kyis sems can gyi phyir de dag myong bar byed do/_/'di lta ste dper na nad pa zhig [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis brlams nas mngon par bltar mi snang yang /_/rig sngags kyi mthus mngon par snang ste/_bar 'ga' ni smra/_bar 'ga' ni dga'/_bar 
[\[178b.2\]]'ga' ni khro/_bar 'ga' ni gshe_/bar 'ga' ni rdeg_/bar 'ga' ni ngu /_bar 'ga' ni rgod pa ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi ngan song gsum gyi las kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[178b.3\]]dred mo'i lus su gyur pa na rtag tu sems can rnams la dam pa'i chos ston to/_/bar 'ga' ni bya ka byi sha la'i lus su gyur te/_sems can rnams la dam pa'i chos ston to/_/sems can rnams la dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i phyir ku ta la'i lus dang /_sha ba dang /_ri bong dang /_
[\[178b.4\]]bal glang dang /_lug dang /_spre'u dang /_phug ron dkar po dang /_bya nam mkha' lding dang /_klu dang /_sbrul du yang gyur te/_de ltar byol song gi lus mang po myong ba na nam du yang byol song gi skye gnas kyi las ma byas kyi rtag tu byol song gi skye gnas su gyur pa gzhan 
[\[178b.5\]]la chos ston te/_de dag byol song gi lus las myur du thar bar bya ba'i phyir chos thos par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe de ltar byol song gi lus myong yang gnas ngan len gyi las mi byed pas de bas na gdon mi za bar phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan par 
[\[178b.6\]]rtogs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu ge byung ba'i tshe sems can dag zas kyis nyen pa mthong nas ru sbal dang nya'i lus che khyad dpag tshad grangs med pa'i lus su skyes te/_'di skad ces smon lam 'debs so/_/sems can thams cad kyis bdag 
[\[178b.7\]]gi lus kyi sha gcod cing za ba dang /_bcad pa'i 'phro nas phyir yang skye ba dang /_bdag gi sha zos pa'i rkyen gyis bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral te/_thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig ces 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]smon lam 'debs so/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di skad du/_gang bdag gis sha zos pa'i rkyen gyis bkres shing skom pa dang bral bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus su srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar bkres pa dang skom pa'i 
[\[179a.2\]]skyon thams cad dang myur du bral bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar sdug bsngal myong ba na/_sems phyir mi ldog pa ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 
[\[179a.3\]]rig par bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas nad kyi bskal pa byung ba'i tshe/_nad kyis gzir ba mthong na 'di snyam du sems so/_/ji ltar sman gyi sdong po'i rgyal po la nad pa gang rtsa ba'am/_sdong bu'am/_yal ga'am/_lo ma'am/_me tog gam/_
[\[179a.4\]]'bras bu'am/_shun pa'am/_gang blangs kyang rung /_nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba ltar bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar gyur te/_nad pa gang gi skad thos sam/_lus la reg gam/_sha dang khrag zos pa nas/_rkang dang klad pa'i bar du zos pa thams cad kyi nad byang 
[\[179a.5\]]bar gyur cig_/sems can gyis bdag gi sha zos nas ngan sems ma bskyed par bu'i sha la za ba dang 'dra bar sems shing bdag gi nad sos par byas nas chos bstan par gyur pa dang /_de dag gi thos nas dad cing gzungs su bzung ste/_gzhan la yang ston par gyur 
[\[179a.6\]]cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang bcas te/_lus kyis sdug bsngal myong yang sems phyir mi ldog cing mi g.yo mi 'gyur ba ni nges par phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[179a.7\]]pa'i byang chub 'thob par rig par bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu gal te sems can dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis brlams te nad du gyur na/_byang chub sems dpas mthong ma thag tu 'di skad ces smon lam 'debs so/_/bdag kyang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi lus su gyur te/_lus 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]che ba dang byin yod pa'i lus dang /_'khor mang po'i lus su gyur te/_de dag gi thos ma thag tu nad 'tsho bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phyir dka' thub spyod pa na/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas mod 
[\[179b.2\]]kyi sems la mi 'go'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod mod kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'bras bu la mi re'o/_/bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nan tan byed pa na 'di skad ces smon lam 'debs 
[\[179b.3\]]so/_/bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi sems can re re la sbyin pa bya'o/_/sems can re res kyang bdag gi sbyin pa blangs nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig_/bdag nyid kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu gyur te/_dka' 
[\[179b.4\]]ba spyod cing sdug bsngal mang po myong ba dang /_sdug bsngal myong ba'i tshe yang byang chub kyi sems las phyir ldog par ma gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid de lta bur gyur pa na byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o/_/
[\[179b.5\]]rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor ba la nyes pa'i skyon shin tu mang ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[179b.6\]]pa chen po la ni yon tan chen po yod par shes mod kyi sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba la gnas te/_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba la sems phyir mi ldog pas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems 
[\[179b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskul nas snying rje ba dang byams pa'i sems skyed pa ma yin/_bya ba'i drin 'dod pa yang ma yin te/_rtag tu gzhan la bya ba'i drin sbyin par byed do/_/de ltar bya ba'i drin byin yang lan la re ba'i sems med pas 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]na bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sems can dag ni bdag la phan pa'i don du dka' ba spyod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzhan la phan pa'i don du dka' ba spyod de/_de ni bdag la phan pa yang yin la/_
[\[180a.2\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyon mongs pa dang bcas kyang dgra dang gnyen gyi sems gzhig pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mang po myong yang mnyam pa'i sems la nan tan byed pas/_de bas na bsam gyis mi 
[\[180a.3\]]khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gal te sdig pa mi dge ba'i sems can dag mthong na spyo ba'am/_tshig 'jam po smra ba'am/_skrod pa'am/_gal te na btang snyoms su 'jog ste/_gang rang bzhin gyis khro ba la ni tshig 'jam po smra ba la 
[\[180a.4\]]yang ston to/_/gang nga rgyal can la ni nga rgyal chen po yang mngon par ston mod kyi/_yang dag par na sems la ni nga rgyal med de/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang bcas 
[\[180a.5\]]pa zang zing dang longs spyod med pa na/_slong ba mang yang zhen pa'i sems med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba na sangs rgyas kyi yon tan shes pas sems can gyi phyir gang sangs 
[\[180a.6\]]rgyas med pa'i gnas su mtha' 'khob tu skye ba'i lus len pa ni dmus long ngam/_'on pa'am/_lkugs pa'am/_zha bo lta bu'i lus myong bar byed de/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi 
[\[180a.7\]]nyes pa'i skyon ci dang ci yod pa shin tu rtogs pas rnam par bsgral ba'i phyir de dag dang 'thun par spyod de/_de ltar yid 'thun par spyod kyang nyes pa'i dri mas mi gos te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]sems can gyi mtshan nyid kyang med/_nyon mongs pa'i 'go ba yang med/_lam la nan tan byed pa yang med/_nyon mongs pa spong ba yang med/_byang chub la nan tan byed mod kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa yang med/_byang chub kyi spyod pa lhun gyis grub pa yang med/_
[\[180b.2\]]sdug bsngal myong ba yang med/_sdug bsngal bcom pa yang med par shes shing rtog mod kyi 'on kyang sems can gyi phyir sdug bsngal yang bcom byang chub kyi spyad pa yang spyod de/_de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems 
[\[180b.3\]]dpas lus nang gi tha ma dga' ldan gnam du skyes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dga' ldan gnam ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnas mchog yin no/_/gnam gyi rim pa 'og ma'i lha ni bag med par spyod do/_/gnam gyi rim 
[\[180b.4\]]pa gong ma'i lha rnams ni dbang po brtul bas na dga' ldan gnam gyi lha ni mchog ces bya'o/_/sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims spyod pas ni gnam gong ma dang /_'og mar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas ni dga' ldan 
[\[180b.5\]]gnam gyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni srid pa la yongs su smod de/_srid pa bcom nas dga' ldan gnam gyi lha'i las mi byed kyang dga' ldan gnam gyi lhar skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpas gal te srid pa gzhan du skyes 
[\[180b.6\]]kyang sems can gyi don byed par 'gyur te/_yang dag par 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba'i sems med kyang 'dod pa'i khams su skye ste/_de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gnam gyi lhar skyes pa ni dngos po 'di 
[\[180b.7\]]gsum gyis mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/gang zhe na/_'tsho ba'i tshe dang /_gzugs byad dang /_grags pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par 'tsho ba'i tshe dang /_gzugs byad dang /_grags pa la re ba med kyang gzhan pas mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mos pas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis kyang mchog tu 'gyur te/_de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dngos po gsum gyis 
[\[181a.2\]]lha rnams las mchog tu gyur kyang lha'i sras po rnams byang chub sems dpa' de la zhe sdang gi sems dang /_phrag dog gi sems dang /_nga rgyal gyi sems mi skye'i/_rtag tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang lha rnams la yang nga rgyal mi byed pas 
[\[181a.3\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'tsho ba'i tshe las ma byas kyang /_lha de dag gi nang na tshe'i tshad mthar phyin pas 'tsho ba'i tshe mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/gzugs byad kyi las ma byas kyang gzugs byad dam pa'i lus su 
[\[181a.4\]]gyur te/_'od zer kun du gsal bas gzugs mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i pho brang na gnas kyang 'dod pa lnga la ma chags te/_chos kyi bya ba 'ba' zhig byed pas grags pa phyogs bcur grags te/_de bas na 
[\[181a.5\]]grags pa mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gnam nas babs pa na sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems 
[\[181a.6\]]dpa' gnam las babs pa na 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs yod pa'i khams kyi lha thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te bskyal nas skad chen po phyung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' la shin tu bstod pas/_de dag gi kha'i dbugs kyi shugs kyis sa yang g.yos par 
[\[181a.7\]]gyur to/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mi'i nang na khyu mchog gi rgyal po lta bu'o/_/mi'i nang na khyu mchog gi rgyal po ni klu'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po thog ma mngal du 'jug pa na klu'i rgyal po kha cig sa'i 'og na gnas pa la la ni 'jigs/_la la ni 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]dga' bas sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/_de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngal du 'jug pa'i dus dang /_gnas pa'i dus dang /_'byung ba'i dus kyang shes/_pha dang /_ma yongs su 
[\[181b.2\]]gtsang zhing cis kyang ma gos par shes pa ni brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug gi skra'am/_nor bu rin po che sngon po lta bur shes te/_de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde yang de dang 'dra ste/_bsam gyis 
[\[181b.3\]]mi khyab bo/_/rigs kyi bu dper na rgya mtsho chen po la ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa brgyad yod do/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_rim gyis gzhol ba dang /_zab cing gting ring ba dang /_gcig tu lan tshwa'i ro bro ba dang /_dbres kyi mtshams las mi 'da' ba dang /_rin 
[\[181b.4\]]po che mang ba dang /_sems can mang po'i gnas su gyur pa dang /_ro zhag tu mi gnas pa dang /_'bab chu thams cad dang sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin kyang mi 'phel mi 'grib pa dang brgyad do/_/rigs kyi bu rim gyis gzhol ba la dngos po rnam pa gsum ste/_
[\[181b.5\]]gsum gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi shugs dang /_rlung phyogs su 'gro ba dang /_chu klung 'bab pa'i phyir ro/_/mi 'phel mi 'grib pa'i bar la yang rnam pa gsum gsum yod do/_/de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde la 
[\[181b.6\]]yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa brgyad yod do/_/gang zhe na rim gyis gzhol ba ste/_tshul khrims lnga dang /_tshul khrims bcu dang /_tshul khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_
[\[181b.7\]]lan cig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu'i bar du 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di las bstan cing gsungs pas/_chos 'di dag ni rim gyis gzhol ba zhes bya ste/_de bas na mdo sde 'di ni rim gyis gzhol ba zhes bya ba yin zab cing gting ring ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni ma 
[\[182a.2\]]skyes pa mi 'gog pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes pa yang med/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang med/_bsod snyoms bzhes pa yang med/_sbyin pa byas pa yang med de/_de bas na rtag pa dang bde ba dang bdag dang yongs su dag 
[\[182a.3\]]pa ste/_sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gzugs ma yin/_gzugs las gzhan ma yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ma yin pa nas/_rnam par shes 
[\[182a.4\]]pa'i bar du gzhan pa ma yin te/_rtag pa bltar rung ba/_gsal ba'i rgyu byas pa'i rgyu ma yin pa/_rgyun du zhugs pa nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa yang nyon mongs pa yang med/_gnas kyang med de/_nyon 
[\[182a.5\]]mongs pa med kyang rtag pa zhes mi bya ste/_de bas na zab pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang shin tu zab pa ni mdo sde 'di las bar bar ni bdag yod ces 'chad/_bar bar ni bdag med ces kyang 'chad/_bar bar ni rtag ces 'chad/_bar bar ni mi rtag ces 'chad/_bar 
[\[182a.6\]]bar ni yongs su dag pa'o zhes 'chad/_bar bar ni yongs su ma dag pa'o zhes 'chad/_bar bar ni bde'o zhes 'chad/_bar bar ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes 'chad/_bar bar ni stong pa'o zhes 'chad/_bar bar ni stong pa ma yin no zhes 'chad/_bar bar ni thams 
[\[182a.7\]]cad yod do zhes 'chad/_bar bar ni thams cad med do zhes 'chad/_bar bar ni theg pa gsum du 'chad/_bar bar ni theg pa gcig tu 'chad/_bar bar ni phung po lnga nyid sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yin te/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_lam dbu ma dang dpa' 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis dang /_don dam pa'i stong pa nyid dang /_byams pa dang snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_sems can thams cad la spyi bo'i ye shes dang /_dad pa'i sems dang /_
[\[182b.2\]]dbang po dang /_stobs shes pa dang /_chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod mod kyi nges par ma gsungs pas na zab pa zhes bya ba yin/_thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la 'thun 
[\[182b.3\]]par sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod de/_theg pa gcig par 'thun pa dang /_rnam par grol bar gcig par 'thun pa dang /_rgyu gcig pa dang /_'bras bu gcig pa dang /_zil dngar gcig par 'thun pa ste/_thams cad kyis rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_
[\[182b.4\]]bdag dang yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur bas na/_ro gcig pa zhes bya ba yin/_dbres kyi mtshams las mi 'da' ba ni mdo sde 'di las dge slong dag ma brtags pa'i dngos po brgyad mi bcang bar khrims bcas pa las/_nga'i nye gnas su gyur pa gang 
[\[182b.5\]]zhig 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_'don tam/_yi ger bris sam/_dgrol zhing bshad na lus dang srog gi bar du yal yang tshul khrims nyams par/_mi byed de/_de ni dbres kyi mtshams 
[\[182b.6\]]las mi 'da' ba zhes bya ba yin/_rin po che rnam pa mang po ni mdo sde 'di nyid rin po che tshad med pa'i gter yin no/_/gter zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga 
[\[182b.7\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang /_bus pa chung ngu'i spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i spyod pa dang /_tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang /_lha'i spyod pa dang /_dge ba mang po'i thabs dang /_sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang /_
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang /_nyan thos kyi yon tan dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa dang /_ye shes dang shes rab tshad med pa ni rin po 
[\[183a.2\]]che'i gter zhes bya ba yin/_sems can chen po'i gnas zhes bya ba sems can chen po ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ste/_ye shes dang shes rab che ba'i phyir sems can chen po zhes bya'o/_/lus che ba'i phyir sems che ba yin te sems che ba'i phyir/_bkod 
[\[183a.3\]]pa che ba'i phyir/_gdul ba che ba'i phyir/_thabs mkhas pa che ba'i phyir/_chos brjod pa che ba'i phyir/_mthu stobs che ba'i phyir/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor che ba'i phyir/_rdzu 'phrul che ba'i phyir/_byams pa dang /_snying rje che ba'i phyir/_rtag tu mi 'gyur ba'i 
[\[183a.4\]]phyir/_sems can thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i phyir/_sems can thams cad shong ba'i phyir de bas na sems can chen po'i gnas zhes bya ba yin/_ro dang mi gnas pa zhes bya ba ro ni log sred can dang /_phas pham pa bzhi nyams pa dang /_mtshams 
[\[183a.5\]]med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba byas pa dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde la skur pa dang /_chos ma yin pa la chos su bshad pa dang /_chos la chos ma yin par bshad pa dang /_ma brtags pa'i dngos po brgyad 'chang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dkor dang /_dge 'dun gyi nor la 
[\[183a.6\]]yid bzhin du thugs thub tu spyod pa dang /_dge slong dang dge slong ma la chos ma yin par spyod pa ni shi ba'i ro zhes bya ba yin te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di yang de lta bu'i dngos po mang po dang /_yongs su bral bas shi ba'i ro dang mi 'grogs pa 
[\[183a.7\]]zhes bya ba yin/_mi 'phel mi 'grib pa zhes bya ba ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir/_gzugs ma yin pa'i phyir/_bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir/_rtag tu gnas pa'i phyir/_mi skye mi 'gog pa'i phyir/_sems can thams cad la mnyam 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]snyoms pa'i phyir/_thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mtshan gcig tu 'thun pa'i phyir mi 'phel mi 'grib pa yin te/_de bas na mdo sde 'di ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa brgyad dang ldan no/_/seng ge sgras gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de 
[\[183b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa la mi skye mi 'gog pa'i phyir zab pa zhes bgyi na/_so so'i skye bo thams cad la skye gnas rnam pa bzhi ste/_sgo nga las skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang /_mngal nas skyes pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa'o/_/skye gnas rnam pa bzhi 
[\[183b.3\]]ni mi'i nang na yang rdzogs par mchis so/_/dper na dge slong shing sA la dang /_u pa shi pa la dang /_khyim bdag ni ka la'i ma dang /_khyim bdag ni ku ta'i ma dang /_khyim bdag phan sha la'i ma la sogs pa de dag la so so nas bu lnga brgya lnga brgya mchis te/_thams 
[\[183b.4\]]cad sgo nga gcig gi nang nas skyes te/_de bas na mi la yang sgo nga las skyes pa mchis so/_/drod gsher las skyes pa ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa na/_rgyal po spyi bo skyes zhes bgyi bar gyur pa dang /_
[\[183b.5\]]rgyal po lag nas skyes zhes bgyi bar gyur pa dang da ltar gsungs pa bu mo a mra'i shing dang /_bu mo ka byi ta'i shing zhes bgyi ba mchis pas na mi'i nang na drod gsher las skyes pa yang mchis so/_/thog ma bskal pa chags pa na sems can thams cad rdzus te skyes pa 
[\[183b.6\]]na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dbang du gyur pa brgyad dang ldan pa lags na/_ci'i slad du rdzus te ma skyes/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad ni skye ba rnam pa bzhis skye ste/_'phags pa'i chos thos nas sngon ltar sgo 
[\[183b.7\]]nga las skye ba dang /_drod gsher las skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu bskal pa thog ma chags pa na sems can thams cad rdzus te skyes kyang de'i tshe na sangs rgyas 'jig rten du ma gshegs so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te sems can dag nad kyis btab na sman pa dang sman 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]dgos so/_/bskal pa thog ma chags pa na sems can thams cad rdzus te skyes pas nyon mongs pa dang bcas mod kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad ma langs pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du ma gshegs so/_/rigs kyi bu bskal pa thog ma 
[\[184a.2\]]chags pa'i sems can ni/_lus dang /_sems snod du ma gyur pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du ma gshegs so/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdung rigs dang /_'khor dang pha ma ni mchog tu gyur pas chos gsung ba 
[\[184a.3\]]thams cad kyis yid ches te/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzus te mi skye'o/_/rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad ni bu'i las kyang pha byed la/_pha'i las kyang bu byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gal te rdzus te skyes na pha ma med par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[184a.4\]]pha ma med na so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi dge ba'i las mang po yang ji ltar mdzad par 'gyur/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzus te mi skye'o/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos la srung ba rnam pa gnyis te/_nang dang phyi rol lo/_/nang gi 
[\[184a.5\]]srung ba ni tshul khrims so/_/phyi rol gyi srung ba ni gnyen bshes dang 'khor ro/_/gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzus te skyes na phyi rol gyi srung ba med par 'gyur te/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzus te skye ba'i sku ni mi 'dod do/_/rigs kyi bu skye 
[\[184a.6\]]bo kha cig ni cho rigs bsnyems pas nga rgyal skye'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas de dag gi nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir cho rigs btsun par skyes kyi rdzus te skye ba'i sku mi 'dod do/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par pha dang ma yod de/_pha ni 
[\[184a.7\]]zas gtsang ma zhes bya/_ma ni lha mdzes zhes bya ste/_'on kyang sems can de dag ni sgyu ma yin no zhes brjod na/_ji ltar rdzus te skye ba'i sku 'dod par bya/_gal te rdzus te skye ba'i sku blangs na ring bsrel mang po ci las 'byung bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]sems can la phan pa'i don du ring bsrel phra mor gses nas thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur bar byed do/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas rdzus te skye ba'i sku mi 'dod do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rdzus te skye ba'i sku mi 'dod na/_ci'i phyir nga 
[\[184b.2\]]'ba' zhig rdzus te skye ba'i sku blang bar bya/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge sgras thal mo sbyar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/de bzhin gshegs ni yon tan tshad med 
[\[184b.3\]]phung po ste/_/bdag gis de dag rgyas par brjod par mi nus kyang /_/so so'i skye bo'i slad du phyogs tsam brjod par bgyi/_/thugs brtse'i slad du bdag gis brjod pa gsan du gsol/_/so so'i skye bo ma rig mun par 'gro ba dag_/sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnam pa mang po 
[\[184b.4\]]myong bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang bral bar mdzad pas na/_/'jig rten kun du thugs rje chen po zhes kyang grags/_/so so'i skye bo 'khor ba'i rgyu la 'khor bas na/_/bag med yongs su bslad pas bde ba med par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba 
[\[184b.5\]]yongs su byin pas na/_/'khor bas 'khor ba'i rgyud ni yongs su bcad par gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs ni bde ba kun la byin pas na/_/bdag gis bde ba gang la'ang ma chags mi mos so/_/so so'i skye bo'i slad du dka' ba kun spyad de/_/de bas 'jig rten bcas pa kun 
[\[184b.6\]]gyis mchod par gyur/_/pha rol sdug bsngal myong ba gzigs na sku 'dar te/_/sems can dmyal bar zhugs kyang sdug bsngal tshor ba med/_/sems can slad du sdug bsngal chen po myong mdzad de/_/de bas kun las rgyal te dpag pa'i tshad ma mchis/_/de bzhin 
[\[184b.7\]]gshegs pas sems can slad du dka' ba spyad/_/pha rol phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/thugs ni log pa'i rlung la gnas kyang mi g.yo ste/_de bas shin tu rgyal ba'i 'jig rten skyes bu'o/_/so so'i skye bo dag ni bde ba kun 'dod kyang /_/bde bar gyur 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]pa'i rgyu ni gang lags mi shes te/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bstan nas sgom par gyur pas na/_/ji ltar bu gcig pa la pha mas byams pa bzhin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can nyon mongs nad gzigs nas/_/sdug bsngal ba ni na ba'i bu la 
[\[185a.2\]]ma bzhin te/_/rtag tu nyon mongs nad spong ba yi thabs dgongs pas/_/de bas lus 'di gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa yin/_/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal mang po kun spyod kyang /_/phyin ci log gi sems kyis de la bde bar 'dzin/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[185a.3\]]pas bde dang sdug bsngal bden gsungs te/_/de bas kun du thugs rje chen po zhes grags so/_/'jig rten thams cad ma rig sgo nga la gnas kyang /_/brtol zhing gzhom par gyur pa'i ye shes mchu med pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mchu yis kun bcom 
[\[185a.4\]]ste/_/de bas mchog tu 'gyur ba'i sras kyi thu bo'o/_/'jig rten gsum gyis yongs su ma bzung ma bsdus pas/_/ming yang med de [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]btags pa'i tha snyad med/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i don mdzad rtogs pas na/_/bcom ldan 'das ni blo gros
