[\[247a.4\]]nam mkha' med pa'i phyir 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar ma yin no/_/ri bong gi rwa dang yang 'dra bar med pa'i rdzas yin pas 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar ma yin te/_de bas na sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rtag pa'i phyir dus gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no/_/nam 
[\[247a.5\]]mkha' ni med pa'i phyir dus gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu nga ni 'jig rten dang mi rtsod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mkhas pa shes rab can gyis yod par smra na nga yang yod par gsung ngo /_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis med par smra na nga yang med par gsung ngo /_/
[\[247a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/_'jig rten dang mi rtsod cing 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi gos par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[247a.7\]]dpa' chen po chos bcu dang ldan na/_'jig rten dang mi rtsod cing 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi gos par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar dad pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang /_nang du yid la byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_yang dag pa'i 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang ldan pa dang /_dam pa'i chos la mos pa dang /_sems can la snying brtse ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dang ldan na 'jig rten pa dang mi rtsod de/_u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar 'jig rten gyi chos 
[\[247b.2\]]kyis mi gos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar/_'jig rten gyi mkhas pa shes rab can gyis yod par smra na/_nga yang yod par gsung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi mkhas pa shes rab can gyis med par smra na/_
[\[247b.3\]]nga yang med par gsung ngo zhes gsungs pa de/_ji ltar na 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa shes rab can gyis yod pa dang med par smra ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa shes rab can gyis gzugs la mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[247b.4\]]ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa yin no zhes smra ba nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du smra na/_rigs kyi bu de ni 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa shes rab can gyis yod par smra ba yin te/_nga yang yod par gsung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa shes rab can gyis gzugs la 
[\[247b.5\]]rtag pa med pa dang /_bde ba med pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_yongs su dag pa med pa'o zhes smra ba nas/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bar smra na/_rigs kyi bu de ni 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa shes rab can gyis med par smra ba yin te/_
[\[247b.6\]]nga yang med par gsung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa shes rab can ni sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa thams cad lags so/_/gal te 'phags pa rnams kyis gzugs mi rtag pa dang /_
[\[247b.7\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa lags na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku ni rtag pa ther zug mi 'gyur ba'o zhes gsungs/_'jig rten gyi mkhas pa shes rab can ni chos thams cad med pa'o zhes 'chad na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]yod par gsungs/_de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs na/_ji ltar 'jig rten dang mi rtsod cing 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi gos pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di ltar 'du shes log pa dang /_sems log pa dang /_lta ba log pa dang /_'di 
[\[248a.2\]]gsum yongs su spangs pas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs ni yang dag par mi rtag pa yin no zhes gsungs la/_nga yang 'di ltar rtag go zhes gsungs na/_ji ltar phyin ci log spangs shing 'jig rten dang mi rtsod pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu bus pa ma rabs kyi 
[\[248a.3\]]gzugs ni nyon mongs pa las skye bas/_de'i phyir mkhas pa shes rab can gyis gzugs ni mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med do zhes bshad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs ni nyon mongs pa dang yongs su bral bas de'i phyir rtag pa ther zug mi 'gyur mi 
[\[248a.4\]]'pho ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs nyon mongs pa las skye bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa la rnam pa gsum ste/_'di ltar 'dod pa'i zag pa dang /_srid 
[\[248a.5\]]pa'i zag pa dang /_ma rig pa'i zag pa'o/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis zag pa gsum gyi skyon rnams shin tu rtogs par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyes pa'i skyon shes nas spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dper na sman pas sngar nad pa'i rtsa bltas te/_nad kyi rgyu shes nas gdod sman gtong ba dang 
[\[248a.6\]]'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na dmus long zhig khrid de/_tsher ma g.yon can gyi tshal gyi nang du bor nas phyir log na dmus long de 'byung bar shin tu dka'o/_/ji ste byung bar gyur na yang lus thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar 'jig rten gyi bus pa ma rabs kyang de dang mtshungs te/_zag pa 
[\[248a.7\]]gsum gyi nyes pa'i skyon mi mthong mi shes pas phyi bzhin 'brang ngo /_/gang mthong ba ni spong bar byed de nyes pa'i skyon shes nas 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang yang zhing chung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang zag la rnam pa bzhi ste/_gcig ni las byed pa'i tshe lci la/_rnam par smin pa myong ba'i tshe yang 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]ba'o/_/gcig ni las byed pa'i tshe yang la/_rnam par smin pa myong ba'i tshe lci ba'o/_/yang gcig ni las byed pa'i tshe yang lci la/_rnam par smin pa len pa'i tshe yang lci ba'o/_/yang gcig ni las byed pa'i tshe yang yang la/_rnam par smin pa'i tshe yang yang ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang nyon mongs pa'i skyon 
[\[248b.2\]]rtogs pa ni las byas pa dang 'bras bu smin pa gnyis ka yang yang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis 'di snyam du bdag gis de lta bu'i zag pa de dag spang ngo /_/sdig pa mi dge ba'i dngos po de dag kyang mi bya'o snyam sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag da dung sems can dmyal ba dang /_
[\[248b.3\]]byol song gi skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha dang /_mi'i rnam par smin pa las ma thar te/_gal te bdag gis spyod pa la nan tan byas na de'i mthus sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcom par 'gyur ro zhes des de ltar brtags nas/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyam dma' 
[\[248b.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyam dma' bar 'gyur bar mthong nas/_sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te/_yang 'di snyam du deng bdag 'di ltar gyur pa yang nan tan du spyod pa'i mthus bdag ni mi dge ba'i chos dang bral te/_dge ba'i chos dang bsnyen par gyur to/_/
[\[248b.5\]]de bas na yang dag pa'i lam mngon sum du mthong bar gyur gyis brtson 'grus bskyed de bsgom mo snyam sems so/_/des der brtson par bsgom pa'i mthus mi dge ba'i nyon mongs pa tshad med pa snyed dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_mi dang 
[\[248b.6\]]lha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa spong bar 'gyur te/_de bas na ngas mdo sde las srid pa'i zag pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_srid pa'i zag pa'i rgyu la brtag par bya'o zhes gsungs so//_//'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo bam po bzhi bcu dgu pa/_de ci'i phyir 
[\[248b.7\]]zhe na/_mkhas pa shes rab can dag gis gal te zag pa la rtog cing zag pa'i rgyu ma brtags na/_nyon mongs pa thams cad chod par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mkhas pa shes rab can dag gis zag pa ni rgyu de las skye bar 'gyur ro snyam rtogs nas bdag gis rgyu de yongs su bcad 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]na zag pa mi skye bar 'gyur ro snyam rtog go/_/rigs kyi bu de yang ji ltar sman pas nad kyi rgyu yongs su bcad na nad skye bar mi 'gyur ba ltar mkhas pa shes rab can dag gis sngar nyon mongs pa'i rgyu bcad pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_mkhas pa shes rab can ni sngar rgyu rtog ste/_de'i 'og tu 'bras bu 
[\[249a.2\]]rtog go/_/dge ba'i rgyu las dge ba'i 'bras bu skye ba dang /_mi dge ba'i rgyu las mi dge ba'i 'bras bu skye bar shin tu rtogs so/_/'bras bu rtogs nas mi dge ba'i rgyu spong bar byed do/_/de ltar 'bras bu brtags nas rim gyis nyon mongs pa srab pa dang stug po rtog go/_/srab pa dang stug po brtags 
[\[249a.3\]]nas sngar stug po spong ngo /_/de ltar stug po spangs nas srab mo yang rang med par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can dag gis de ltar nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_nyon mongs pa srab pa dang /_stug po shes nas des de'i tshe nyon mongs pa 
[\[249a.4\]]de dag dgag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi lam la mi sdod/_mi 'gyod par rab tu brtson zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten te/_sems rtse gcig tu chos nyan no/_/rigs kyi bu dper na nad pa zhig bdag gi nad yang zhing gdon mi za bar 'tsho bar shes nas sman kha ba rnyed kyang 'gyod pa med par 'thung 
[\[249a.5\]]ba ltar mkhas pa shes rab can dag kyang de dang 'dra ste/_'phags pa'i lam la rab tu brtson par mos shing mya ngan mi byed rgyun mi 'chad de 'gyod par mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gang nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa 
[\[249a.6\]]srab mo dang stug po shes nas nyon mongs pa de dag bsal ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam sgom pa la rab tu brtson te/_des ni nyon mongs pa las gzugs skye ba ma yin pa nas/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o/_/gal te gang nyon 
[\[249a.7\]]mongs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa srab mo dang /_stug po mi shes shing 'phags pa'i lam la mi brtson pa de ni nyon mongs pa las gzugs skye ba ma yin pa nas tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]shes pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa srab mo dang /_stug po shes shing nyon mongs pa bcad pa'i phyir/_byang chub la nan tan byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin te/_
[\[249b.2\]]de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs ni rtag pa ste/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du rtag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa srab mo dang stug po mi shes shing /_byang chub la nan tan mi byed 
[\[249b.3\]]pa ni bus pa ma rabs so so'i skye bo ste/_de bas na bus pa ma rabs so so'i skye bo'i gzugs mi rtag pa nas tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang mi rtag go/_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa shes rab can dang /_'phags pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[249b.4\]]dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang don de ltar gnyis su bshad de/_nga yang de ltar gnyis su gsung ngo /_/de bas na ngas bshad pa ni 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa dang nga mi rtsod de/_'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi gos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[249b.5\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa zag pa rnam pa gsum gsungs pa la ji ltar na 'dod pa'i zag pa dang /_sred pa'i zag pa dang /_ma rig pa'i zag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa'i zag pa zhes 
[\[249b.6\]]bya ba ni nang gi mi dge bar rnam par rtog pa dang /_phyi rol gyi rkyen gyis bskyod pas 'dod pa'i zag pa skye bar 'gyur te/_de bas na ngas sngon grong khyer rgyal po'i khab na dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dga' bo khyod bu mo 'dis smras pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di zung shig_/tshigs su 
[\[249b.7\]]bcad pa 'di ni sngon 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa yin no/_/de bas na nang gi mi dge bar rnam par rtog pa dang /_phyi rol gyi rkyen rnams ni 'dod pa zhes bya ste/_de ni 'dod pa'i zag pa'o/_/de la sred pa'i zag pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]nang gi mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang /_phyi rol gyi rgyu rkyen rnams te/_'dod pa'i khams kyi phyi rol gyi rkyen rnams dang /_nang gi mi dge bar rnam par rtog pa ma gtogs pa de dag ni srid pa'i zag pa'o/_/ma rig pa'i zag pa ni bdag dang bdag gi ba mi shes shing /_nang dang phyi rol gyi bye brag 
[\[250a.2\]]mi phyed pa ni ma rig pa'i zag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu ma rig pa ni zag pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thams cad ni ma rig pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis phung po dang /_skye mched dang khams la 'du shes shing /_'du shes 'jog pas sems can zhes bya ste/_de ni 'du shes log pa dang /_
[\[250a.3\]]bsam pa log pa dang /_lta ba log pa ste/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis zag pa thams cad bskyed do/_/de bas na ngas mdo sde sde bcu gnyis las/_ma rig pa ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi rgyu yin no zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[250a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pas sngon mdo sde sde bcu gnyis las mi dge bar rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug skye'o zhes gsungs na/_de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa las skyes so zhes gsungs/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ltar chos de gnyis ni gcig 
[\[250a.5\]]gi rgyu gcig yin la/_gcig gi 'bras bu gcig ste/_gcig gis gcig bskyed do/_/mi dge bar rnam par rtog pas ma rig pa bskyed do/_/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis mi dge ba'i rtog pa skye'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang nyon mongs pa rnams bskyed pa ni kun kyang nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/_de ltar nyon mongs 
[\[250a.6\]]pa'i rgyu dang nye ba'i rgyu ni ma rig pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ste/_ji ltar 'bras bu las myu gu skye ba bzhin du 'bras bu ni nye ba'i rgyu'o/_/chen po bzhi ni ring ba'i rgyur gyur pa ltar nyon mongs pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[250a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar na/_ma rig pa nyid zag pa'o zhes gsungs na/_ci'i slad du ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis zag pa rnams skye'o zhes gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar ngas ma rig pa nyid zag par gsungs pa ni nang gi ma rig 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]pa'o/_/ma rig pa'i rgyu las zag pa rnams skye ba ni nang dang phyi rol gyi rgyu'o/_/gang ma rig pa nyid zag par 'chad pa ni nang gi phyin ci log pa zhes bya ste/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa mi shes pa'o/_/gang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rgyur 'chad pa ni phyi rol gyi bdag 
[\[250b.2\]]dang /_bdag gi ba mi shes pa'o/_/gang ma rig pa nyid zag par 'chad pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar zhe na ma rig pa las phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams la sogs pa skye ba'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[250b.3\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar mkhas pa shes rab can gyis zag pa'i rgyu shes so/_/zhes bgyi ba ji ltar na zag pa'i rgyu shes pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can ni 'di ltar rtog go/_/ci'i rgyu ci'i 
[\[250b.4\]]rkyen las nyon mongs pa 'di skye bar 'gyur/_las ci zhig byas pa las nyon mongs pa 'di skye bar 'gyur/_gang gi tshe na nyon mongs pa 'di skye bar 'gyur/_su dang lhan cig tu gnas pa'i tshe na nyon mongs pa 'di skye bar 'gyur/_gang na gnas pa na nyon mongs pa 'di skye bar 'gyur/_dngos po ci la 
[\[250b.5\]]brtags pas nyon mongs pa 'di skye bar 'gyur/_su'i gnas khang dang /_mal cha dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gos dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman la sogs pa bslangs pas nyon mongs pa 'di skye bar 'gyur/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis tha ma las 'bring du 'gyur/_'bring las rab tu 'gyur/_las tha ma 
[\[250b.6\]]las 'bring du 'gyur/_las 'bring las rab tu gyur snyam yongs su rtog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rtog pa dang /_skye ba'i zag pa'i rgyu dang /_rkyen yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rtogs pa na nyon mongs pa ma skyes pa ni bkag nas skye bar mi byed/_nyon 
[\[250b.7\]]mongs pa skyes pa ni thabs kyis 'gag par byed de/_de bas na ngas mdo sde las mkhas pa shes rab can gyis nyon mongs pa skye ba'i rgyu brtag par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]sems can gyi lus gcig las nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dper na snod gcig gi nang na sa bon sna tshogs yod na/_chu'am char pa dang phrad nas so sor skye ba ltar sems can yang de dang 'dra ste/_snod gcig mod 
[\[251a.2\]]kyi sred pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ji ltar 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[251a.3\]]mkhas pa shes rab can ni 'di ltar zag pa rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar 'gyur la/_zag pa med pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis lha dang mi'i lus thob ste/_de dag kyang mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag 
[\[251a.4\]]med pa yin no/_/lus kyi snod 'di las sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum dang /_mi rtag pa rnam pa gsum thob ste/_zag pa 'di'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis sems can rnams mtshams med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba byed cing ngan song gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod cing rtsa ba bzhi 'jig pa 
[\[251a.5\]]dang /_dkon mchog gsum la skur par 'gyur ro zhes yongs su rtog go/_/mkhas pa shes rab can ni 'di ltar bdag gi lus thob pa 'dis nyon mongs pa bskyed de/_ngan song gi 'bras bu rnams len pa'i mi rigs so snyam yongs su rtog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[251a.6\]]'das zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu yang mchis zhes kyang gsungs la/_mkhas pa shes rab can gyis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnams yongs su gcod do zhes kyang gsungs na/_zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bcad pa la gtogs sam/_byang chub thob pa rnams la zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu mchis 
[\[251a.7\]]pas mkhas pa shes rab can gyis zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu tshol na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhas pa shes rab can rnams kyis rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu gcad par bya'o zhes gsungs/_de ltar gcad pa zhig lags na da ltar gyi 'phags pa rnams mchis zhes bgyir rung ngam/_bka' 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ched 'ga' ni rgyu la 'bras bur gsungs/_ched 'ga' ni 'bras bu la rgyur gsungs te/_ji ltar 'jig rten pas 'jim pa nyid rdza ma'o/_/skud pa nyid gos so zhes zer ba dang mtshungs te/_de ni rgyu la 'bras bur bshad pa'o/_/'bras bu la rgyur bshad pa ni 
[\[251b.2\]]ba lang nyid chu dang rtswa ste/_mi yang zas yin no zhes bshad pa lta bu'o/_/ngas kyang de ltar rgyu la 'bras bur bshad de/_sngar mdo sde las 'di skad du/_ngas lus dang sems kyis tshangs pa'i gnas su 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni rgyu la 'bras bur bshad pa'o/_/'bras bu la rgyur bshad pa ni skye mched drug po 'di 
[\[251b.3\]]nyid sngon gyi las yin no zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu la rgyur bshad pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa thams cad la yang dag par na zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu med de/_'phags pa thams cad kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu zag pa mi skye ste/_de bas na zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o/_/rigs 
[\[251b.4\]]kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar rtog pa na nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bcad pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam bsgom mo/_/de la 'phags pa'i lam ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[251b.5\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'o/_/'phags pa'i lam de dag bsgoms na/_nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni nyon mongs 
[\[251b.6\]]pa las 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_nyon mongs pa ni mi dge ba'o/_/mi dge ba'i nyon mongs pa las nyon mongs pa skye ba yang mi dge ba zhes bya ste/_de ltar nyon mongs pa de la rgyu dang 'bras bu ste/_rnam pa gnyis yod do/_/rgyu mi dge ba'i phyir 'bras bu mi dge ba la/_'bras bu mi dge ba'i phyir 
[\[251b.7\]]sa bon mi dge ste/_ji ltar nim pa zhes bya ba 'bras bu kha ba'i phyir sa bon dang /_me tog dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma la sogs pa thams cad kha'o/_/ji ltar dug gi sdong po sa bon gdug pas 'bras bu yang gdug pa bzhin du/_rgyu yang sems can lags la/_'bras bu yang sems can lags te/_
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]rgyu yang nyon mongs pa lags la/_'bras bu yang nyon mongs pa lags te/_nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid sems can lags la/_sems can nyid kyang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu lags te/_de lta bu lags na/_ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas ri kha ba can la rtswa gdug pa dang /_sman 
[\[252a.2\]]gyi rgyal po dam pa yang mchis so zhes gsungs/_gal te nyon mongs pa nyid sems can lags la/_sems can nyid nyon mongs pa lags na ci'i slad du sems can gyi lus la sman gyi rgyal po dam pa mchis so zhes gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[252a.3\]]sems can tshad med pa snyed kyang de ltar the tshom za ste/_khyod kyis the tshom bsal bar gsol na/_ngas kyang gcod nus kyis shin tu yid la byas te brtags par nyon cig dang /_rab tu phye ste dgrol bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu ri kha ba can zhes bya ba ni sems can lta bu'o/_/rtswa gdug pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa lta 
[\[252a.4\]]bu'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po dam pa zhes bya ba ni tshangs par spyad pa lta bu ste/_rigs kyi bu sems can gang de ltar tshangs par spyod pa ni lus la sman gyi rgyal po dam pa yod pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can la tshangs par spyod pa mchis zhes bgyi 
[\[252a.5\]]ba ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar 'jig rten na sa bon las 'bras bu skye'o 'bras bu de la kha cig ni sa bon dang rgyur 'gyur ba yang yod la/_mi 'gyur ba yang yod de/_gang sa bon gyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni 'bras bu dang sa bon zhes bya'o/_/gang mi 'gyur ba ni 'bras bu zhes bya ste/_sa bon zhes mi bya 
[\[252a.6\]]ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar rgyu rnam pa gnyis te/_gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu kha cig nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu kha cig nyon mongs pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ba ste/_gang nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu yin la/_nyon mongs pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ba de 
[\[252a.7\]]ni tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyis tshor ba ni zag pa thams cad kyi nye ba'i rgyu yin par rtogs shing shes so/_/'di lta ste/_nang dang phyi rol gyi zag pa'o/_/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis zag pa thams cad gcod par mi nus te/_khams gsum gyi btson ra las kyang thar bar 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]mi nus so/_/sems can rnams ni tshor ba'i rkyen gyis bdag dang bdag gi ba la chags pas sems phyin ci log dang /_'du shes phyin ci log dang /_lta ba phyin ci log pa skye bar 'gyur te/_de bas na sems can rnams kyis sngar tshor ba brtag go/_/de ltar tshor ba de ni sred pa thams cad kyi nye ba'i rgyur 
[\[252b.2\]]'gyur te/_de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis sred pa gcod par 'dod na/_sngar tshor ba brtag go/_/rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba byed pa thams cad ni tshor ba'i dus la byas te/_de bas na ngas dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[252b.3\]]to/_/dga' bo sems can thams cad kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba byed pa ni kun kyang tshor ba'i dus la byas te/_de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis thog ma tshor ba brtag go/_/tshor ba rtogs nas gzhan yang tshor ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen las skye ba brtag go/_/gal te rgyu dang rkyen las skyes na/_rgyu dang rkyen de 
[\[252b.4\]]nyid kyang ci las skyes/_gal te skye ba'i rgyu med na/_rgyu med pa las ci'i phyir tshor ba med pa ma skyes/_gzhan yang tshor ba 'di ni dbang phyug gi rgyu las ma skyes/_skyes bu las ma skyes/_rdul phra rab las ma skyes/_dus kyis skye ba ma yin/_'du shes las ma skyes/_rang bzhin las ma skyes/_bdag las 
[\[252b.5\]]ma skyes/_gzhan las ma skyes/_bdag dang gzhan las skye ba ma yin/_rgyu med pa las skye ba ma yin te/_tshor ba de ni rkyen tshogs pa las skye bar 'gyur te/_rgyu rkyen de ni sred pa'o/_/rkyen tshogs pa de la tshor ba yod pa ma yin/_med pa ma yin par rtogs te/_de bas na ngas rkyen tshogs pa bcad do/_/
[\[252b.6\]]rkyen tshogs pa bcad pa'i phyir tshor ba mi skye'o snyam rtog go/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis rgyu rtogs na/_'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog ste/_sems can rnams ni tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi lus myong ste/_
[\[252b.7\]]khams gsum na sdug bsngal tshad med pa snyed len to/_/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis mi rtag pa'i bde ba len to/_/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis bde ba'i rtsa ba gcod do/_/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur te/_de ltar rtog pa na tshor ba'i rkyen mi byed do/_/ji ltar na tshor ba'i rkyen mi 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]byed pa zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshor ba gang dag ni sred pa byed par 'gyur/_sred pa gang dag ni tshor ba byed par 'gyur ba rnam par 'byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang de ltar srid pa'i rgyu dang /_tshor ba'i rgyu rab tu rtogs na/_bdag dang bdag gi ba yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro/_/rigs 
[\[253a.2\]]kyi bu gang gis de ltar rab tu rtogs pa ni sred pa dang /_tshor ba gnyis gang nas gang du 'gog par rab tu rtogs te/_tshor ba dang sred pa cung zad 'gog pa'i gnas mthong bas mthar 'gog pa yang yod par rig nas/_de'i tshe rnam par grol ba la dad pa skye'o/_/dad pa'i sems bskyed nas rnam par 
[\[253a.3\]]grol ba'i gnas ci'i rgyu las thob par 'gyur snyam rtog ste/_de ni 'phags pa'i lam brgyad kyis thob par rig nas/_de nas rab tu sgom par byed do/_/ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam brgyad ce na/_lam des tshor ba la rtog pa na mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[253a.4\]]ma yin pa bde ba ma yin pa ste/_rnam pa de gsum car yang lus dang sems skyed par nus so/_/ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis skyed par 'gyur zhe na/_reg pa'i rkyen las so/_/reg pa de las yang rnam pa gsum mo/_/ma rig pa'i reg pa dang rig pa'i reg pa dang /_rig pa ma yin ma rig pa ma yin pa'i reg pa'o/_/de 
[\[253a.5\]]la rig pa'i reg pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam brgyad do/_/reg pa lhag ma gnyis ni lus dang sems dang /_tshor ba rnam pa gsum skyed pa ste/_de bas na ngas reg pa'i rgyu rnam pa gnyis gcad par bya'o/_/reg pa bcad na tshor ba rnam pa gsum yang mi skye'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar tshor ba de ni rgyu zhes 
[\[253a.6\]]kyang bya la/_'bras bu zhes kyang bya ste/_mkhas pa shes rab can gyis kyang rgyu dang 'bras bur rtog go/_/de ji ltar rgyu zhe na/_tshor ba'i rgyu las sred pa skye ba ni rgyu zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar 'bras bu zhe na/_reg pa las skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu zhes bya ste/_de bas na tshor ba 'di ni rgyu yang yin la 'bras bu yang yin 
[\[253a.7\]]no/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis tshor ba de la de ltar brtags nas rim gyis sred pa rtog ste/_tshor ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni sred pa zhes bya'o/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis sred pa rtog pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te/_zas sna tshogs dang /_zas med pa'o/_/de la zas sna tshogs kyi sred 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]pa ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_sred pa thams cad kyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/zas med pa'i sred pa ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_sred pa thams cad gcod par 'gyur te/_zag pa med pa'i las la sred cing chags so/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis kyang 
[\[253b.2\]]'di snyam du gal te/_bdag gis zas sna tshogs kyi sred pa bskyed na/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba gcod par mi nus te/_bdag gis zag pa med pa'i lam la chags kyang tshor ba'i rgyu ma bcad na/_zag pa med pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/_de bas na ngas reg 
[\[253b.3\]]pa gcad par bya'o snyam sems so/_/reg pa bcad nas tshor ba yang rang 'gog go/_/tshor ba 'gags nas sred pa yang yongs su 'gag go snyam sems te/_de ni 'phags pa'i lam brgyad ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gal te sems can gang de ltar rtogs na lus gdug pa dang bcas mod 
[\[253b.4\]]kyi/_de la sman gyi rgyal po dam pa yang yod de/_ji ltar ri kha ba can la rtswa gdug pa yod mod kyi sman dam pa yang yod pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa las 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thob mod kyi/_'bras bu rnam par smin pa de phyir nyon mongs pa'i rgyur mi 
[\[253b.5\]]'gyur bar byed de/_de ni tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis tshor ba dang /_sred pa gnyis ci'i rgyu las skye snyam brtags na/_'du shes kyi rgyu las skye bar shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can gyis gzugs mthong na yang 
[\[253b.6\]]'dod pa mi skye/_tshor ba rtogs pa'i tshe yang 'dod pa mi skye la/_gal te gzugs la phyin ci log tu 'du shes bskyed de/_gzugs la ni rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag par lta/_tshor ba la ni rtag pa/_mi 'gyur mi 'pho bar lta ba'o/_/de ltar 'du shes log 
[\[253b.7\]]pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug skye bar 'gyur te/_de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis 'du shes brtag par bya'o/_/de la 'du shes ji ltar brtag ce na/_'di snyam du sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i lam ma thob pas/_kun la 'du shes log pa yod do snyam 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]du sems so/_/ji ltar 'du shes log pa zhe na/_rtag pa ma yin pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_bde ba med pa la bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_ma dag pa la dag pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_stong pa'i chos la bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med 
[\[254a.2\]]dang /_chen po dang /_chung ngu dang /_nyin mtshan dang /_lo dang /_zla ba dang /_gos dang /_gnas khang dang /_mal cha ma yin pa la skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_mal cha'i bar du 'du shes bskyed pa'o/_/'du shes de yang rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang /_chen po dang /_mtha' 
[\[254a.3\]]med pa'o/_/de la chung ba'i rgyus ni 'du shes chung ngur bskyed/_che ba'i rgyus ni 'du shes chen por bskyed/_mtha' yas pa'i rgyus ni 'du shes mtha' yas par bskyed do/_/yang 'du shes chung ngu yod de/_'di ltar ting nge 'dzin du ma zhugs pa'o/_/'du shes chen po ni ting nge 'dzin du 
[\[254a.4\]]zhugs pa'o/_/yang mtha' yas pa'i 'du shes ni kun tu 'gro ba bcu'o/_/yang 'du shes chung ngu ni 'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i khams kyi 'du shes la sogs pa'o/_/yang 'du shes chen po ni gzugs kyi khams kyi 'du shes la sogs pa'o/_/yang mtha' yas pa'i 'du shes ni gzugs med 
[\[254a.5\]]pa'i khams kyi 'du shes la sogs pa ste/_'du shes rnam pa gsum 'gags na tshor ba yang rang 'gag go/_/'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gags pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[254a.6\]]chos thams cad 'gags pas rnam par grol ba zhes bgyi na/_de bzhin gshegs pas ci'i slad du 'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gags na rnam par grol ba'o zhes gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas bar bar ni sems can gyi rkyen 
[\[254a.7\]]gyis chos bstan te/_gang thos pas chos shes so/_/bar bar ni chos kyi rkyen gyis sems can bstan te/_gang thos pas sems can bshad par shes so/_/de la ji ltar na sems can gyi rkyen gyis bstan te/_gang thos pa la chos shes pa zhe na/_ji ltar ngas sngon 'od srung chen po la 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]bshad pa bzhin te/_'od srung sems can 'gags pa na dge ba'i chos kyang 'gag go/_/zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi rkyen gyis bstan pas/_gang thos pas chos shes pa zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar na chos kyi rkyen gyis sems can bstan te/_gang thos pas sems can bstan par shes 
[\[254b.2\]]pa zhe na/_ji ltar ngas sngon dga' bo la 'di skad du/_chos thams cad la bsnyen par yang ma bshad/_chos thams cad la mi bsnyen par yang ma bshad de/_chos gang bsnyen pas dge ba'i chos ni rgud par 'gyur la/_mi dge ba ni dar bar 'gyur na/_de lta bu'i chos la ni bsnyen 
[\[254b.3\]]par mi bya'o/_/chos gang bsnyen pas mi dge ba ni rgud cing med par 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos ni dge zhing 'phel bar 'gyur na/_de lta bu'i chos la ni bsnyen par bya'o zhes gsungs te/_de ni chos kyi rkyen gyis sems can bstan pa ste/_gang thos pas sems can bshad par 
[\[254b.4\]]shes pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas 'du shes dang tshor ba gnyis bkag go zhes gsungs mod kyi/_de la thams cad kyang dgag par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis 'du shes de la de ltar brtags nas/_rim gyis 'du shes kyi rgyu ni 'du shes 
[\[254b.5\]]mtha' yas pa ma yin par rtogs so/_/ci las skye bar 'gyur ces brtags na/_reg pa'i rgyu las skye bar rig go/_/reg pa de yang rnam pa gnyis te/_nyon mongs pa'i rgyus reg pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i rgyus reg pa'o/_/de la ma rig pa'i rgyu las skye ba ni nyon mongs 
[\[254b.6\]]pa'i reg pa zhes bya/_rig pa'i rgyu las skye ba ni rnam par grol ba'i reg pa zhes bya ste/_nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las reg pa ni 'du shes log pa skye'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i rgyu las reg pa ni ma log pa'i 'du shes skye'o/_/de ltar 'du shes kyi rgyu rtogs nas rim gyis 'bras bu rnam 
[\[254b.7\]]par smin pa rtog go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te nyon mongs pa'i 'du shes kyi rkyen gyis 'du shes log par skye bar 'gyur na 'phags pa thams cad la log pa'i 'du shes ni 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]mchis la/_nyon mongs pa ma mchis na/_de'i don ci lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar na 'phags pa rnams la log pa'i 'du shes yod pa zhes bya/_byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[255a.2\]]'phags pa thams cad ni ba lang la ba lang du 'du shes bskyed de/_ba lang ngo zhes smra la/_rta la yang rta ru 'du shes bskyed de/_rta'o zhes smra ba nas skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_chen po dang /_chung ngu dang /_khang pa dang /_shing rta dang /_theg pa dang /_song ba dang /_'ong ba'i bar du yang 
[\[255a.3\]]de bzhin te/_de ni log pa'i 'du shes zhes bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu bus pa ma rabs so so'i skye bo thams cad la 'du shes gnyis yod de/_'jig rten na grags pa'i 'du shes dang /_chags pa'i 'du shes so/_/'phags pa thams cad la ni 'jig rten na grags pa'i 'du shes 'ba' zhig 
[\[255a.4\]]yod kyi/_chags pa'i 'du shes med do/_/bus pa ma rabs so so'i skye bo thams cad la ni mi dge ba'i rtog pa yod pa'i phyir 'jig rten grags pa la chags pa'i 'du shes skyed do/_/'phags pa rnams ni dge ba la rtog pa'i phyir 'jig rten grags pa la chags pa'i 'du shes mi skye ste/_de 
[\[255a.5\]]bas na bus pa ma rabs ni log pa'i 'du shes can zhes bya'i/_'phags pa rnams ni shes su zin kyang log pa'i 'du shes zhes mi bya'o/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar 'du shes kyi rgyu rtogs nas rim gyis 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa la rtog go/_/mi dge ba'i 'du shes kyi 
[\[255a.6\]]'bras bu ni/_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_mi dang lhar myong bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar ngas mi dge bar rtog pa'i rgyu bcad pas ma rig pa'i reg pa chod de/_de bas na 'du shes chad par gyur to/_/'du shes chad pa'i phyir 'bras bu rnam par smin 
[\[255a.7\]]pa yang yongs su chad do/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis 'du shes kyi rgyu de dag bcad pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bsgom mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar rtog pa ni tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ni sems can gyi gdug pa'i lus kyi nang 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]na sman gyi rgyal po dam pa yod pa zhes bya ste/_ji ltar ri kha ba can la rtswa gdug pa yod du zin kyang /_sman dam pa yang yod pa bzhin no/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis 'dod pa la brtags na/_'dod pa ni gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya 
[\[255b.2\]]yin par rig ste/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu las 'bras bur gsungs so/_/dngos po lnga po de las 'dod pa skye ste/_yang dag par na 'dod pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gti mug can ni tshor ba la chags pas gzugs la log pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa nas reg 
[\[255b.3\]]bya'i bar du log pa'i 'du shes bskyed do/_/log pa'i 'du shes kyi rkyen gyis tshor ba skye bar byed de/_de bas na 'jig rten gyi 'du shes log pa'i rgyus 'du shes rnam pa bcu skye'o zhes 'chad do/_/'dod pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'jig rten du 'bras bu ngan pa myong bar 'gyur te/_pha ma dang /_
[\[255b.4\]]dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dag la ngan du byed de/_byed pa'i mi rigs pa lus dang srog mi phangs par ched du byed do/_/de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis mi dge ba'i 'du shes kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'dod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur bar rtog go/_/mkhas pa shes rab can 
[\[255b.5\]]gyis de ltar 'dod pa'i rgyu rtogs nas/_rim gyis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rtog go/_/'dod pa de la mi dge ba'i 'bras bu smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_mi dang lha la sogs par 'gyur te/_de ni 'bras bu rnam par 
[\[255b.6\]]smin pa la rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/gal te mi dge ba'i 'du shes 'gog par 'gyur na/_nam du yang 'dod pa'i sems de skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i sems med pa'i phyir mi dge ba'i 'bras bu mi myong ngo /_/mi dge ba'i 'bras bu ma myong ba'i phyir mi dge ba'i 'bras 
[\[255b.7\]]bu med par 'gyur te/_de bas na bdag gis sngar mi dge ba'i 'du shes gcad par bya'o/_/mi dge ba'i 'du shes chod na chos de dag kyang rang 'gog par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis mi dge ba'i 'du shes dgag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]brgyad bsgom ste/_de ni tshangs par spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes kyang bya/_de ni ji ltar ri kha ba can na rtswa gdug pa yod du zin kyang /_sman dam pa yang yod pa ltar/_sems can gyi lus gdug pa la sman gyi rgyal po dam pa yod pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu mkhas pa 
[\[256a.2\]]shes rab can gyis de ltar 'dod pa rtogs nas rim gyis las la rtog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mkhas pa shes rab can gyis 'di snyam du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_reg pa dang /_'dod pa ni nyon mongs pa ste/_nyon mongs pa de ni skye ba'i las byed kyi myong ba'i las mi byed do/_/nyon mongs 
[\[256a.3\]]pa de ni las dang lhan cig tu 'gro ba na/_skye ba'i las dang myong ba'i las te/_rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro snyam du sems so/_/de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis las la yongs su brtag go/_/las de yang rnam pa gsum ste/_lus dang ngag dang yid do/_/rigs kyi bu lus 
[\[256a.4\]]dang ngag gi las gnyis ni las zhes kyang bya la/_las kyi 'bras bu zhes kyang bya'o/_/yid 'ba' zhig ni las zhes bya ste/_'bras bu zhes mi bya'o/_/de ltar las kyi rkyen gyis las zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu lus dang ngag gi las gnyis ni phyi rol gyi las zhes kyang bya'o/_/yid ni nang 
[\[256a.5\]]gi las zhes kyang bya ste/_las rnam pa de gsum nyon mongs pa dang 'grogs pa'i phyir skye ba'i las dang myong ba'i las gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu las yang dag pa ni yid kyi las so/_/dus kyi las ni lus dang ngag gi las so/_/de la sngar byung ba ni yid kyi las so/_/yid kyi las 
[\[256a.6\]]las byung ba ni lus dang ngag gi las so/_/de bas na yid kyi las ni las yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis las yongs su rtogs nas rim gyis las kyi rgyu brtag go/_/de la las kyi rgyu ni ma rig pa dang reg pa'o/_/ma rig pa dang /_reg pa'i rkyen gyis sems can 
[\[256a.7\]]rnams srid pa tshol lo/_/srid pa tshol ba'i rkyen ni sred pa yin no/_/sred pa'i rkyen gyis lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi las rnam pa gsum byed do/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar las kyi rgyu rtogs nas rim gyis 'bras bu rnam par smin par rtog go/_/'bras 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]bu rnam par smin pa la rnam pa bzhi ste/_nag po'i yang nag po'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /_dkar po'i yang dkar po'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /_'dres pa'i yang 'dres pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /_mi dkar mi gnag pa'i yang mi dkar mi gnag pa'i 'bras bu rnam 
[\[256b.2\]]par smin pa'o/_/de la nag po'i yang nag po'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni/_las byed pa na yang dri ma dang bcas pa la/_'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang dri ma dang bcas pa'o/_/dkar po'i yang dkar po'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni/_las byed pa na yang rnam par dag la/_
[\[256b.3\]]'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang rnam par dag pa'o/_/'dres pa'i yang 'dres pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni/_las byed pa na yang 'dres la/_'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'dres pa'o/_/mi dkar mi gnag pa'i yang mi dkar mi gnag pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni/_zag 
[\[256b.4\]]pa med pa'i las zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sngar ni zag pa ma mchis pa la 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang ma mchis zhes gsungs na/_de ni ci'i slad du mi dkar mi gnag pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[256b.5\]]rnam par smin pa mchis zhes gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu don de la rnam pa gnyis te/_'bras bu yin la rnam par smin pa yang yin pa dang /_'bras bu 'ba' zhig ste rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'o/_/nag po'i yang nag po'i 'bras bu rnam par smin 
[\[256b.6\]]pa ni/_'bras bu zhes kyang bya la/_rnam par smin pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/de la nag po'i rgyu las skye ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya la/_rgyur 'gyur bar byed pas rnam par smin pa zhes kyang bya ste/_'dres pa dang rnam par dag pa yang de bzhin no/_/zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu ni/_zag 
[\[256b.7\]]pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu las skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu zhes bya ste/_gzhan gyi rgyur mi 'gyur bas rnam par smin pa zhes mi bya'o/_/de bas na 'bras bu zhes bya'i rnam par smin pa zhes mi bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i las de chos nag po ma lags na/_ci'i slad du dkar po zhes mi bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyir dkar po zhes mi bya'i/_nag po'i gnyen po yin pas dkar po zhes bya'o/_/ngas skabs 
[\[257a.2\]]'dir ni 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong ba la nag po dang dkar po zhes gsungs so/_/zag pa med pa'i las ni rnam par smin pa mi myong bas dkar po zhes mi bya'i/_zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/de ltar las de'i nges par rnam par smin pa myong ba'i gnas yod de/_dper na mi dge ba bcu byas na/_
[\[257a.3\]]nges par sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye la/_dge ba bcu byas na/_nges par lha dang mir skye'o/_/mi dge ba bcu'i las la rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yod de/_rab byas pa ni sems can dmyal ba'i lus myong ngo /_/'bring byas pa ni byol 
[\[257a.4\]]song gi lus myong ngo /_/tha ma byas pa ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi lus myong ngo /_/mi'i las kyi nang du dge ba bcu la yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma dang /_rab kyi yang rab bo/_/de la tha ma ni byang gi sgra mi snyan du skye'o/_/'bring ni shar gyi lus 'phags gling du skye'o/_/rab ni 
[\[257a.5\]]nub kyi ban glang spyod du skye'o/_/rab kyi yang rab ni 'dzam bu'i gling du skye ste/_mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar rtogs nas/_'di snyam du bdag gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de ji ltar gcad par bya snyam bsams nas/_yang 'di snyam du las de'i rgyu dang rkyen ni ma rig pa dang reg 
[\[257a.6\]]pa ste/_gal te bdag gis ma rig pa dang /_reg pa yongs su bcad na las kyi 'bras bu de dag 'gog cing mi skye bar 'gyur ro snyam sems so/_/de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ma rig pa dang reg pa yongs su bcad pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad bsgom 
[\[257a.7\]]ste/_de ni tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na sems can gyi gdug pa'i lus la/_sman gyi rgyal po dam pa yod pa ni ji ltar ri kha ba can la rtswa gdug pa yod du zin kyang sman dam pa yang yod pa dang 'dra'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu mkhas pa 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]shes rab can gyi las dang nyon mongs pa rtogs nas rim gyis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa gnyis la brtag go/_/de ltar de gnyis kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni sdug bsngal yin te/_de ltar sdug bsngal bar shes nas skye ba len pa thams cad yongs su spong ngo /_/mkhas pa shes rab 
[\[257b.2\]]can ni gzhan yang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las nyon mongs pa skye ba dang /_las kyi rgyu las nyon mongs pa skye la/_nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las kyang las skye ba dang /_las kyi rgyu las sdug bsngal skye la/_sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las nyon mongs pa skye'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las srid pa skye ste/_
[\[257b.3\]]srid pa'i rgyu las sdug bsngal skye'o/_/srid pa'i rgyu las srid pa skye ste/_srid pa'i rgyu las las skye'o/_/las kyi rgyu las nyon mongs pa skye la/_nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las sdug bsngal skye ste/_sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las kyang sdug bsngal skye bar rtogs so/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas 
[\[257b.4\]]pa shes rab can gyis de ltar rtogs pa ni las kyi sdug bsngal rtogs pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji ltar gong ma dang 'dra bar rtog pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis te/_gal te gang gis 'khor ba'i rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis de la de ltar rtog na de ni las 
[\[257b.5\]]gsar mi byed cing /_las rnying bcom pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis sems can dmyal ba gcig nas sems can dmyal ba brgya sum cu rtsa drug gi bar gyi sems can dmyal ba re re'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed yod pa brtags 
[\[257b.6\]]na kun kyang nyon mongs pa'i las kyis bskyed pa yin par rtogs so/_/de ltar sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rtogs nas rim gyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang byol song la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal brtag go/_/de ltar rtogs nas yang mi dang lha'i sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa rnams rtog ste/_
[\[257b.7\]]de ltar sdug bsngal mang po de dag kun kyang nyon mongs pa'i las las skye ba yin par rtogs so/_/rigs kyi bu mtho ris kyi lha la sdug bsngal chen pos gzir ba'i dngos po med de/_lus mnyen zhing 'jam yang ltas lnga mngon du byung ba'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po myong ba ni 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'dra ste/_khyad par med do/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ni khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal thams cad nyon mongs pa'i las kyi rgyu dang rkyen las skye bar shin tu rtogs so/_/rigs kyi bu dper na rdza 
[\[258a.2\]]ma so ma btang ba ni shin tu yang 'chag sla'o/_/sems can gyi lus blangs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_lus de ni sdug bsngal mang po'i snod yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na me tog dang /_'bras bu'i shing shin tu rgyas pa ni bya mang pos ma rung bar byed do/_/dper na rtswa skam po mang du 
[\[258a.3\]]spungs kyang me chung ngus 'tshig par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar sems can gyi lus myong ba yang sdug bsngal gyis 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis sdug bsngal rnam pa brgyad ni 'phags pa'i spyod pa ltar rtogs na/_gang zag des ni sdug 
[\[258a.4\]]bsngal yongs su chod par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis sdug bsngal brgyad shin tu rtogs nas rim gyis sdug bsngal gyi rgyu la rtog go/_/sdug bsngal gyi rgyu zhes bya ba ni sred pa dang ma rig pa'o/_/sred pa dang ma rig pa la rnam pa gnyis 
[\[258a.5\]]te/_lus tshol ba dang /_zang zing tshol ba'o/_/lus dang zang zing tshol b+wa gnyis ka la yang sdug bsngal ba ste/_de bas na sred pa dang ma rig pa ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sred pa dang /_ma rig pa las gzhan yang rnam pa 
[\[258a.6\]]gnyis te/_nang dang phyi rol lo/_/de la nang gis lus su 'gyur bar byed do/_/phyi rol gyis ni skye zhing 'phel bar byed do/_/gzhan yang nang gis lus su 'gyur bar byed de/_phyi rol ni las kyi 'bras bur 'gyur bar byed pas/_nang gi sred pa bcad na las chod par 
[\[258a.7\]]'gyur gyi/_phyi rol gyi sred pa bcad pas 'bras bu chod par 'gyur ro/_/de la nang gi sred pas ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sdug bsngal skye bar byed la phyi rol gyi sred pas ni da ltar gyi dus kyi sdug bsngal skye bar byed de/_de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis sred pa ni 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur bar rtogs so/_/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi rgyu rtogs nas rim gyis sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog go/_/sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni len pa yin no/_/sred pa'i 'bras bu la len pa zhes bya ste/_len pa'i rgyu dang rkyen 
[\[258b.2\]]gyis phyi nang la sred par 'gyur te/_sred pa de'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ni sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa yin par rtogs so/_/gang gis sred pa dang /_len pa'i dngos po gnyis bcad na/_
[\[258b.3\]]las kyang mi byed de/_sdug bsngal mang po myong bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can ni sred pa'i sdug bsngal gcad pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam brgyad la nan tan byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gang zhig de ltar shin tu rtogs na/_de ni ngas tshangs 
[\[258b.4\]]pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/_de ni sems can gyi gdug pa'i lus la sman dam pa'i rgyal po yod pa zhes bya ste/_ji ltar ri kha ba can la dug yod du zin kyang /_sman dam pa yang yod pa bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang gsol pa/_
[\[258b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ces 
[\[258b.6\]]bgyi ba'i don ma nges pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas bar bar ni dge ba dang /_mi dge ba lags zhes gsungs/_bar bar ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rjes su rtogs pa lags so zhes gsungs/_bar bar ni skye mched bcu gnyis 
[\[258b.7\]]lags so zhes gsungs/_bar bar ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags so zhes gsungs/_bar bar ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis lags so zhes gsungs/_bar bar ni sems can lags so zhes gsungs/_bar bar ni yang dag par lta ba dang ngan 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]par lta ba lags so zhes gsungs/_bar bar ni mdo sde sde bcu gnyis lags so zhes gsungs/_bar bar ni bden pa gnyis lags so zhes/_nga yang 'dir yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa ni chos thams cad do zhes gsungs na gang dag la 
[\[259a.2\]]sogs pa la chos thams cad ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so shin tu legs so/_/rigs kyi bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rin po che'i gter zhes bya'o/_/dper na rgya 
[\[259a.3\]]mtsho ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin pa dang 'dra bar/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di yang de dang 'dra ste/_tshig gi don thams cad kyi dgongs te gsungs pa'i snying po'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni sman mang po thams cad kyi 
[\[259a.4\]]'byung gnas yin pa dang 'dra bar/_mdo sde 'di yang de dang 'dra ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi 'byung gnas yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dper na nam mkha' ni dngos po thams cad kyi gnas yin pa ltar/_mdo sde 'di yang de dang 'dra ste/_dge ba'i chos 
[\[259a.5\]]thams cad kyi gnas yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dper na rlung drag po ni sus kyang bcing mi nus pa ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde 'di la nan tan byed pa thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_nyon mongs pa'i mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'ching mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu dper 
[\[259a.6\]]na rdo rje la cis kyang mi tshugs pa ltar mdo sde 'di yang de dang 'dra bar mu stegs can ngan par lta ba mang du yod kyang rnam par gzhig mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu dper na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ni sus kyang 'grang mi nus pa ltar mdo sde 'di'i don yang de dang 'dra ste/_sus kyang bgrang mi nus 
[\[259a.7\]]so/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan du 'gyur te/_brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug gi rgyal mtshan dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i tshong dpon lta bu ste/_ji ltar 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]ded dpon chen pos tshong dpon mang po ded de rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba'i 'od du 'gyur te/_ji ltar 'jig rten na nyi ma dang zla bas mun pa sel bar byed pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni 
[\[259b.2\]]nad kyis gzir ba'i sems can gyi sman bzang por 'gyur te/_ji ltar ri bsung can la sman gyi rgyal po 'byung bas nad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni log sred can thams cad kyi 'khar bar 'gyur te/_dper na mi nyam chung ba thams cad 
[\[259b.3\]]de'i rkyen gyis langs pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni sdig pa ma rungs pa thams cad kyi zam par 'gyur te/_ji ltar 'jig rten na zam pas thams cad sgrol ba dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i bsil grib 
[\[259b.4\]]tu 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi gdugs sam/_bla gab kyis shin tu tsha ba'i nyi ma sgrib pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni 'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal po chen po ste/_nyon mongs pa'i bdud ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ba ni/_ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal 
[\[259b.5\]]pos [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]thams cad thul ba dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni rig pa'i sngags chen mo ste/_nyon mongs pa'i gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten na sngags mkhan gyis gdon med par byed pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni 
[\[259b.6\]]bla na med pa'i ba mo'am/_ser ba lta bu ste/_'khor ba'i 'bras bu thams cad bcom pa ni/_ji ltar 'jig rten na ba mo'am/_ser bas 'bras bu thams cad bcom pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni tshul khrims kyi mig nyams pa'i sman bzang po lta bur 'gyur 
[\[259b.7\]]te/_'jig rten na sman an dz+wa na zhes bya ba mig na ba thams cad la phan par byed pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su 'gyur te/_ji ltar 'jig rten nas dngos po thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni tshul khrims nyams pa'i sems can gyi me long gsal bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar 'jig rten gyi me long gsal bas gzugs thams cad snang ba dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni khrel ba dang 'dzem pa med pa'i gos su 
[\[260a.2\]]'gyur te/_ji ltar 'jig rten na gos kyis lus sgrib cing g.yogs pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni dge ba'i chos kyis dbul ba rnams kyi nor rin po cher 'gyur te/_ji ltar lha bkra shis mas dbul ba thams cad la phan par 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi 
[\[260a.3\]]bu mdo sde 'di ni chos kyis skom pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bdud rtsi'i chur 'gyur te/_ji ltar yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus skom pa thams cad ngoms par byed pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi khrir 'gyur te/_
[\[260a.4\]]ji ltar 'jig rten na gang zag dag bde ba'i khri la phrad pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' nas sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bar gyi rgyan dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_byug spos dang /_spos phye ma dang /_bdug 
[\[260a.5\]]spos rnam par dag pa'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'i theg pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas par byed do/_/rab tu bde ba myong bar byed pa ni/_ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi shing pa ri tsi tra dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di ni ye shes kyi mtshon ngar can 
[\[260a.6\]]lta bu ste/_nyon mongs pa'i shing thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni mtshon rnon po lta bu ste/_bag chags thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni shin tu dpa' zhing rtul phod pa lta bu ste/_phas rgol ba'i bdud thams cad bcom pa'o/_/'di ni ye 
[\[260a.7\]]shes kyi me lta bu ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'o/_/'di ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i snying po lta bu ste/_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so/_/'di ni thos pa'i gter lta bu ste/_nyan thos kyi skye gnas yin no/_/'di ni lha thams cad kyi 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]mig lta bu'o/_/'di ni mi thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i lam yin no/_/'di ni byol song gi skye gnas thams cad kyi rten pa'i gnas yin no/_/'di ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i gnas yin no/_/'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i bla na med pa'i mchog yin no/_/
[\[260b.2\]]'di ni phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i snod yin no/_/'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab dang yum yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na mdo sde 'dis ni chos thams cad 
[\[260b.3\]]bsdus so/_/ngas ni sngar gsungs pa ltar mdo sde 'dis chos thams cad bsdus par gsungs mod kyi/_ngas ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la tshangs par spyod pa yin no zhes gsungs so//_//'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen 
[\[260b.4\]]po'i mdo/_bam po lnga bcu pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi phyogs kyi sum cu rtsa bdun ma gtogs par/_gzhan gyis nyan thos kyi 'bras bu yang dag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu'i bar du thob par mi 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi rang 
[\[260b.5\]]bzhin dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu yang mi mthong ngo /_/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis tshangs par spyod pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun phyin ci log gi rang bzhin ma yin pas phyin ci log rnam par 
[\[260b.6\]]'jig par byed do/_/ngan par lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pas ngan par lta ba 'jig par byed do/_/'jig pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pas 'jig pa yongs su 'jig par byed do/_/rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par spyod pa yin pas sems can dag mthar yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[260b.7\]]tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni zag pa med pa'i chos kyi rgyur yang 'gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pas ci'i slad du zag pa dang bcas pa la/_yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]tshangs par spyod pa'o zhes ma gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni phyin ci log pa yin te/_de bas na zag pa dang bcas pa la yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes mi bya'o/_/byang chub 
[\[261a.2\]]sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten mchog gi chos zhes bgyi ba/_zag pa dang bcas pa lags sam/_zag pa ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu zag pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_
[\[261a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa lags mod kyi/_rang bzhin gyis phyin ci log ma lags na/_ci'i slad du yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes mi bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten mchog gi chos ni zag pa med pa'i rgyur 
[\[261a.4\]]'gyur bas zag pa med pa dang 'dra'o/_/zag pa med pa la phyogs pas phyin ci log ces mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i sems skyed pa rgyun ma chad pa nas/_mthar 'jig rten mchog gi chos kyi bar du sems rtse gcig tu zad de/_de bas 
[\[261a.5\]]na yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes mi bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi rnam par shes pa lnga ni zag pa dang bcas pa'ang lags te/_phyin ci log pa ma lags la sems rtse gcig pa'ang ma 
[\[261a.6\]]lags na ci'i slad du yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes mi bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sems can gyi rnam par shes pa lnga ni sems rtse gcig pa ma yin yang gang zag pa dang bcas pa yin la/_phyin ci log kyang yin 
[\[261a.7\]]te/_zag pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o/_/ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag pa ma yin te/_'du shes la chags pas phyin ci log pa zhes bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag pa ma yin te/_'du shes la chags pas phyin ci log ces 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]bya zhe na/_pho dang mo ma yin pa la pho dang mor 'du shes bskyed pa nas/_khang pa dang /_theg pa dang /_bum pa dang /_gos kyi bar du de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya ste/_de dag ni phyin ci log ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun ni rang bzhin 
[\[261b.2\]]gyis phyin ci log pa ma yin te/_de bas na yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun las rtsa ba yang shes/_rgyu yang shes/_bsdu ba yang shes/_bskyed pa yang shes/_bdag po yang 
[\[261b.3\]]shes/_ded dpon yang shes/_rgyal ba yang shes/_yang dag pa yang shes/_mthar phyin pa yang shes na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de la 
[\[261b.4\]]ji ltar na rtsa ba shes pa nas mthar phyin pa'i bar du shes pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/byang chub sems dpas zhu ba la dngos po rnam pa gnyis te/_gang zhe na/_bdag shes par bya ba dang /_gzhan shes 
[\[261b.5\]]par byed pa'o/_/khyod kyis rtogs shing shes kyang sems can tshad med pa snyed ma gtogs mi shes pa dag gi phyir dngos po 'di dag zhu ba legs so legs so zhes bstod do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rtsa ba ni mos pa yin te/_rgyu ni gsal bar reg 
[\[261b.6\]]pa zhes bya/_bsdu ba ni tshor ba zhes bya/_bskyed pa ni legs par yid la byed pa zhes bya/_bdag po ni dran pa zhes bya/_ded dpon ni ting nge 'dzin ces bya/_rgyal ba ni shes rab ces bya/_yang dag pa ni rnam par grol ba zhes bya/_mthar phyin pa ni yongs su mya ngan 
[\[261b.7\]]las 'das pa chen po zhes bya/_rigs kyi bu shin tu mos pa ni thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi rtsa ba yin te/_de bas na mos pa ni rtsa ba zhes gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu dper na 'jig rten na sdug bsngal 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni sred pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /_nad thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni kha zas ma zhu ba yin no zhes bya ba dang /_zhal che thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni rtsod pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /_mi dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]yin no zhes bya ba dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[262a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sngar mdo sde 'di'i nang nas dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni bag byas pa lags so zhes gsungs la/_da ni mos pa lags so zhes gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu lags/_bcom 
[\[262a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gal te skye ba'i rgyu la bya na ni shin tu mos pa yin no/_/gal te gsal ba'i rgyu la bya na ni bag byed pa yin no/_/dper na 'jig rten pa dag 'bras bu thams cad kyi rgyu ni sa bon yin no zhes bya ba dang /_gzhan yang sa bon ni skye ba'i 
[\[262a.4\]]rgyu yin no zhes bya ba dang /_sa ni gsal ba'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don yang de dang 'dra'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde gzhan las byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rtsa ba ni sangs rgyas lags 
[\[262a.5\]]so zhes bgyi ba'i don ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gang byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun thog ma shes pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi rtsa ba yin no zhes gsungs so/_/gang rang gis rig pa la ni shin 
[\[262a.6\]]tu mos pa rtsa ba yin no zhes gsungs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar na gsal bar reg pa la rgyu zhes bgyi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas bar bar ni gsal ba la shes rab ces kyang 
[\[262a.7\]]gsungs/_bar bar ni dad pa zhes kyang gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu dad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen par 'gyur te/_de bas na reg pa zhes bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis dam pa'i chos thob par 'gyur te/_de 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]yang reg pa zhes bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos thos pa'i rkyen gyis lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyi las yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_de yang reg pa zhes bya'o/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las yongs su dag pa'i rkyen gyis yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba thob par 'gyur te/_de 
[\[262b.2\]]yang reg pa zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen gyis yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rkyen gyis bas mtha'i dgon pa la dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bas mtha'i dgon pa la dga' ba'i rkyen gyis shin tu yid 
[\[262b.3\]]la byed par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu yid la byas pas chos bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/chos bzhin du gnas pa'i rkyen gyis byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun thob ste/_kun nas nyon mongs pa tshad med pa snyed choms par 'gyur te/_de ni reg pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi 
[\[262b.4\]]bu tshor ba la sdud pa zhes bya'o/_/sems can gyis tshor ba myong ba na dge ba dang sdig pa byed par 'gyur te/_de bas na tshor ba la sdud pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu tshor ba'i rkyen gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa mang po skye'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyis kun 
[\[262b.5\]]nas nyon mongs pa choms par 'gyur te/_de bas na tshor ba la sdud pa zhes bya'o/_/shin tu legs par yid la byed pa'i rkyen gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa choms par 'gyur te/_de bas na bskyed pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_brtson 'grus su nan tan byas na byang chub 
[\[262b.6\]]kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhom par bsams na dran pa la rag lus te/_de bas na dran pa ni bdag po zhes bya'o/_/dper na 'jig rten na tshogs rnam pa bzhi ni dmag dpon gyi yid bzhin du 'gro ba ltar byang 
[\[262b.7\]]chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun yang de dang 'dra ste/_bdag po dran pa'i rjes su 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pas byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad rtogs par 'gyur te/_de bas na ting nge 'dzin ni ded dpon zhes bya'o/_/
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa yang shes rab mchog tu 'gyur te/_de bas na shes rab ni rgyal ba zhes bya'o/_/de ltar shes rab kyis nyon mongs pa rtogs nas shes rab kyi stobs kyis nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur te/_ji 
[\[263a.2\]]ltar 'jig rten na tshogs rnam bzhis dgra pham pa yang dpa' bo gcig gam gnyis tsam la rag lus pa ltar byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun yang de dang 'dra ste/_shes rab kyi mthus nyon mongs pa choms pas shes rab kyi rgyal ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi 
[\[263a.3\]]phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun la nan tan byas pas bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_bde ba thob mod kyi yang dag pa zhes mi bya ste/_gang nyon mongs pa bcom nas rnam par grol ba thob pa'i tshe/_don yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun 
[\[263a.4\]]la sems bskyed de nan tan byas pas 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba dang /_dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang /_rnam par grol ba thob mod kyi mthar phyin pa zhes mi bya'o/_/gang zhig gis byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun spyod pa'i dngos po 
[\[263a.5\]]yongs su bcad na de ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/_de bas na mthar phyin pa la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes ngas gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shin tu 'dod pa'i sems ni mos pa zhes bya'o/_/shin tu 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen par 
[\[263a.6\]]'gyur te/_de ni reg pa zhes kyang bya/_rgyu zhes kyang bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pas tshor ba zhes kyang bya ste/_de ni sdud pa zhes bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pas shin tu yid la byed par 'gyur te bskyed pa zhes bya'o/_/chos rnam pa 'di bzhi'i rkyen gyis byang chub 
[\[263a.7\]]skye ba ni mos pa dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab yin te/_de ni bdag po dang /_ded dpon dang /_rgyal ba zhes bya'o/_/chos rnam pa 'di gsum gyi rkyen gyis rnam par grol ba gnyis thob par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa yongs su bcad pas ni sems rnam par grol 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]la/_ma rig pa yongs su bcad pas shes rab rnam par grol te/_de ni yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar chos rnam pa 'di brgyad kyis mthar 'bras bu thob par 'gyur bas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/_mthar phyin pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 
[\[263b.2\]]mos pa ni sems bskyed nas rab tu byung ba'o/_/reg pa ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byas pa ste/_de ni rgyu zhes bya'o/_/bzung ba ni tshul khrims rnam pa gnyis mnod pa ste/_so sor thar pa dang /_rtsa ba yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims te/_de ni tshor ba dang yongs su bzung 
[\[263b.3\]]ba zhes bya'o/_/bskyed pa ni bsam gtan bzhi la nan tan byed pa'o/_/bdag po ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/ded dpon ni lan cig phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/rgyal ba ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/yang dag 
[\[263b.4\]]pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'o/_/mthar phyin pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mos pa ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/reg pa ni skye mched drug go/_/sdud pa ni tshor ba'o/_/skyed pa ni ma rig pa'o/_/bdag 
[\[263b.5\]]po ni ming dang gzugs so/_/ded dpon ni 'dod pa'o/_/rgyal ba ni len pa'o/_/yang dag pa ni srid pa'o/_/mthar phyin pa ni skye ba dang rga ba dang /_na ba dang 'chi ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rtsa ba dang /_rgyu dang /_bskyed pa dang /_
[\[263b.6\]]gsum la tha dad pa yang ci mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni thog ma sems bskyed pa la bya'o/_/rgyu zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/bskyed pa ni 'dra ba 'gags nas 'dra ba bskyed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni 
[\[263b.7\]]byed pa'o/_/rgyu zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o/_/bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni dgos pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yod kyang ma myong ba'i phyir rgyu zhes bya'o/_/nam myong bar 'gyur ba'i tshe na bskyed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rtsa ba zhes 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]bya ba ni tshor ba'o/_/thob pa ni rgyu'o/_/dgos pa ni bskyed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di las rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam mo/_/rgyu zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam mo/_/bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni mi slob pa'i lam mo/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rtsa ba zhes bya ba 
[\[264a.2\]]ni yang dag pa'i rgyu'o/_/rgyu zhes bya ba ni thabs yin te/_thabs mkhas pas 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'bras bu thob pas bskyed pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar mthar phyin pa la mya ngan 
[\[264a.3\]]las 'das pa zhes bgyi na mya ngan las 'das pa de thob par rung ngam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang zhig 'du 
[\[264a.4\]]shes bcu la nan tan byas na des mya ngan las 'das pa thob par rig par bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'du shes pa dang /_bdag med par 'du shes pa dang /_kha zas spong bar 'du shes pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[264a.5\]]thams cad la mi chags par 'du shes pa dang /_shi bar 'du shes pa dang /_nyes pa'i skyon mang bar 'du shes pa dang /_spong bar 'du shes pa dang /_'gog par 'du shes pa dang /_sred pa med par 'du shes pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[264a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang gis 'du shes rnam pa bcu po 'di la nan tan byas na mthar nges par mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par dge ba dang 
[\[264a.7\]]mi dge ba la sogs pa rtogs par 'gyur te/_de ni yang dag pa'i dge slong yin pa nas dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma yang dag pa'i bar du yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]nas dge bsnyen ma'i bar du mi rtag par 'du shes pa la nan tan bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' la rnam pa gnyis te/_thog ma sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub la nan tan byed pa'o/_/mi rtag par 
[\[264b.2\]]'du shes pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te/_sbom po dang /_phra mo'o/_/thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas mi rtag pa la 'du shes pa'i tshe na 'di snyam du sems so/_/'jig rten gyi dngos po la yang rnam pa gnyis te/_nang dang phyi rol lo/_/de ltar 
[\[264b.3\]]nang gi dngos po ni mi rtag la 'gyur zhing 'pho ba ste/_bdag gi lus 'di thog ma btsas pa dang /_gzhon nu dang /_lang tsho ba dang /_rgas 'khogs pa dang /_shi ba la sogs pa'i dus dang /_tshad so sor tha dad de/_de bas na nang gi dngos po ni mi rtag par rtogs 
[\[264b.4\]]so/_/mi rtag par rig go/_/gzhan yang 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can dag la brtags na/_kha cig kha dog dang mdog dang mthu stobs su ldan te/_'gro ba dang 'ong ba la thogs pa med par dbang du gyur/_kha cig ni nad kyis gzir nas shin du rid de 
[\[264b.5\]]mdog dang kha dog tu mi ldan/_mthu dang stobs med pas dbang du ma gyur to/_/kha cig ni shin tu longs spyod dang ldan te bang mdzod kyang yongs su gang ngo /_/kha cig ni dbul phongs pas ci yang mi bdog go/_/kha cig ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 
[\[264b.6\]]mthong ngo /_/kha cig ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan par mthong bas de bas na nges par nang gi chos ni mi rtag par rig go/_/gzhan yang phyi rol gyi chos rnams ni sa bon dang /_myu gu dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i tshe so sor tha dad de/_de 
[\[264b.7\]]ltar phyi rol gyi chos kyang kha cig ni phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan/_kha cig ni phun sum tshogs pa dang mi ldan te/_de bas na phyi rol gyi chos thams cad kyang mi rtag par rig go snyam sems so/_/de ltar chos thams cad mi rtag par rtogs nas thos pa'i sgo nas chos 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]thams cad la 'di ltar rtog go/_/bdag gis thos na mtho ris kyi lha rnams kyang shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/_mngon par shes pa dang dbang du ldan yang ltas lnga mngon par byung bas de bas na mi rtag par rig go/_/gzhan 
[\[265a.2\]]yang bskal pa thog ma'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang so so nas yon tan mchog dam pa dang ldan te/_so so'i lus kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed kyi nyi ma zla ba'i 'od la rag ma lus so zhes thos te/_mi rtag pa'i mthus 'od kyang nyams nas yon tan yang med par gyur to/_/
[\[265a.3\]]gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lta bu gling bzhi la dbang ste/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i dbang chen po thob kyang mi rtag pa bcom ma nus so zhes thos so/_/gzhan yang sa chen po 'di la sngon ni sems can tshad med pa snyed bde bar gnas te/_shing rta'i phang 
[\[265a.4\]]lo tsam gyi sa stongs med par sman dam pa sna tshogs dang /_nags tshal dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_'bras bu la sogs pa shin tu rgyas pa las da ni sems can bsod nams [{]chungs [,]chung [}]pas sa chen po 'di'i mthu stobs med par gyur te/_sa las skyes pa'i rnams kyang 
[\[265a.5\]]ro med cing ya ma brlar gyur te/_de bas na phyi nang gi chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin te/_de ni mi rtag pa sbom po zhes bya'o/_/de ltar sbom po rtogs nas mthar gyis phra mo la rtog go/_/de la phra mo zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[265a.6\]]phyi nang gi chos thams cad nas rdul phra rab kyi bar du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi rtag par rtog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtshan ma yongs su bcom pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs de mi rtag pa ma yin na/_gzugs la khyad par gyi dus rnam pa 'di 
[\[265a.7\]]bcu yod do zhes smra ba mi rung ngo /_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nur nur po'i dus dang /_mer mer gyi dus dang /_mkhregs pa'i dus dang /_sha gong gong por gyur pa'i dus dang /_yan lag skyes pa'i dus dang /_bus pa chung ngu'i dus dang /_gzhon nu'i dus dang /_
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]lang tsho'i dus dang /_dar la bab pa'i dus dang /_rgas pa'i dus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nur nur po'i tshe na mi rtag pa ma yin par rtog na mer mer nas lang tsho ba'i bar du yang mi 'gyur la/_mi rtag pa ma yin par rtogs na rgas par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[265b.2\]]ltar dus mang po skad cig skad cig gis 'gog pa ma yin na rgas kyis skye ba'i mi rigs te/_dus gcig tu tshad du phyin par skye ba'i rigs so/_/de ltar dus gcig tu tshad du phyin par skye ba'i gnas med de/_de bas na nges par skad cig skad cig gis 'gog pa'i 
[\[265b.3\]]mi rtag pa phra mo yod par rig go/_/gzhan yang gang zag kha cig ni sngon dbang po dang mdog tu ldan te/_phyis rgud cing nyams pa yang mthong bas na gang zag de ni skad cig skad cig gis nges par mi rtag par mngon no/_/gzhan yang chen po bzhi dang /_spyod lam bzhi la rtog go/_/
[\[265b.4\]]gzhan yang phyi nang rnam pa gnyis la sdug bsngal gyi rgyu rnam pa gnyis gnyis yod de/_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba yang rtog go/_/gzhan yang de ltar rnam pa bzhi po de skad cig skad cig gis mi rtag pa phra mo ma yin na sdug bsngal rnam pa bzhi po 
[\[265b.5\]]yang gsung ba'i mi rigs so snyam du sems so/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis de ltar rtog na de ni byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa phra mo la rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/phyi nang gi gzugs la ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi chos kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/de 
[\[265b.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_skye mched drug la spyod pa'i phyir ro/_/skye mched drug la spyod pa na bar bar ni dga' ba'i sems skye/_bar bar ni zhe sdang gi sems skye/_bar bar ni 'dod pa'i sems skye/_bar bar ni dran pa'i sems skye ste/_de ltar tha dad pa'i sems skye ste/_
[\[265b.7\]]gcig tu ma chad pas gzugs kyi chos dang gzugs ma yin pa'i chos thams cad mi rtag par rig go/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig skad cig skad cig la chos thams cad skye ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_mi rtag par mthong ba ni byang chub 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]sems dpa' mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can ni de ltar mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la nan tan byas nas rtag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_rtag pa'i phyin ci log dang /_phyin ci log gi 'du shes 
[\[266a.2\]]yongs su spong ste/_sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes la nan tan byed do/_/ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'di ltar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur snyam bsams na sdug bsngal de ni mi rtag pa'i rgyu las byung bar shes so/_/mi rtag pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_
[\[266a.3\]]na ba dang /_shi ba myong bar gyur te/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_shi ba'i rkyen gyis mi rtag pa zhes bya'o/_/mi rtag pa'i rkyen gyis phyi nang gi sdug bsngal mang po myong ba ni bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_rdeg pa dang /_'tshog 
[\[266a.4\]]pa dang /_spyo ba dang /_gshe ba'i sdug bsngal myong ngo /_/de ltar sdug bsngal mang po myong ba yang mi rtag pa'i rkyen gyis myong bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang mkhas pa shes rab can ni lus 'di la mi rtag pa'i snod yin par rtog go/_/snod sdug bsngal ba yin 
[\[266a.5\]]te/_de ltar snod sdug bsngal ba yin pas bcud kyang de dang 'dra bar sdug bsngal gyi chos yin par rtog go/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can ni skye ba nyid kyang sdug bsngal bar rtog la/_'gog pa yang sdug bsngal bar rtog ste/_sdug bsngal 
[\[266a.6\]]gyis skye zhing 'gog pas na mi rtag pa yin te/_bdag dang bdag gi ba ma yin par mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la nan tan byed do/_/gzhan yang mkhas pa shes rab can ni sdug bsngal nyid mi rtag pa yin la/_mi rtag pa nyid kyang sdug bsngal ba yin te/_de 
[\[266a.7\]]ltar sdug bsngal ba nyid mi rtag pa yin pas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ci'i phyir bdag yod ces smra/_de ltar bdag ma yin pas na mi rtag pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du phung po lnga yang sdug bsngal ba yang yin la mi rtag pa yang yin 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]na sems can gyis ci'i phyir bdag yod ces smra/_gzhan yang chos thams cad ni tha dad 'dus pa las skyes kyi gcig pu zhig 'dus pa las chos thams cad skyes pa yang ma yin la/_chos gcig kyang thams cad 'dus pa'i 'bras bu ma yin par rtogs te/_
[\[266b.2\]]'dus pa thams cad bdag gi rang bzhin yang med/_gcig pa'i rang bzhin yang med/_tha dad pa'i rang bzhin yang med/_dngos po'i rang bzhin yang med/_dbang du gyur pa'i rang bzhin yang med do/_/chos thams cad la gal te rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid de dag 
[\[266b.3\]]yod na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ci'i phyir bdag yod par smra/_gzhan yang 'di snyam du chos thams cad la chos gcig tsam yang byed pa po med do/_/da ltar chos gcig tsam yang byed pa po med de/_chos thams cad 'dus pa las byed pa po yang med do/_/chos 
[\[266b.4\]]thams cad rang bzhin gyis rang skye ba'am/_rang 'gog par mi 'gyur te/_'dus pa las 'gog cing 'dus pa las skye ste/_de ltar chos skyes nas sems can gyis phyin ci log pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/_'dus pa las skye'o zhes smra'o/_/sems can gyis phyin 
[\[266b.5\]]ci log tu 'du shes pas yang dag pa'i bden pa med na ci'i phyir yang dag par bdag yod do zhes smra/_de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can ni bdag med par rtog go/_/gzhan yang ci'i rgyu dang ci'i rkyen gyis sems can gyis bdag tu 'dzin snyam du rtog ste/_bdag de 
[\[266b.6\]]yod pa zhig yin na bdag de gcig tu zad dam/_mang du yod snyam rtog go/_/gal te bdag de gcig tu zad na ci'i phyir rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_gdol rigs dang /_lha dang mi dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_
[\[266b.7\]]byol song gi skye gnas dang /_chen po dang /_chung ngu dang /_lang 'tsho ba dang /_rgas pa yod par gyur/_de bas na bdag ces bya ba ni gcig ma yin par rig go/_/bdag ces bya ba de gal te mang na ci'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi bdag ces bya ba de gcig ste/_
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]thams cad du khyab la mtha' med do zhes smra/_de bas na gcig dang mang po gnyis ka la bdag med do/_/mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar bdag med par rtogs nas rim gyis kha zas yongs su skyo bar byed pa'i 'du shes la rtog ste/_'di 
[\[267a.2\]]snyam du gal te chos thams cad mi rtag pa yang yin la sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa yin na ci'i phyir kha zas kyi phyir lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi dge ba bskyed par gyur/_sems can gyis kha zas la chags pa'i phyir lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las 
[\[267a.3\]]mi dge ba byas te/_zang zing thob pa rnams gzhan dang thun mong du gyur kyang sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa myong ba na thun mong du len pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu mkhas pa shes rab can ni gzhan yang 'di ltar rtog ste/_sems can thams cad ni kha zas kyi phyir
