[\[287b.5\]]dang /_yongs su dag pa ma mchis so zhes gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ngas ni phyi nang gi skye mched drug dang /_rnam par shes pa drug la rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag pa'o zhes ma gsungs kyi/_ngas ni phyi nang gi 
[\[287b.6\]]skye mched drug dang /_rnam par shes pa drug 'gags pa la rtag pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar rtag pas na bdag ces bya'o/_/rtag pa dang bdag yin pa'i phyir bde ba zhes bya'o/_/rtag pa dang bdag dang bde ba'i phyir yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu so so'i skye bo dag ni sdug 
[\[287b.7\]]bsngal mi 'dod de/_sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur pa yongs su bcad nas spong ba'i dbang du gyur pas bdag ces bya'o/_/de bas na ngas ni rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/sa nis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]pos bdag la bstan du gsol/_bdag gis ji lta bgyis na rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad ni thog ma med pa nas 
[\[288a.2\]]nga rgyal chen po dang bcas te/_nga rgyal chen po bskyed pa'i phyir nga rgyal gyi rgyur 'gyur ba dang nga rgyal gyis las su 'gyur ba byed do/_/de bas na nga rgyal gyi 'bras bu mngon par smin te/_nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su ma spangs pas rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su 
[\[288a.3\]]dag pa ma thob bo/_/gal te so so'i skye bo dag nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spong bar 'dod na/_nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/sa nis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/'phags pa'i bka' bzhin te bdag la nga rgyal mchis pas nga rgyal gyi dbang 
[\[288a.4\]]gis de bzhin gshegs pa zhes ma smos te gau ta ma zhes smras nas nga ma khyod kyang smras so/_/da ni bdag gis nga rgyal chen po yongs su spangs te de bas na yang dag pa'i sems kyis chos 'tshal na ji ltar rtag pa dang bde ba dang bdag dang /_yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[288a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu shin tu brtags par nyon la legs par yid la byos shig dang /_khyod la rnam par bkrol te bshad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gal te bdag kyang ma yin/_gzhan yang ma yin/_sems can yang ma yin na/_chos de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/sa 
[\[288a.6\]]nis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni rtogs te/_yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig kyang thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bur shes shing rtogs na yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig thob bo zhes smra/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs 
[\[288a.7\]]zhes bgyi ba gzhan ma lags/_bdag ma lags/_sems can ma lags pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du de ltar rtogs pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rab tu 'byung zhing lam la nan tan byed par mos na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]kyis legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal pas/_dge slong du gyur te de nyid du yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan zhing dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe mu stegs can de dag gi nang na kun tu rgyu 'od srung gi rigs can zhig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gau ta 
[\[288b.2\]]ma lus nyid srog lags sam/_lus dang srog gnyis tha dad pa lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du gsol kyang cang mi gsung ngo /_/kun tu rgyus yang gsol pa/_gau ta ma mi zhig tshe 'phos nas lus 
[\[288b.3\]]phyi ma ma blangs pa'i bar du lus kyang tha dad la/_srog kyang tha dad ces mi bgyi'am/_ji ste tha dad pa zhig lags na/_gau ta ma ci'i slad du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ngas ni lus dang srog gnyis ka rten cing 'brel te 'byung 
[\[288b.4\]]ba las skyes te/_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba ma yin pa las ma yin te/_lus dang srog ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/_/kun tu rgyus yang gsol pa/_gau ta ma bdag gis ni 'jig rten na chos kha cig rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba ma lags par mthong ngo /_/
[\[288b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi chos gang dag rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba ma yin par mthong /_kun tu rgyus gsol pa/_'di lta ste zhugs chen po shor ba na/_me lce rlung gis btab nas gnas gzhan dag kyang tshig par 'gyur ba de rten cing 'brel te 'byung 
[\[288b.6\]]ba ma lags pa zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ngas ni me de yang rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba las skyes te/_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba ma yin pa las ma yin no/_/kun tu rgyus gsol pa/_gau ta ma me lce chad de tshig pa ni shing ngam mdag me las byung ba ma 
[\[288b.7\]]lags na/_ci'i slad du rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba lags zhes gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu shing dang mdag me ni med mod kyi/_'on kyang rlung gi dbang gis me lce chad do/_/rlung gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis me lce med par ma gyur to/_/kun tu rgyus gsol pa/_
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]gau ta ma mi zhig tshe 'phos nas lus phyi ma ma blangs kyi bar du tshe len pa'i rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun du rgyu ma rig pa dang sred pa ni de'i rgyu de'i rkyen du 'gyur te/_ma rig pa dang sred pa gnyis kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi 
[\[289a.2\]]dbang gis 'tsho ba gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen gyi phyir lus nyid srog yin la srog nyid kyang lus yin no/_/rgyu dang rkyen gyi phyir lus kyang gzhan la srog kyang gzhan te/_mkhas pa shes rab can ni phyogs gcig tu lus kyang tha dad la srog kyang tha dad do zhes mi 
[\[289a.3\]]smra'o/_/kun du rgyus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la rnam par grol zhing bstan te/_rgyu dang 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun du rgyu rgyu yang phung po lnga yin te/_'bras bu yang phung po lnga yin no/_/rigs kyi 
[\[289a.4\]]bu gal te sems can dag me ma bus na dud pa med do/_/kun du rgyus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'tshal to rtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bur shes shing rtogs/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[289a.5\]]zhugs zhes bgyi ba ni nyon mongs pa ste/_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang byol song gi skye gnas dang /_lha dang mi'i gnas su shin tu 'bar ba'o/_/dud pa zhes bgyi ba ni nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu smin pa ste/_mi rtag pa dang mi gtsang ba dang shin tu btsog pas na dud 
[\[289a.6\]]pa zhes bgyi ste/_sems can gang nyon mongs pa ma byas na de la nyon mongs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis te/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas me ma bus na dud pa med do zhes gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yang dag par lta ba lags na/_thugs brtse ba'i 
[\[289a.7\]]slad du rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun du rgyu 'di rab tu phyung la bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig_/de nas kauN+Di n+yas sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin du dge slong 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]gi dge 'dun la dad pa gsol nas rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas zhag lnga lon pa dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/mu stegs can gyi 'khor gyi nang na gzhan yang kun du rgyu pu na zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gau ta ma khyod kyis 'jig rten na rtag pa'i 
[\[289b.2\]]chos gzigs pas rtag ces gsung ngam/_de skad ces gsungs pa bden nam [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]nam/_rtag gam mi rtag gam/_rtag pa dang mi rtag pa lags sam/_rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa lags sam/_mtha' mchis sam/_mtha' ma mchis pa lags sam/_mtha' 
[\[289b.3\]]mchis kyang mchis la mtha' ma mchis kyang ma mchis pa lags sam/_mtha' mchis pa yang ma lags mtha' ma mchis pa yang ma lags sam/_lus kyang lags srog kyang lags sam/_lus dang srog tha dad pa lags sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[289b.4\]]pa 'gro ba lta bu'am/_'gro ba lta bu ma lags sam/_'gro ba lta bu lags kyang lags la 'gro ba lta bu ma lags kyang ma lags sam/_'gro ba lta bu yang ma lags 'gro ba lta bu ma lags pa yang ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pu na ngas ni 'jig rten na 
[\[289b.5\]]rtag pa'am/_bden pa'am [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'am mi rtag pa'am rtag pa'am/_rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa'am/_mtha' yod pa'am mtha' med pa'am/_mtha' yod pa yang yin mtha' med pa yang yin pa'am/_mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin 
[\[289b.6\]]pa'am/_lus yin pa'am srog yin pa'am lus dang srog tha dad pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa 'gro ba lta bu'am/_mi 'gro ba lta bu'am 'gro ba lta bu yang ma yin la mi 'gro ba lta bu yang ma yin pa'am/_'gro ba lta bu yang ma yin 'gro ba lta bu ma 
[\[289b.7\]]yin pa yang ma yin par ma gsungs so/_/pu nas gsol pa/_gau ta ma skyon ci zhig gzigs na de skad ces mi gsung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la gang zhig 'jig rten ni rtag ste 'di ni bden gyi/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]no zhes smra na de ni lta ba'o/_/lta bas lta 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]ba'i gnas ni 'du byed du lta bas lta ba/_chags par lta ba bcings par lta ba sdug bsngal du lta ba len par lta ba 'jig par lta ba gdung bar lta ba'am/_kun nas dkris par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/pu na byis pa so so'i skye bo ni lta bas kun du dkris pas na/_skye ba dang /_
[\[290a.2\]]rga ba dang na ba dang /_'chi ba dang ma bral te rgyud drug tu 'khor nas sdug bsngal tshad med pa myong ste/_'gro ba lta bu ma yin pa dang /_mi 'gro ba lta bu ma yin pa'i bar du de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/pu na lta ba de la de lta bu'i skyon yod par mthong bas de bas na ma chags te gzhan la yang mi ston to/_/
[\[290a.3\]]pu nas gsol pa/_gau ta ma de lta bu'i skyon gzigs te ma chags mi ston na/_gau ta ma da lta ci la chags ci zhig ston/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chags par lta ba ni 'khor ba'i chos zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'khor ba'i chos dang bral bas ma 
[\[290a.4\]]chags pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni mthong ba dang ston pa zhes bya'i/_chags pa zhes mi bya'o/_/pu nas gsol pa/_gau ta ma ji lta bur gzigs/_ji lta bur ston/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ngas ni sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba 
[\[290a.5\]]dang /_'gog pa dang lam gsal bar gzigs te/_de bas na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par phye ste ston to/_/ngas de lta bu dag gzigs pas lta ba thams cad dang /_sred pa thams cad dang /_'thab pa thams cad dang /_nga rgyal thams cad yongs su spangs te/_de bas na bdag 
[\[290a.6\]]ni yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan zhing bla na med pa'i rab tu zhi bas rtag pa'i sku thob par gyur to/_/rtag pa'i sku 'di ni shar phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_lho phyogs dang /_byang phyogs ma yin no/_/pu nas gsol pa/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'di rtag pa'i sku shar 
[\[290a.7\]]phyogs dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ngas khyod la ci dang ci dris pa de dang de'i lan yid bzhin du smros shig_/rigs kyi bu 'di khyod kyis yid la ji snyam khyod kyi mdun du me chen po zhig 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]bus na me 'bar ba'i che khyod kyang 'bar bar shes mod/_de bzhin no/_/gau tam me shi ba'i tshe khyod kyang shi bar shes mod/_de bzhin no/_/pu na gal te mi zhig gis khyod la me'i phung po 'di 'bar ba gang nas 'ongs/_shi ba na gar song zhes 'dri na de la khyod ji skad ces bya/_pu nas 
[\[290b.2\]]gsol pa/_gau tam gal te de skad ces 'dri ba zhig mchis na de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyi'o/_/me 'bar ba ni rkyen mang po la ltos so/_/rkyen rnying pa ni zad rkyen gsar gyis ma bsnan pas na me zad pa zhes bgyi'o/_/gal te gzhan yang me shi nas gang phyogs su song 
[\[290b.3\]]zhes 'dri na/_de la ji skad ces bya/_gsol pa/_gau tam de la bdag gis rkyen zad nas me shi yang phyogs su song ba ma mchis so zhes bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_gal te mi rtag pa'i gzugs yod pa na sami rtag pa'i rnam par shes 
[\[290b.4\]]pa'i bar du yod na sred pa'i rkyen gyis 'bar ro/_/'bar ba zhes bya ba ni srid pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po myong ba'o/_/de bas na 'bar ba'i dus na me 'di ni shar phyogs sam/_nub phyogs sam/_lho phyogs sam/_byang phyogs zhes brjod du rung ngo /_/da ltar gyi sred pa 'gags te srid pa nyi shu rtsa 
[\[290b.5\]]lnga po'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi 'bar na de la ni shar phyogs sam/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang phyogs zhes brjad du med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtag pa'i gzugs med pa nas/_mi rtag pa'i rnam par shes pa'i bar du med de/_de bas na sku ni rtag pa 
[\[290b.6\]]yin no/_/gal te sku rtag pa yin na/_shar phyogs sam/_lho'am/_nub bam/_byang phyogs zhes brjod du med do/_/pu nas gsol pa/_bdag gis dpe zhig gsol bar 'tshal na/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsan par ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[290b.7\]]pa/_legs so legs so/_/bsams pa bzhin du smros shig_/bcom ldan 'das dper na grong khyer chen po zhig gi phyi rol na shing sA la'i tshal gyi nang na shing gcig cig sngar skyes te lo brgya lon/_/de'i tshe na tshal gyi bdag po de dus dus su chu 'chu zhing las bgyid do/_/shing 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]de'i shun pa rul na shun pa dang /_lo ma dang yal ga kun sa la ltung ste/_nang gi snying po 'ba' zhig lus so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_ji tsam du rul bar gyur pa thams cad zad nas yang dag pa'i chos 'ba' zhig lus so/_/
[\[291a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag rab tu dbyung bar gsol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal nas de ma thag tu dge slong du gyur te zag pa zad nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/gzhan yang kun du rgyu rnam par dag pa zhes bya bas 'di skad 
[\[291a.3\]]ces gsol to/_/gau ta ma so so'i skye bo dag chos gang ma rtogs na 'jig rten rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_rtag pa yang lags la mi rtag pa yang lags pa dang /_rtag pa yang ma lags la mi rtag pa yang ma lags pa nas/_'gro ba lta bu yang ma lags/_mi 'gro ba yang 
[\[291a.4\]]ma lags pa'i bar du lta bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gzugs mi shes pa nas/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi shes pas na 'jig rten rtag pa nas/_'gro ba lta bu yang ma yin/_mi 'gro ba lta bu yang ma yin pa'i bar du lta bar gyur 
[\[291a.5\]]to/_/kun du rgyus gsol pa/_gau ta ma sems can gyis chos gang dag rtogs na 'jig rten rtag pa nas/_'gro ba lta bu yang ma yin/_mi 'gro ba lta bu yang ma yin pa'i bar du mi lta bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gzugs shes 
[\[291a.6\]]pa nas/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du shes na/_'jig rten rtag pa nas/_'gro ba lta bu yang ma yin/_mi 'gro ba lta bu yang ma yin pa'i bar du mi lta bar 'gyur ro/_/kun du rgyus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten rtag pa dang mi rtag pa bdag la rgyas par phye ste bshad du 
[\[291a.7\]]gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang zhig gis rnying pa ni spangs nas las gsar ma byas na gang zag des ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/kun du rgyus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni rtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bur mthong /_ji lta bur rtogs/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnying pa ni ma rig pa dang sred pa'o/_/gsar pa ni len pa dang srid pa ste/_de la gang zhig gis ma rig pa dang sred pa yongs su spangs te/_len pa dang srid pa mi bgyid na gang 
[\[291b.2\]]zag de ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa yang dag par rtogs te/_bdag gis ni yang dag pa'i chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur nas/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bdag rab tu dbyung ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[291b.3\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/_kun du rgyu 'di rab tu phyung la bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig_/de nas kauN+Di n+yas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du dge 'dun la gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byas nas rab tu phyung ngo /_/de nas zhag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga lon pa dang /_zag pa 
[\[291b.4\]]kun zad de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/gzhan yang kun du rgyu be'u zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gau ta ma bdag zhu ba zhu na ci gnang ngam/_de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'o/_/be'us yang 
[\[291b.5\]]gsol pa/_gau ta ma bdag ni khyod dang mdza' bo yin te/_bdag cag gnyis kyi don yang gnyis su med na/_bdag gis dris pa ci'i phyir cang mi gsung bar bzhugs/_de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs la 'di snyam du dgongs so/_/kun du rgyu 'di rang bzhin gyis mnyen te 
[\[291b.6\]]des la shin tu drang bas/_nga dang bshes te dri ba 'dri ba yang klan ka tshol ba'i phyir ma yin na/_ci dang ci dris pa de dang de'i lan gdab bo snyam du dgongs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye be'u legs so legs so/_/ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_de dang de'i lan 
[\[291b.7\]]gdab par bya'o/_/be'us gsol pa/_gau ta ma 'jig rten na dge ba mchis sam/_de bzhin no/_/gau ta ma mi dge ba mchis sam de bzhin no/_/kun du rgyu be'us gsol pa/_gau ta ma bdag cag la bstan cing bshad de/_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bdag gis rtogs 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ngas ni don de dag ston pa la shin tu rgyas par mkhyen mod kyi/_da khyod la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'dod pa ni mi dge ba ste/_rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa ni dge 
[\[292a.2\]]ba'o/_/zhe sdang dang gti mug kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/srog gcod pa ni mi dge ba'o/_/srog gcod pa yongs su spangs pa ni dge ba nas/_ngan par lta ba'i bar du rgyas par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas ni khyod la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa gsum dang /_dge ba 
[\[292a.3\]]dang mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa bcu yang bstan cing bshad pa yin no/_/gal te nga'i nye gnas su gyur pa gang zhig dge ba dang mi dge ba rnam pa gsum nas/_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'i bar du bye brag phyed de nan tan du byed na/_gang zag des ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti 
[\[292a.4\]]mug med par 'gyur ba dang /_zag pa thams cad zad pa dang /_srid pa thams cad yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro/_/kun du rgyus gsol pa/_gau ta ma bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la/_dge slong 'ga' tsam yang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_zag pa thams 
[\[292a.5\]]cad zad pa dang /_srid pa thams cad yongs su bcad pa mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang /_zag pa thams cad dang /_srid pa thams cad zad pa gcig gam/_gnyis 
[\[292a.6\]]sam/_gsum mam/_lnga'am/_brgyar ma zad kyi/_de lta bu'i dge slong ni grangs med do/_/gau ta ma dge slong lta zhog la/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la/_dge slong ma 'ga' tsam 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_zag pa thams cad dang /_srid pa thams cad 
[\[292a.7\]]zad pa mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dge slong ma gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum mam lnga'am/_brgyar ma zad kyi/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang gti mug dang /_zag pa thams cad dang /_
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]srid pa thams cad zad pa'i dge slong ma ni grangs med do/_/be'us gsol pa/_gau ta ma dge slong pha dang dge slong ma yang zhog la/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la/_dge bsnyen 'ga' tsam yang tshul khrims srung ba la brtson zhing tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_the tsom 
[\[292b.2\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin te/_the tsom gyi dra ba yongs su chod pa mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la de lta bu'i dge bsnyen gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_lnga'am/_brgyar ma zad kyi/_tshul khrims bsrung ba la brtson 
[\[292b.3\]]zhing tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag nas kun nas nyon mongs pa tha ma lnga po bcad de lan cig phyir mi ldog pa thob nas the tshom gyi pha rol tu phyin te the tsom gyi dra ba yongs su bcad pa'i dge bsnyen ni grangs med do/_/be'us yang gsol pa/_gau ta ma dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen 
[\[292b.4\]]pha yang zhog la/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dge bsnyen ma 'ga' tsam tshul khrims srung ba la brtson zhing tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_the tshom gyi pha rol tu phyin te/_the tshom gyi dra ba chod pa mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs 
[\[292b.5\]]rgyas kyi bstan pa la dge bsnyen ma de lta bu gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_lnga'am/_brgyar ma zad kyi/_tshul khrims srung ba la brtson zhing tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa tha ma lnga po chod nas lan cig phyir mi ldog pa thob nas 
[\[292b.6\]]the tshom gyi pha rol tu phyin te the tshom gyi dra ba chod pa'i dge bsnyen ma ni grangs med do/_/be'us gsol pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la tshul khrims srung ba la brtson zhing tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_the tshom gyi dra ba yongs su bcad pa'i dge slong pha dang /_dge 
[\[292b.7\]]slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma lta zhog la/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dge bsnyen 'ga' yang 'dod pa lnga la longs mi spyod cing the tshom gyi dra ba chod pa mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dge 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]bsnyen de lta bu ni gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_lnga'am/_brgyar ma zad kyi/_kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum bcad nas rgyun du zhugs pa thob nas 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs te/_lan cig phyir ldog pa thob pa'i 
[\[293a.2\]]dge bsnyen yang grangs med do/_/dge bsnyen ji lta ba bzhin du dge bsnyen ma yang rgyas par rig par bya'o/_/be'us gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag dpe zhig gsol bar dad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu legs kyis ji dga' bar smros shig_/
[\[293a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das dper na klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_bsnyen dga' bo kun du khyab par char chen po 'bebs pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi char yang de dang 'dra ste/_dge bsnyen pha dang dge bsnyen ma la mnyam par phab bo/_/be'us gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[293a.4\]]gal te mu stegs can dag rab tu byung bar gsol na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba du'i bar du brtag 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu zla ba bzhi'i bar du brtag dgos te gcig tu nges pa ni ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te gcig tu ma nges na thugs 
[\[293a.5\]]rje chen pos bdag rab tu dbyung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/_kun du rgyu be'u 'di rab tu phyung la bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig_/de nas kauN+Di n+yas sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du dge slong gi dge 'dun la 
[\[293a.6\]]gsol pa dang zhu ba'i las byas nas rab tu phyung ngo /_/de nas zhag bco lnga lon pa dang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'bras bu thob nas yang 'di snyam du sems so/_/gang shes rab kyis slob pa'i sgo nas thob par 'gyur ba ni bdag gis nga thob pas sangs rgyas 
[\[293a.7\]]mthong bar bzod do snyam nas sangs rgyas gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bsti stang byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/shes rab gang bslab pa las thob par 'gyur 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]ba ni bdag gis thob lags na/_bdag gis bslab pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur ba bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos gnyis te/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brtson 'grus su nan tan bya'o/_/rigs 
[\[293b.2\]]kyi bu dge slong zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod na chos rnam pa gnyis po la brtson 'grus su nan tan bya'o/_/gang zhig gis lan cig phyir ldog pa dang /_lan cig phyir mi ldog pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod na yang /_chos rnam pa 
[\[293b.3\]]gnyis po la nan tan bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dge slong gang zhig bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_skyes bu brgyad dang /_mchog gi gnas brgyad dang /_rtsod pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_spyi bo'i ye shes dang /_mthar phyin pa'i ye 
[\[293b.4\]]shes dang /_so sor yang dag par shes pa bzhi dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zad pa'i ye shes dang /_mi skye ba'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa yang chos gnyis po de la nan tan bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang zhig gis sa bcu dang /_ma skyes pa'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /_
[\[293b.5\]]mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /_'phags pa'i spyod pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa dang /_lhas spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas spyod pa dang /_nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting 
[\[293b.6\]]nge 'dzin dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[293b.7\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa 'dod pa yang chos rnam pa gnyis po la nan tan bya'o/_/be'us de skad ces thos nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyir byung nas shing sA la'i tshal du chos gnyis po la nan tan byas pas ring por ma thogs par dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na dge slong grangs med pa zhig sangs rgyas gang na bar 'dong ba las be'us mthong nas btsun pa gar 'dong zhes smras so/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mchi'o/_/be'us yang smras pa/_
[\[294a.2\]]btsun pa dag sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar gshegs na be'u'i mchid nas chos rnam pa gnyis la nan tan bgyis na bslab pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab thob ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin dran pa'i slad du mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gsol cig_/de'i tshe dge slong de rnams sangs 
[\[294a.3\]]rgyas gang na ba der phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong be'u'i mchid nas bdag ni bslab pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin gzo ba'i slad du mya ngan las 'da'o zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[294a.4\]]stsal pa/_dge slong be'u dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob kyis de'i lus la khyed mchod pa gyis shig_/de'i tshe dge slong rnams sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du rus bu gang na ba der song nas mchod pa chen po byas so//_//'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen 
[\[294a.5\]]po'i mdo/_bam po lnga bcu gsum pa/_de'i tshe kun tu rgyu tshem bu can gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gau ta ma gsung ba ltar skye ba grangs med pa'i bar du dge ba dang mi dge ba bgyis pa'ang phyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lus thob par 'gyur ro 
[\[294a.6\]]zhes bgyis pa de mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gau ta ma gsung ba ltar nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las lus thob par gyur to zhes bgyi ba ji ste nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las lus thob par gyur na lus snga'am nyon mongs pa snga/_ji ste nyon mongs pa snga na ci la gnas/_gang du gnas ci ste 
[\[294a.7\]]lus snga na nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las thob ces bgyir rung ngam/_de bas na nyon mongs pa snga zhes bgyir yang mi rung la/_lus snga zhes bgyir yang mi rung ngo /_/dus gcig go zhes bgyir yang mi rung /_snga phyi dus gcig ces bgyir yang chos ma mchis so/_/de bas 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]na bdag ni chos thams cad rang bzhin du zad de/_rgyu dang rkyen las ni ma yin no zhes smra'o/_/gzhan yang gau ta ma sra ba ni sa'i rang bzhin/_gsher ba ni chu'i rang bzhin/_tsha ba ni me'i rang bzhin/_g.yo ba ni rlung gi rang bzhin/_thogs pa med pa ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin 
[\[294b.2\]]te/_chen po lnga'i rang bzhin ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis yod pa ma lags so/_/ci ste 'jig rten na chos gcig tsam gyi rang bzhin rgyu dang rkyen gyis mchis pa ma lags na/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra ste/_rgyu dang rkyen gyis mchis pa ma lags so/_/ji ste chos 
[\[294b.3\]]gcig tsam yang rgyu dang rkyen gyis mchis pa lags na/_ci'i slad du chen po lnga'i rang bzhin rgyu dang rkyen las ma gyur/_gau ta ma sems can gyis dge ba'i lus dang mi dge ba'i lus kyis rnam par grol ba thob pa yang rang bzhin lags kyi/_rgyu dang rkyen las ni ma lags so/_/
[\[294b.4\]]de bas na chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yod kyi rgyu dang rkyen las ni ma yin par bdag smra'o/_/gzhan yang gau ta ma 'jig rten gyi chos ni dgos pa'i gnas gcig tu chad pa'o/_/dper na shing mkhan na re shing 'di ni shing rta dang khyogs su 'os so/_/shing 'di ni sgo dang /_khri 'ur 
[\[294b.5\]]rung ngo zhes smra ba dang /_dper na gser mgar gyis brdungs su byas te 'phral ba la btags pa ni phreng ba zhes bya/_mgul du btags pa ni do shal zhes bya/_dpung pa la btags pa ni dpung rgyan zhes bya/_sor mo la btags pa ni sor gdub ces bya ste/_dgos pa'i gnas nges 
[\[294b.6\]]pas na rang bzhin nges pa zhes bya'o/_/gau ta ma sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_rgyud lnga'i rang bzhin yod pas sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_byol song dang /_lha dang /_mi'o/_/ji ste de lta bu lags na rgyu dang rkyen las 'gyur zhes bgyir rung 
[\[294b.7\]]ngam/_gau ta ma gzhan yang sems can thams cad rang bzhin so so ste/_de bas na thams cad rang bzhin zhes bgyi'o/_/dper na ru sbal thang las skyes kyang chur 'gro ba dang /_be'u 'brangs ma thag tu nu ba dang nya mchil pa mid pa dang sbrul gdug pa byung ma thag tu sa za ba 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]dang /_de dag la sogs pa sus bstan/_dper na tsher ma rang bzhin gyis rno ba dang /_bya'i 'dab ma rang bzhin gyis kha dog tha dad pa ltar 'jig rten gyi sems can yang de dang 'dra ste/_dbang po rno ba dang /_rtul ba dang phyug pa dang dbul ba dang bzang ba 
[\[295a.2\]]dang ngan pa dang rnam par grol ba thob pa dang /_srid pa tha ma thob par gyur te/_de bas na chos thams cad rang bzhin so so bar rig par bya'o/_/gzhan yang /_gau ta ma gsung ba ltar 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug ni rgyu dang rkyen las skyes te gdug pa gsum 
[\[295a.3\]]gyi rgyu dang rkyen ni yul lnga yin no zhes bgyi ba de yang mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_dper na sems can gnyid log pa'i tshe yul lnga mngon du mi spyod kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug skyes te mngal na 'dug pa dang /_mngal nas byung ma thag pa yang yul 
[\[295a.4\]]lnga'i bzang po dang /_ngan pa bye brag mi phyed kyang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug skye'o/_/drang srong 'phags pa'i rnams dgon par gnas pa yang yul lnga mngon du mi spyod kyang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug skye'o/_/kha cig ni yul drug 
[\[295a.5\]]gi dbang gis 'dod mi chags pa dang /_zhe mi sdang ba dang /_gti mi mug pa yang yod de de bas na rgyu dang rkyen las chos thams cad skye'o zhes nges pa med kyi/_rang bzhin du zad do/_/gau ta ma gzhan yang 'jig rten na kha cig ni dbang po lnga dang mi ldan yang longs spyod chen po dang 
[\[295a.6\]]ldan zhing dbang du 'gyur ba yang yod do/_/kha cig ni dbang po dang ldan yang ngan cing dbul la dbang med de gzhan gyi bran byed pa yang yod na/_ji ste rgyu dang rkyen las gyur na ci'i slad du de ltar gyur/_de bas na chos thams cad rang bzhin ni so so ste rgyu dang rkyen las ma yin no/_/
[\[295a.7\]]gau ta ma gzhan yang 'jig rten na bus pa shed ma bye ba yang yul lnga bye brag mi phyed mod kyi/_bar 'ga' ni dgod/_bar 'ga' ni ngu'o/_/dgod pa'i tshe ni dga' bar shes kyi/_ngu ba'i tshe mi dga' bar shes so/_/de bas na chos thams cad so so'i rang bzhin yod do/_/gau ta 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]ma gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi chos la rnam pa gnyis te/_yod pa dang med pa'o/_/yod pa ni nam mkha'o/_/med pa ni ri bong gi rwa'o/_/de ltar chos gnyis po yang yod pa yang rgyu dang rkyen ma yin/_med pa yang rgyu dang rkyen ma yin te/_de bas na chos thams cad rang bzhin du 
[\[295b.2\]]zad kyi/_rgyu dang rkyen las ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar chen po lnga'i rang bzhin dang 'dra bar chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyi chos la chen po lnga rtag pa yin na 
[\[295b.3\]]ci'i phyir chos thams cad rtag pa ma yin no zhes smra/_ji ste 'jig rten gyi dngos po mi rtag pa zhig yin na chen po lnga'i rang bzhin ci'i phyir mi rtag pa ma yin/_ji ste chen po lnga rtag pa zhig yin na 'jig rten gyi dngos po yang rtag pa yin pa'i rigs te/_de bas na khyod 
[\[295b.4\]]kyis chen po lnga'i rang bzhin yod pas rgyu dang rkyen las ma yin te/_chos thams cad kyang chen po lnga dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba mi rung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar dgos pa'i gnas nges pa na rang bzhin yod do zhes bya bar yang mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyu dang 
[\[295b.5\]]rkyen las ming khyer thob pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ste rgyu las ming khyer thob na don yang rgyu las ming khyer thob bo/_/ji ltar rgyu las ming khyer thob pa zhe na/_dper na 'phral bar btags pa ni phreng ba zhes bya ba dang /_mgul du btags pa ni do shal zhes bya ba dang /_lag pa la btags 
[\[295b.6\]]pa ni gdu bu ces bya ba dang /_shing rta la btags pa ni 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang /_shing dang rtswa las 'bar na shing dang rtswa'i me zhes bya ba dang /_rigs kyi bu shing thog ma skyes pa na mda' dang /_mdung gi rang bzhin med mod kyi/_rgyu dang rkyen gyis bzos mda' dang mdung du byed 
[\[295b.7\]]do/_/de bas na chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod ces bya ba'i mi rigs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar ru sbal thang las skyes kyang rang bzhin gyis chur 'gro ba dang /_be'u 'brangs ma thag tu rang bzhin gyis nu'o zhes bya ba de yang mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chur 'gro ba 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]rgyu dang rkyen ma yin la/_gnyis ka rgyu dang rkyen yin par 'dra na/_ci'i phyir me'i nang du mi 'gro/_be'u 'brangs ma thag tu rang bzhin gyis nu ba rgyu dang rkyen ma yin/_gnyis ka rgyu dang rkyen ma yin par 'dra bas ci'i phyir rwa la mi nu/_rigs kyi bu ji ste chos 
[\[296a.2\]]thams cad la rang bzhin yod de/_bstan cing bslabs kyang skyed spogs med do zhes smra na yod du mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_da ltar bstan cing bslab pa las skyed spogs yod par snang ste/_de bas na rang bzhin zhes bya ba med par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu ji ste 
[\[296a.3\]]chos thams cad la rang bzhin zhes bya ba yod na bram ze thams cad lus kyi las yang dag par bya ba'i phyir lug bsad de lha rjed pa'i mi rigs so/_/ji ste rjed pas dag par gyur na rang bzhin yang med par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi smra ba'i chos la rnam pa gsum ste/_bya 
[\[296a.4\]]ba dang byed pa dang byas pa'o/_/ji ste chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod na ci'i phyir 'jig rten na rnam pa gsum du btags par gyur/_rnam pa gsum du btags pa las na thams cad la rang bzhin med par mngon no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ste chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod na chos 
[\[296a.5\]]thams cad la so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin yod par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste gcig tu chad pa'i nges pa'i rang bzhin yod na bu ram gyi shing las ci'i phyir skom dang /_sha kha ra dang /_bu ram dang /_chang dang /_kha ba'i chang du 'gyur/_ji ste rang bzhin gcig na/_ci'i phyir dngos po de dag 
[\[296a.6\]]byung bar gyur/_ji ste dngos po gcig po las de lta bu dag byung na/_chos thams cad la rang bzhin gcig tu nges te so so'i rang bzhin gcig tu mi rung bar rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu ji ste chos thams cad rang bzhin gcig tu nges na/_ci'i phyir 'phags pa dag bu ram 
[\[296a.7\]]shing gi skom dang sha kha ra dang bu ram gyi tshe btung du rung la/_chang gi tshe btung du mi rung zhing phyir yang kha ba'i chang du gyur pa na btung du rung /_de bas na nges pa'i rang bzhin med par rig par bya'o/_/ji ste nges pa'i rang bzhin med na rgyu dang rkyen las ma gyur ces byar ga la rung /_
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod do zhes bya ba ji lta bur dpe bstan du rung /_ji ste dpe brjod du yod na chos thams cad la rang bzhin med par rig par bya'o/_/ji ste rang bzhin yod na ni dpe byar med par rig par bya'o/_/'jig rten na mkhas pa shes rab 
[\[296b.2\]]can dpe ston te/_de bas na chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang rang bzhin gcig tu nges pa med par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar lus snga'am nyon mongs pa snga zhes bya ba de yang mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji ste ngas lus snga'o/_/zhes brjod na ni khyod kyis nga 
[\[296b.3\]]dang 'thun no zhe'am/_lus mi snga'o zhes brgal du yang rung na/_rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi lus dang nyon mongs pa ni gnyis ka snga phyi med de/_dus gcig tu yod do/_/de ltar dus gcig tu yod mod kyi/_'on kyang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las lus yod par gyur gyi 
[\[296b.4\]]lus kyi rgyu las nyon mongs par gyur pa ma yin no/_/ji ste khyod kyi yid la dper na mi'i mig gnyis kyang dus gcig tu thob ste gcig la gcig mi ltos pa ni g.yas pa g.yon pa la mi ltos la/_g.yon pa'ang g.yas pa la mi ltos pa dang 'dra bar nyon mongs pa dang lus kyang de 
[\[296b.5\]]dang 'dra bar sems na de yang mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten na mig gis bltar snang ba me mar gyi snying po dang snang ba gnyis dus gcig tu yod mod kyi/_snying po'i rgyus snang bar gyur gyi snying po med pa las snang ba ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ci khyod kyi yid la 
[\[296b.6\]]lus mi snga bas rgyu med par sems na de yang mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji ste lus snga bas rgyu dang rkyen med pa'i phyir med pa zhes bya na lta khyod kyang chos thams cad la rgyu dang rkyen med do zhes smra ba'i rigs so/_/ji ste bltar mi snang ba'i phyir de skad ces mi smra na yang da ltar rdza 
[\[296b.7\]]ma la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar mngon sum du bltar snang na ci'i phyir de skad ces mi smra/_ji ltar rdza ma dang 'dra bar lus snga ba'i rgyu dang rkyen kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu snang yang rung mi snang yang rung chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las byung gi rang bzhin 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]med do/_/rigs kyi bu ji ste chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod de/_rgyu dang rkyen med do zhes smra na/_khyod ci'i phyir chen po lnga yod do zhes smra/_chen po lnga'i rang bzhin nyid ni rgyu dang rkyen yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chen po lnga'i rgyu dang rkyen ni de lta bu yin mod kyi/_
[\[297a.2\]]chos thams cad kyang chen po lnga'i rgyu dang rkyen du 'thun no zhes smra ba'i mi rigs so/_/dper na 'jig rten gyi gtam du rab tu byung ba thams cad ni tshul khrims srung ba la brtson pa yin pas gdol pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin du tshul khrims srung ba la brtson pa yin no/_/zhes brjod 
[\[297a.3\]]pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar chen po lnga la nges pa'i rang bzhin yod do zhes smra ba ni ngas bltas na rang bzhin de ni 'gyur ba ste nges pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi chos la mar dang spra tshil dang spra rtsi la sa zhes bya ste/_khyod kyis sa zhes btags 
[\[297a.4\]]pa de ni ma nges te bar bar ni chu lta bur yang btub/_bar bar ni sa lta bur yang btub ste/_de bas na rang bzhin gyis sra ba'o zhes byar mi rung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi chos la tshon mo stengs dang /_zha nye dang /_zangs dang /_lcags dang /_gser dang /_dngul la me'o zhes 
[\[297a.5\]]bya ba de la rang bzhin bzhi yod de/_'bab pa'i tshe ni chu zhes bya/_g.yo ba'i tshe ni rlung zhes bya/_tsha ba'i tshe ni me zhes bya/_sra ba'i tshe ni sa zhes bya na ci'i phyir de la nges par me'i rang bzhin no zhes gdags/_rigs kyi bu chu'i rang bzhin ni 'bab pa ste/_gal te chu 'khyags kyang 
[\[297a.6\]]de la sa zhes mi bya'o/_/'on kyang chu zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dba' rlabs g.yo ba'i tshe rlung zhes mi bya'o/_/de ltar g.yo ba la rlung zhes mi bya na 'khyags kyang chu ma yin zhes byar mi rung ngo /_/de ltar dngos po gnyis po yang rgyu dang rkyen las gyur na ci'i phyir chos thams 
[\[297a.7\]]cad rgyu dang rkyen las ma gyur ces smra/_rigs kyi bu ji ste dbang po lnga rang bzhin gyis mthong ba dang thos pa dang tshor ba dang /_shes pa dang reg pa yang rang bzhin yin te/_rgyu dang rkyen las ma gyur to zhes bya ba ni mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu rang bzhin 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]nyid kyis rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba zhig yin na mig gi rang bzhin mthong ba yang rtag tu mthong ba'i rigs te/_mthong ba dang mi mthong ba'i dus kyang med pa'i rigs so/_/de bas na rgyu dang rkyen gyis mthong gi rgyu dang rkyen med pa las ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi 
[\[297b.2\]]bu khyod smra ba ltar 'dod chags skye ba dang rnam par grol ba ni yul lnga'i rgyu las ma yin no zhes bya ba de yang mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'dod chags skye ba dang rnam par grol ba yul lnga po'i rgyu las ma gyur mod kyi/_/mi dge ba rnam par rtog pa'i phyir 'dod chags 
[\[297b.3\]]skye'o/_/dge bar rnam par rtogs pa'i phyir rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu nang gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'dod chags skye ba dang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis skye zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na khyod chos thams cad la so so'i rang bzhin yod de 
[\[297b.4\]]'dod chags skye ba dang rnam par grol ba yang yul lnga'i rgyu las ma yin zhes bya ba de mi rung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar dbang po rnams dang ldan pa rnams ni dbul phongs la dbang yang med/_dbang po dang mi ldan zhing nyams pa ni longs spyod che zhing dbang dang ldan te/_de las 
[\[297b.5\]]bltas na rang bzhin yod de rgyu dang rkyen las ma yin no zhes bya ba de mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can ni las las 'bras bu rnam par smin te/_de ltar 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang rnam pa gsum ste/_mngon sum du smin pa dang /_skyes nas smin pa dang phyis smin pa'o/_/dbul 
[\[297b.6\]]phongs pa dang phyug skyid pa dang dbang po dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa yang so so ba yin no/_/rang bzhin yod na dbang po dang ldan pa ni longs spyod che ba'i rigs/_longs spyod che ba ni dbang po dang ldan pa'i rigs so/_/de de ltar ma gyur pas de bas na nges par rang bzhin med de rgyu dang rkyen las 
[\[297b.7\]]gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar 'jig rten na byis pa shed ma bye ba yul lnga po bye brag mi phyed pas bar bar ni ngu /_bar bar ni dgod de/_de bas na thams cad la rang bzhin yod de zhes bya ba de yang mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji ste rang bzhin yod na dgod pa yang rtag tu dgod/_
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]ngu ba yang rtag tu ngu ba'i rigs te/_res 'ga' ni dgod/_res 'ga' ni ngu ba'i mi rigs so/_/de ltar res 'ga' ni dgod/_res 'ga' ni ngu ba las na thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las 'gyur bar rig par bya ste/_de bas na chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod de rgyu dang 
[\[298a.2\]]rkyen las ma yin no zhes bya ba'i mi rigs so/_/kun tu rgyus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba yin na/_lus 'di rgyu dang rkyen gang las byung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu lus 'di'i rgyu dang rkyen ni nyon mongs pa dang las 
[\[298a.3\]]so/_/kun tu rgyus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lus 'di nyid nyon mongs pa dang las las gyur na nyon mongs pa dang las 'di gcad du rung ngam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/kun tu rgyus yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la rnam par 
[\[298a.4\]]phye ste bstan pas bdag gis thos nas gnas 'di nyid las ma g.yos par yongs su chod par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gal te mtha' gnyis shes la dbu ma la thogs pa med na gang zag des ni nyon mongs pa dang las yongs su chod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[298a.5\]]kun tu rgyus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni shes shing rtogs te dam pa'i chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji lta bur shes shing rtogs/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mtha' gnyis ni gzugs dang /_gzugs kyi rnam par 
[\[298a.6\]]grol ba'o/_/dbu ma zhes bgyi ba ni 'phags pa'i lam brgyad de/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin du rgyas par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu mtha' gnyis shin tu rtogs te/_nyon mongs 
[\[298a.7\]]pa dang las yongs su chod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal pas dge slong du gyur te/_de'i tshe khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa kun chod nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]bu thob par gyur to/_/de nas gzhan yang bram ze shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya bas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gau ta ma bdag ci sems pa mkhyen nam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu mya ngan las 'das pa ni rtag pa'o/_/'dus byas ni mi rtag pa'o/_/yon po ni ngan par 
[\[298b.2\]]lta ba'o/_/drang po ni 'phags pa'i lam mo/_/bram zes gsol pa/_gau ta ma ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis de skad ces gsungs/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la bsod snyoms byed pa ni rtag pa/_mgron du bos pa ni mi rtag pa/_yon po ni ma rabs/_drang po ni rgyal mtshan no 
[\[298b.3\]]snyam sems te/_de bas na mya ngan las 'das pa ni rtag pa/_'dus byas ni mi rtag pa/_yon po ni ngan par lta ba/_drang po ni 'phags pa'i lam brgyad de/_khyod kyis sngon sems pa lta bu ni ma yin no/_/bram zes gsol pa/_gau ta ma bdag gis bsams pa yang dag par mkhyen 
[\[298b.4\]]no/_/'phags pa'i lam brgyad kyis sems can thams cad rnam par grol bar 'gyur ram/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ste lan ma btab bo/_/bram zes gsol pa/_gau ta ma bdag gis bsams pa mkhyen na ci'i slad du bdag gis zhus pa'i lan ma gnang nas cang mi 
[\[298b.5\]]gsung bar bzhugs/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze chen po gal te 'jig rten mtha' yod dam mtha' med ces 'dri na de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid kyis cang mi gsung ste lan mi 'debs so/_/'phags pa'i lam brgyad ni drang 
[\[298b.6\]]po'o/_/mya ngan las 'da' ba ni rtag pa'o/_/gal te 'phags pa'i lam brgyad la nan tan byas na rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste nan tan ma byas na thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/bram ze chen po dper na mkhar chen po zhig gi ngos bzhi na thar ba'i khung dang lam med de sgo gcig 
[\[298b.7\]]pu yod na de'i sgo srungs mkhas pa shes rab dang ldan na gang gtang ba'i rigs pa ni gtong ngo /_/gang gtang ba'i mi rigs pa ni mi gtong ste/_ji snyed rgyu ba grangs nyid mi shes kyang /_rgyu ba thams cad sgo de la rgyu bar nges par shes so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]ste/_mkhar ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dpe'o/_/sgo ni 'phags pa'i lam brgyad kyi dpe'o/_/sgo srungs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa dang mi zad pa'i lan ma gsungs mod kyi/_ji tsam du zad par 'gyur ba de ni 
[\[299a.2\]]'phags pa'i lam brgyad nan tan byed pa las 'gyur ro/_/bram zes smras pa/_legs so legs so/_/btsun pa kauN+Di n+yas de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i chos ston pa la shin tu mkhas so/_/bdag kyang mkhar dang lam shes shing sgo srungs lta bur dad do/_/kauN+Di n+yas smras pa/_
[\[299a.3\]]legs so/_/bram ze bla na med pa rgya che ba'i sems bskyed pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun shes kauN+Di n+ya de skad ma zer cig_/bram ze 'di ni da gdod de ltar sems bskyed pa ma yin gyi/_kauN+Di n+ya sngon 'das pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa 
[\[299a.4\]]snyed 'das pa'i snga rol na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/_mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten rig pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi'i ston pa 
[\[299a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs te/_sangs rgyas de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bskal pa bzang po 'dir mngon par sangs rgyas te/_chos kyi mtshan nyid khong du chud cing rtogs nas yun ring mod kyi/_sems can gyi 
[\[299a.6\]]phyir mu stegs can du ston te mi shes pa ltar byed do/_/de bas na kauN+Di n+ya khyod bla na med pa'i sems bskyed pa legs so legs so zhes ma zer cig_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya la dge slong dga' bo da ltar gang na 'dug ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[299a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+yas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong dga' bo ni da ltar shing sA la'i tshal 'di nas dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi pha rol na bdud drug khri bzhi stong snyed kyis yongs su gtse zhing mchis so/_/bdud de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su sprul 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]nas/_la la ni chos thams cad rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba yin no zhes smra/_la la ni chos thams cad rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba ma yin no zhes smra/_la la ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos thams cad rtag pa yin no zhes smra/_la la ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i 
[\[299b.2\]]chos thams cad mi rtag pa yin no zhes smra/_la la ni phung po lnga bden pa yin no zhes smra/_la la ni sgyu ma yin no zhes smra ste/_de bzhin du skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rgyas par ro/_/la la ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba yod do zhes smra/_la la ni rkyen bzhi 
[\[299b.3\]]'ba' zhig yod do zhes smra/_la la ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu dang /_smig rgyu ba lta bu'o zhes smra/_la la ni thos pa'i rgyu las chos thob po zhes smra/_la la ni bsams pa'i rgyu las chos thob po zhes smra/_la la ni bsgoms pa'i rgyu las chos 
[\[299b.4\]]thob bo zhes smra/_la la ni mi sdug pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i chos smra/_la la ni dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i chos smra/_la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yang dag par rtog pa smra/_la la ni yang dag pa'i spyod pa'i don gsum dang thabs mkhas pa bdun po smra/_
[\[299b.5\]]la la ni drod dang /_spyi bo dang /_bzod pa dang /_'jig rten mchog gi chos dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas sa bcu pa'i bar du smra'o/_/la la ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa smra/_la la ni mdo'i 
[\[299b.6\]]sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_da ltar dang /_'das pa'i sde dang /_skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_rmad du byung 
[\[299b.7\]]ba'i sde dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /_gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde yang smra'o/_/la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]dang /_'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad smra'o/_/la la ni nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang /_tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 
[\[300a.2\]]dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_phung po stong pa nyid dang /_khams stong pa dang /_skye mched stong pa dang /_dge ba stong pa 
[\[300a.3\]]dang /_mi dge ba stong pa dang /_lung du mi ston pa stong pa dang /_byang chub stong pa dang /_lam stong pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa stong pa dang /_spyod pa stong pa dang /_thob pa stong pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[300a.4\]]kyang ston to/_/la la ni mngon par shes pa ston to/_/lus las chu dang me 'byung ste/_lus kyi stod nas chu 'bab na/_lus kyi smad nas me 'bar/_lus kyi smad nas chu 'bab na/_lus kyi stod nas me 'bar/_mchan g.yas pa 'og tu phab na mchan g.yon 
[\[300a.5\]]nas chu 'byung /_mchan g.yon pa 'og tu phab na g.yas nas chu 'byung /_mchan khung gcig nas 'brug bsgrags na mchan khung gcig nas char 'bab pa yang ston to/_/la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yang ston to/_/la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thog ma lhums 
[\[300a.6\]]nas bltams nas gom pa bdun bdun gshegs pa dang /_pho brang na 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod pa dang /_thog ma rab tu byung ba nas dka' ba mdzad pa dang /_byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa dang /_bdud kyi sde rnams phab nas chos kyi 
[\[300a.7\]]'khor lo skor ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong dga' bos de lta bu'i dngos po dag mthong nas/_de yid la 'di snyam du rdzu 'phrul sngon ma mthong ba 'di dag sus byas/_bcom ldan 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]'das shAkya thub pas mdzad pa ma yin nam snyam sems te/_langs sam smra'am ci bgyi ba'i gtol ma mchis so/_/dge slong dga' bo ni bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa yang 'di snyam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa ni so sor mi 'thun na/_
[\[300b.2\]]bdag gis da gang gzung snyam sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong dga' bo ni de ltar sdug bsngal chen po myong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa yid la dran yang dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba ma mchis pas/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir ma mchis pa lags so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[300b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas skye ba gcig 
[\[300b.4\]]lon pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed nas skye ba tshad med pa snyed lon te/_sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la mchod pas mchod pa sems shin tu brtan pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su 
[\[300b.5\]]rdzogs te/_yon tan dang ldan pa yun ring po nas/_sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i gzungs thob 
[\[300b.6\]]pa dang /_chos kyi bzod pa thob pa dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs te ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa thob pa 'di dag gis ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la nam du yang the tsom mi 'byung zhing /_dkon mchog gsum mtshan nyid gcig pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_gnas 
[\[300b.7\]]pa dang /_mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba rnam par 'byed cing ston pa la yang shin tu mkhas te/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thos na yang ngo mtshar rmad du mi 'dzin la/_stong pa nyid rnam pa mang po thos kyang sems mi zhum mi skrag pas chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyang mngon du rtogs 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]par bgyid/_mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'dzin cing don la yang shin tu mkhas te/_de ma lags pa sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed kyi mdo sde gsung rab bcu gnyis kyang 'dzin nus pa mchis na ci'i slad du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin 
[\[301a.2\]]mi nus snyam dgongs nas kauN+Di n+ya la dge slong dga' bo ga re zhes bka' stsal/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig_/rigs kyi bu nga mngon par sangs rgyas nas lo sum cu lhag lon 
[\[301a.3\]]te/_rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs pa na de'i tshe de'i dus na ngas dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag khyed su zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis 'dzin cing nga'i g.yog kyang byed la/_bdag gi don yang byed nus 
[\[301a.4\]]zhes bka' stsal pa na/_'khor gyi nang na tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab bcu gnyis 'dzin cing /_de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad pa'i g.yog dang /_bdag gi 
[\[301a.5\]]don kyang bgyid nus so zhes gsol to/_/de la ngas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kauN+Di n+ya khyod nyid kyang rgas 'khogs te/_g.yog sbyin dgos na khyod kyis nga'i g.yog ji ltar bya/_de nas shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bdag gis ni gsung rab thams cad 'dzin cing 
[\[301a.6\]]mdzad pa thams cad kyi g.yog kyang bgyid la/_bdag gi don yang bgyid nus so zhes gsol to/_/de'i tshe shA ri'i bu la yang khyod nyid kyang rgas 'khogs te g.yog dgos na/_nga'i g.yog ji ltar bya zhes bka' stsal pa nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgya'i bar du gsol 
[\[301a.7\]]nas ngas ma gnang ba ni de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o/_/de'i tshe maud gal ya na 'khor de'i nang du 'dus par gyur te/_de yid la 'di snyam du bsams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong lnga brgya po gang yang g.yog tu ma gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das thugs 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]gang la dad snyam bsams te/_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dga' bo la dgyes pa ni ji ltar nyi ma thog ma shar na nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la snang ba dang 'dra bar sems kyis rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin las langs te/_kauN+Di n+ya la 'di skad ces 
[\[301b.2\]]smras so/_/btsun pa bdag gis brtags na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhabs 'bring du dga' bo dgyes so/_/de nas kauN+Di n+ya dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang bcas te dga' bo gang na bar song nas dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dga' bo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[301b.3\]]zhabs 'bring du bskos kyis bzod pa long shig_/dga' bos smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni seng ge'i rgyal po'am/_klu'am/_me lta bur byin che ba lags 
[\[301b.4\]]te/_bdag ni shin tu yang zhan pas zhabs 'bring bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs so/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_dga' bo khyod nged kyis bsgo ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring gyis shig_/phan pa dang bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes lan gnyis lan gsum gyi 
[\[301b.5\]]bar du bsgo'o/_/yang dga' bos smras pa/_btsun pa bdag ni phan pa dang bde ba chen po yang mi 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring yang rngo mi thogs so zhes smras so/_/de nas maud gal gyis dga' bo la smras pa/_khyod mi shes so/_/dga' bos smras 
[\[301b.6\]]pa/_btsun pa bdag la bstan du gsol/_maud gal gyis smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas sngar dge 'dun gyi nang na zhabs 'bring ba btus na dgra bcom pa lnga brgyas zhabs 'bring du gsol kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pas ma gnang ste/_bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 
[\[301b.7\]]du zhugs te bltas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khyod la dgyes par rtogs na/_khyod ci'i phyir mi btub/_dga' bos de skad ces smras pa thos nas thal mo sbyar te pus mo btsugs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa ji ste de lta bu zhig lags na de bzhin 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]gshegs pas bdag gis gsol ba rnam pa gsum zhig gnang na/_bdag gis dge 'dun gyi bka' bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring bgyi'o/_/zhes smras so/_/maud gal gyis smras pa/_khyod ci dang ci 'dod/_dga' bos smras pa/_bdag 
[\[302a.2\]]gis 'dod pa gsum ni ji ste de bzhin gshegs pas na bza' rnying pa bdag la stsal na bdag mi 'tshal du gnang ba dang /_ji ste de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin bdag gi der gshegs na bdag mi mchi ba dang /_bdag dus ma mchis par gang yang mchi bar gnang na/_bdag gis 
[\[302a.3\]]dge 'dun gyi bka' bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yog bgyi'o/_/de nas kauN+Di n+ya dang /_dge slong lnga brgya po rnams phyir nga gang na bar lhags nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag gis dge slong dga' bo la bsgo na/_smon pa rnam pa 'di gsum gnang na bdag 
[\[302a.4\]]gis dge 'dun gyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes mchi'o/_/'jam dpal ngas de'i tshe na dga' bo la shin tu legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/dge slong dga' bo ni shes rab dang ldan pas dpyas su 'gyur ba snga nas shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang zag dag khyod 
[\[302a.5\]]ni gos dang zas kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yog byed do zhes smra bar gyur te/_de bas na na bza' rnying pa mi 'dod cing mgron du mi 'gro'o zhes smras pa yin no/_/kauN+Di n+yas dge slong dga' bo ni shes rab dang ldan pas ji ste 'gro ba la dus dang tshod bzung na/_'khor bzhi 
[\[302a.6\]]po la phan pa dang bde ba'i don rgyas par byed mi nus te/_de bas na 'gro ba la dus med par gsol ba yin no/_/kauN+Di n+ya ngas ni dge slong dga' bos gsol pa rnam pa gsum po yid bzhin du gnang ngo /_/de nas maud gal phyir dge slong dga' bo'i gan du song ste/_dga' 
[\[302a.7\]]bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyi gsol ba rnam pa gsum po kho bos gsol nas de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos thams cad gnang ngo /_/dga' bos smras pa/_btsun pa gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/_bdag gis g.yog bgyi'o zhes 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]smras so/_/'jam dpal dga' bos nga'i g.yog lo nyi shu lhag cig byas te bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa brgyad dang ldan no/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lo nyi shu lhag gi bar du nga'i g.yog byas kyang nga'i phyi bzhin mgron du mi 'gro ba yin/_nga'i g.yog byas nas da tsam 
[\[302b.2\]]gyi bar du na bza' rnying pa mi 'dod pa yin/_nga'i g.yog byas nas nga'i drung du 'ong ba na dus ma yin par mi 'ong ba yin/_nga'i g.yog byed de nyon mongs pa dang ldan yang nga'i zhabs 'bring du rgyal po'i pho brang dang rigs chen po btsun pa'i gnas su phyin te/_bu mo bzang mo dang lha 
[\[302b.3\]]dang klu'i bu mo mthong yang 'dod pa'i sems mi skye ba yin/_nga'i g.yog byas nas ngas gsungs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis bzung nas lan cig thos nas phyir 'dri mi srid de/_ji ltar snod gcig gi nang na chu yod pa snod gcig gi nang du byo ba dang 'dra ba yin te/_'dri ba gcig ma gtogs 
[\[302b.4\]]pa ni rgyal tshab be ro zhes bya bas shAka rigs bsad nas grong khyer ser skya bshig pa na/_dga' bo de'i tshe shin tu mi dga' nas skad chen por ngus te nga gang na bar 'ong nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang grong khyer 'dir bltams la/_bdag kyang 
[\[302b.5\]]'dir btsas te/_shAka rigs su 'thun na ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni mdangs yod pa'i 'od can du gyur la/_bdag ni mdangs ma mchis par gyur zhes gsol nas ngas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dga' bo nga ni stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nan tan mdzad 
[\[302b.6\]]pas khyod dang mi 'dra ba yin no/_/de nas lo gsum 'das nas phyir nga la 'di skad ces zhus so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon grong khyer ser skyar de bzhin gshegs pa la stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhus pa bden nam [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhes zhus nas ngas dga' bo la de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin 
[\[302b.7\]]no/_/zhes bka' stsal pa yin/_nga'i g.yog byas nas pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i ye shes ma thob mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gang la bzhugs pa shes pa yin/_nga'i g.yog byas nas smon lam gyi ye shes ma thob mod kyi/_sems can gang de bzhin 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]gshegs pa'i spyan sngar phyin na dge sbyong gi 'bras bu mngon sum du thob pa dang /_phyis thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang mi'i lus gang gis thob pa mngon sum du rtogs pa yin/_nga'i g.yog byas nas de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa thams 
[\[303a.2\]]cad khong du chud cing rtogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dge slong dga' bo ni de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos brgyad dang ldan te/_de bas na dge slong dga' bo ni mang du thos pa'i mdzod yin no zhes grags so/_/rigs kyi bu dge slong dga' bo ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan 
[\[303a.3\]]pas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis 'dzin par 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa'i dbang po shin tu brtan pa dang /_shin tu drang ba dang /_lus la nad med pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_nga rgyal 
[\[303a.4\]]med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang ldan pa dang /_thos pa las shes rab skye ba dang ldan pa yin te/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nye gnas mya ngan med ces bya ba yang 'di bzhin du chos brgyad dang ldan no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi 
[\[303a.5\]]nye gnas tsa pa ka la dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyi nye gnas u pa shan ta dang /_sangs rgyas log par dad sel gyi nye gnas pa te zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas gser thub bsod skyabs kyi nye gnas so te zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nye gnas ya ba mi ta 
[\[303a.6\]]zhes bya ba yang thams cad chos brgyad dang ldan te/_da ltar nga'i dga' bo yang chos brgyad dang ldan no/_/de bas na dge slong dga' bo ni mang du thos pa'i mdzod ces grags so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' tshad med/_mtha' 
[\[303a.7\]]yas pa zhig 'dus mod kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen pos byed dka' ba byed de/_de ltar byams pa dang /_snying rje'i dbang gis so so na las yod la/_'khor rnams gdul ba dang /_bdag gi lus brgyan pa'i las byed de/_de 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]bas na nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das na mdo sde sde bcu gnyis rgyas par sgrogs mi nus so/_/ji ste byang chub sems dpas bar bar sgrogs na yang gzhan dag yid mi ches so/_/'jam dpal dge slong dga' bo ni nga'i gcung yin te/_lo nyi shu lhag gi bar du nga'i g.yog 
[\[303b.2\]]byas nas ci thos pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ni ji ltar snod gcig gi chu gcig gi nang du byo ba bzhin no/_/de bas na ngas dga' bo ga re zhes dris te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir bos so/_/dge slong dga' bos gang ma thos pa'i 
[\[303b.3\]]rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la shin tu rgyas par ston te/_dga' bos ci thos pa thams cad khong du chud cing rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal dge slong dga' bo ni da ltar 'di nas dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi pha rol gnas gzhan zhig na bdud drug khri bzhi stong 
[\[303b.4\]]snyed kyis rnam par gtse zhing 'dug gis/_khyod song la skad chen pos bdud rnams la legs par nyon cig_/legs par nyon cig_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gzungs chen po ni 'di yin no zhes bsgo zhig_/lha dang /_klu dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam 
[\[303b.5\]]mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_ri'i lha dang /_shing gi lha dang /_chu'i lha dang /_rgya mtsho'i lha dang /_khyim gyi lha la sogs te/_lha thams cad kyis gzungs kyi ming 'di thos pa tsam gyis bsti stang mi byed pa'am/_gzungs 
[\[303b.6\]]kyi ming mi 'dzin pa gang yang med do/_/gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs te/_bud med kyi lus spong zhing sngon gyi gnas dran par 'gyur ro/_/gal te tshangs par spyod pa dang /_sha mi za ba dang /_chang mi 'thung ba dang /_dku bag mi za ba dang /_gnas 
[\[303b.7\]]dben pa la dga' ba dang /_rnam pa 'di lnga ltar byas te/_dad pa'i sems kyis gzungs 'di klog gam/_'don tam/_glegs bam du 'dri na gang zag des ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i las khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa bdun las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]sngags la/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_nir ma le/_mu ga le/_he ma la dza garbe/_sa man ta b+ha dre/_sha ba tha/_sa dan ne/_pa ra ma ar+tha sA d+ha ne/_ma na se/_a shud ng+he/_bi la gi_/a ma le te/_ba lam mi/_ba lam ba swa re/_pu N+ye pu N+ye/_ma no la dai/_de'i tshe 'jam 
[\[304a.2\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das las gzungs de mnos nas dga' bo gang na bar song ste bdud rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdud kyi 'khor khyod legs par nyon cig_/ngas bcom ldan 'das las mnos pa'i gzungs brjod par bya'o zhes smras so/_/
[\[304a.3\]]bdud kyi rgyal pos gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_bdud kyi las yongs su spangs nas dga' bo yang btang ngo /_/'jam dpal gzhon nu dga' bo dang bcas te phyir sangs rgyas gang na bar 'ongs nas phyin pa dang /_
[\[304a.4\]]dga' bos sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shing sA la'i tshal gyi phyi rol na kun tu rgyu shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba lo brgya nyi shu lon te rgas shing 'khogs pa/_mngon par 
[\[304a.5\]]shes pa lnga thob kyang nga rgyal ma btang ste 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bzung ste/_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'du shes so/_/khyod song la shin tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bsgo shig_/de bzhin 
[\[304a.6\]]gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ba ni me tog u dum bA ra dang 'dra ste/_do nub nam gyi gung la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs kyis/_bya ba yod na dus la bab kyis phyis 'gyod pa'i sems skyes sa re zhes gyis shig_/dga' bo khyod kyis bsgo na gdon mi za bar nyan 
[\[304a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod sngon skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du shin tu bzang po'i bur skyes te/_dga' zhing 'dod pa'i bag chags da dung ma zad pas/_de bas na khyod kyis bsgo ba'i tshig nyan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du shin tu bzang po gang na bar song 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu 'di ltar rig par gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni me tog u dum bA ra dang 'dra ste/_do nub nam gyi gung la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs kyis/_bya ba ci yod pa da dus la bab kyis phyis 'gyod pa med par bya'o/_/shin 
[\[304b.2\]]tu bzang pos smras pa/_legs so/_/dga' bo bdag de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bar 'gro'o/_/de nas dga' bo shin tu bzang po dang 'grogs te sangs rgyas gang na bar 'ongs nas shin tu bzang pos sangs rgyas la bsnyun gsol nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gau ta ma bdag gis zhu ba zhu na/_
[\[304b.3\]]bdag gis bsams pa bzhin du bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu bzang po dus la bab kyis ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas de dang de'i lan smra bar bya'o/_/gsol pa/_gau ta ma dge sbyong dang bram ze dag 'di skad smra ba mchis so/_/sems can 
[\[304b.4\]]thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba myong ba ni thams cad kyang sngon gyi las lags te/_de bas na gal te tshul khrims bsrung ba la brtson zhing lus dang sems sdug bsngal bar gyur na/_sngon gyi las zad par 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las zad na sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[304b.5\]]zad na mya ngan las 'da'o zhes mchi ba'i don ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gal te dge sbyong ngam bram ze dag de skad ces smra ba yod na/_de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir yang dang yang de'i drung du gshegs nas de la khyod 'di skad ces smra ba bden nam zhes dris te/_
[\[304b.6\]]gal te des bdag de skad ces smras pa bden no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gau ta ma bdag gis mngon du mthong ste/_sems can kha cig sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos byed la longs spyod dang dbang du ldan pa yod do/_/kha cig ni dge ba'i las byed kyang dbul phongs te dbang dang mi ldan no/_/kha cig 
[\[304b.7\]]ni las mang du byas kyang nor mi thob la/_kha cig ni ma bsgrubs kyang rang thob bo/_/kha cig ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan te srog mi gcod kyang tshe thung la/_kha cig ni srog gcod pa la dga' yang tshe mthar phyin pa yod do/_/kha cig ni tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag cing tshul khrims srung ba la 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]brtson pa rnam par grol ba thob pa dang mi thob pa yang yod de/_de bas na bdag gis sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba myong ba ni sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang rkyen yin no zhes smra na/_shin tu bzang po de la ngas yang 'di skad ces 'dri'o/_/khyod kyis 'das pa'i las 
[\[305a.2\]]yang dag par mthong ngam/_gal te las yod pa zhig yin na mang ngam nyung /_da ltar dka' thub spyod pas ji tsam zhig med par 'gyur/_las de zad par 'gyur ba zhig gam zad par mi 'gyur/_las de zad par 'gyur na thams cad zad dam zhes 'dri'o/_/ji ste des nga la mi shes 
[\[305a.3\]]so zhes smra na ngas de'i phyir dpe 'di bshad par bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na mi zhig la dug mdas phog na/_de'i gnyen bshes dag mda' 'byin pa'i sman pa btsal nas mda' phyung na de'i lus rab tu bde bar 'gyur te/_phyis lo bcu lon kyang sman pa des mda' phyung nas rma kha sman gyis 
[\[305a.4\]]bskus pas sos par gyur te rab tu bde ba yin no snyam gsal bar dran no/_/khyod kyis sngon 'das pa'i las kyang mi shes na/_ji ltar da ltar dka' thub spyod pas 'das pa'i las med par byed nus par shes zhes 'dri'o/_/gal te des yang 'di skad du gau ta ma khyod la yang 'das pa'i las yod 
[\[305a.5\]]na/_nga yang 'ba' zhig gi 'das pa'i las la smad du ci zhig yod/_gau ta mas gsungs pa'i mdo sde las kyang 'di skad ces gsungs te/_phyug cing longs spyod dang ldan la dbang che ba zhig mthong na 'di ni sngon sbyin pa byas pa yin no zhes bgyi ba de sngon gyi las ma yin nam zhes smra na 
[\[305a.6\]]yang de la ngas 'di skad ces bya'o/_/de ni rjes su dpags pas shes pa yin gyi yang dag par shes pa zhes mi bya'o/_/nga'i bstan pa la kha cig ni rgyu'i dbang gis 'bras bu shes la kha cig ni 'bras bu las rgyu shes pa yang yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa la ni 'das pa'i las kyang yod la/_
[\[305a.7\]]da ltar gyi las kyang yod de/_khyod ni de lta ma yin gyi/_'das pa'i las 'ba' zhig yod la/_da ltar gyi las med do/_/khyod kyi chos ni thabs dang sbyor bas las gcod pa ma yin te/_nga'i bstan pa ni de lta ma yin gyi thabs dang sbyor bas gcod do/_/khyod ni las zad na sdug bsngal zad ces zer te/_nga ni de lta ma yin 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]gyi nyon mongs pa zad na las dang sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur te/_de bas na khyod kyi 'das pa'i las la nga smod pa yin no/_/yang 'di skad du gau ta ma bdag ni mi shes kyi/_slob dpon gyis 'di skad du bshad de/_bdag ma nyes so zhes zer na yang /_ngas de la khyod kyi ston pa su yin zhes bya'o/_/des nga'i ston pa ni 'od 
[\[305b.2\]]srung rdzogs byed yin no zhes zer na yang ngas de la khyod kyi ston pa la 'das pa'i las shes sam zhes legs par 'dri na ci nyes zhes bya'o/_/ji ste khyod kyi ston pa mi shes zer na/_khyod de'i tshig ci'i phyir nyan/_ji ste shes zhes smra na yang 'di skad dri'o/_/sdug bsngal ba'i rgyu tha mas sdug bsngal rab dang 'bring myong bar 
[\[305b.3\]]'gyur ram/_sdug bsngal gyi rgyu 'bring gis sdug bsngal tha ma dang rab myong bar 'gyur ram/_sdug bsngal gyi rgyu rab kyis sdug bsngal 'bring dang tha mar 'gyur ram zhes dri ste/_ji ste mi 'gyur ro zhes smra na yang 'di skad du ston pa khyod ci'i phyir sdug bsngal dang bde ba myong ba ni 'das pa'i 'ba' zhig yin gyi da 
[\[305b.4\]]ltar gyi ma yin no zhes smra/_yang 'di skad du da ltar gyi sdug bsngal de 'das pa'i dus kyi las yin nam zhes dris shig_/ji ste 'das pa'i dus nas yod na 'das pa'i las ni thams cad zad pa yin no/_/ji ste thams cad zad pa zhig yin na ci'i phyir da ltar gyi lus 'dir myong bar 'gyur/_ji ste 'das pa'i 
[\[305b.5\]]dus la med na da ltar gyi dus 'ba' zhig na yod pa zhig yin na/_ci'i phyir sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal dang bde ba ni thams cad sngon gyi las yin no zhes smra/_khyod kyis gal te da ltar dka' thub spyod pas 'das pa'i las med par 'gyur ro zhe na/_da ltar gyi dka' thub kyi spyod pa cis med par 
[\[305b.6\]]'gyur/_med par mi 'gyur ba zhig yin na sdug bsngal ni rtag par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal rtag pa zhig yin na ci'i phyir sdug bsngal las rnam par grol lo zhes smra/_ji ste spyod pa gzhan zhig gis dka' thub spyod pa med par byed na/_'das pa ni zad pa yin na ji ltar sdug bsngal yod par 
[\[305b.7\]]rung /_skyes bu de ltar dka' thub spyod pa de bde ba'i las byas pas sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba yod dam/_sdug bsngal gyi las byas pas bde ba'i 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba yod dam/_sdug bsngal yang med bde ba yang med pa'i las kyi 'bras bu mi myong ba yod dam/_
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]da ltar gyi rnam par smin pa las skye ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba yod dam/_skye ba'i rnam par smin pa las da ltar gyi rnam par smin par 'gyur ba yod dam/_rnam par smin pa gnyis po las rnam par smin pa med par 'gyur ba yod dam/_nges par rnam par smin pa las rnam par smin 
[\[306a.2\]]pa med par 'gyur ba yod dam/_rnam par smin pa med pa las nges par rnam par smin pa yod dam zhes dris shig_/ji ste gau ta ma med ces zer na/_ngas yang de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/ji ste de ltar mi 'gyur na ci'i phyir dka' thub spyod/_de bas na nges par 'das pa'i chos kyang yod la/_da ltar gyi rgyu dang rkyen 
[\[306a.3\]]yang yod de/_de bas na ngas nyon mongs pa'i rkyen gyis las skyes so/_/las kyi rkyen gyis rnam par smin pa myong bar gyur to zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na sems can thams cad la snga ma 'das pa'i las dang /_da ltar gyi rgyu dang rkyen yod par rig par bya ste/_sngon 'das pa'i tshe las yod mod kyi/_da ltar gyi 
[\[306a.4\]]dus kyi zas dang skom gyi rgyu dang rkyen dgos so/_/skyes bu khyod ji ste so so'i skye bo dag bde ba myong ba dang sdug bsngal myong ba ni sngon 'das pa'i las kyi rgyu dang rkyen yin no zhes smra na yang de mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig rgyal po la dgrar 'gyur ba bsad na/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis 
[\[306a.5\]]nor dang rin po che mang du thob bo/_/de ltar nor dang rin po che thob pas da ltar gyi dus na bde ba myong bar 'gyur te/_de ni da ltar gyi dus su bde bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu byas nas/_da ltar gyi dus su bde ba myong ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na mi zhig rgyal po'i sras gang sdug pa zhig bsad na/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus 
[\[306a.6\]]dang srog yal bar 'gyur te/_de ni da ltar gyi dus su sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba'i rgyu byas nas da ltar gyi dus su sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa yin no/_/skyes bu sems can thams cad kyi da ltar gyi dus kyi rgyu ni chen po bzhi dang /_dus dang /_tshod dang /_sa dang /_me las gyur te/_sdug bsngal dang bde ba myong ngo /_/
[\[306a.7\]]de bas na sems can thams cad ni nges par sngon gyi las kyis sdug bsngal dang bde ba myong ba yin no/_/skyes bu ji ste las bcad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi mthu las rnam par grol bar 'gyur na 'phags pa thams cad rnam par grol ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]sngon gyi las ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na ngas ni 'phags pa'i lam bsgom pa ni/_lam gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa'i las rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/skyes bu ji ste dka' thub spyod pas lam thob na byol song thams cad kyis kyang byang chub thob pa'i rigs 
[\[306b.2\]]so/_/de bas na sngar sems gdul bar bya'i lus gdul ba ma yin no/_/de bas na ngas mdo sde las kyang gsungs te/_tshal gcod na shing ma gcod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshal las 'jigs pa skye'i shing las skye ba ma yin no/_/lus gdul bar 'dod na sngar sems 
[\[306b.3\]]gdul bar bya'o/_/sems ni tshal gyi dpe'o/_/lus ni shing gi dpe'o/_/shin tu bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sems sngar btul lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bur sems sngar btul/_shin 
[\[306b.4\]]tu bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'dod pa la mi rtag pa dang /_bde ba med pa dang /_yongs su ma dag par yid la byas te/_gzugs la rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag par brtags so/_/de ltar rtogs nas 'dod pa'i khams 
[\[306b.5\]]kyi nyon mongs pa chod de/_gzugs kyi skye mched thob bo/_/de bas na bdag gis ni sems sngar btul lo/_/de nas gzugs la brtags na gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/_rma'am/_shu ba'am/_gdug pa'am/_zug rngu lta bur rtogs so/_/gzugs med pa la ni rtag pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[306b.6\]]dag pa dang /_rab tu zhi bar mthong ste/_de ltar rtogs nas gzugs kyi khams kyi nyon mongs pa zad pas gzugs med pa'i skye mched thob bo/_/de bas na bdag gis sems ni sngar btul lo/_/de nas yang 'du shes la brtags na mi rtag pa dang /_rma dang /_shu ba dang /_gdug pa dang /_
[\[306b.7\]]zug rngu lta bur rtogs te/_de ltar rtogs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin te/_rab tu zhi ba/_rnam par dag pa/_ltung ba med pa/_rtag pa mi 'gyur 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]ba ste/_de bas na bdag gis sems btul lo//_//'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar na sems btul/_khyod kyis thob pa ni 'du shes med 'du 
[\[307a.2\]]shes med min stengs kyi ting nge 'dzin te/_de yang 'du shes zhes bya'o/_/mya ngan las 'da' ba ni 'du shes med pa yin na ci'i phyir mya ngan las 'da' ba thob pa zhes bya/_rigs kyi bu sngar khyod kyis sngar 'du shes sbom po la ni smod na da ci'i phyir 'du shes phra mo la chags te smad pa mi shes/_de ltar 'du 
[\[307a.3\]]shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs kyang 'du shes zhes bya ste/_rma lta bu/_shu ba lta bu/_gdug pa lta bu/_zug rngu lta bu'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi ston pa ur to lam pa dbang po rno la yid gzhungs pa yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched mchod de/_las ngan pa myong bar 
[\[307a.4\]]'gyur na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_shin tu bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na srid pa thams cad gcod par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gal te yang dag pa'i 'du shes spyod na gang zag des ni srid pa thams cad chod par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu 
[\[307a.5\]]bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i 'du shes zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/_rigs kyi bu 'du shes med pa'i 'du shes ni yang dag pa'i 'du shes zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'du shes ma mchis pa'i 'du shes zhes bgyi/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad 
[\[307a.6\]]la bdag gi mtshan nyid med/_gzhan gyi mtshan nyid med/_bdag dang gzhan gyi mtshan nyid med/_rgyu med pa'i mtshan nyid med/_byas pa'i mtshan nyid med/_song ba'i mtshan nyid med/_byed pa'i mtshan nyid med/_myong ba'i mtshan nyid med/_chos kyi mtshan nyid med/_chos ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid med/_pho dang 
[\[307a.7\]]mo'i mtshan nyid med/_skyes bu'i mtshan nyid med/_rdul phra mo'i mtshan nyid med/_dus dang tshod kyi mtshan nyid med/_bdag tu byas pa'i mtshan nyid med/_gzhan du byas pa'i mtshan nyid med/_bdag dang gzhan du byas pa'i mtshan nyid med/_yod pa'i mtshan nyid med/_med pa'i mtshan nyid med/_skyes pa'i mtshan 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]nyid med/_bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid med/_rgyu'i mtshan nyid med/_rgyu las rgyur 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid med/_'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med/_'bras bu las 'bras bur 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid med/_nyin dang mtshan gyi mtshan nyid med/_snang ba dang mun pa'i mtshan nyid med/_mthong ba'i mtshan nyid med/_mthong bar 
[\[307b.2\]]byed pa'i mtshan nyid med/_thos pa'i mtshan nyid med/_thos par byed pa'i mtshan nyid med/_tshor ba dang shes pa'i mtshan nyid med/_tshor ba dang shes par byed pa'i mtshan nyid med/_byang chub kyi mtshan nyid med/_byang chub thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid med/_las kyi mtshan nyid med/_las kyi bdag po'i mtshan 
[\[307b.3\]]nyid med/_nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid med/_nyon mongs pa'i bdag po'i mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu mtshan nyid gang du 'gog pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni mi bden pa ste/_gang du 'gog pa de na yang dag pa zhes bya/_yang dag pa'i 'du shes zhes bya/_
