[\[307b.4\]]chos kyi dbyings zhes bya/_mthar phyin pa'i ye shes zhes bya/_don dam pa zhes bya/_don dam pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu mtshan nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_mthar phyin pa'i ye shes dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa dang /_don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la shes rab tha mas yang dag par spyod 
[\[307b.5\]]na nyan thos kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab 'bring gis yang dag par spyod na rang rgyal ba'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab mchog gis yang dag par spyod na bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag stong gis tshe gcig 
[\[307b.6\]]gis thogs pa'i yang dag pa'i 'du shes thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri lnga stong snyed kyis tshe gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sum khri lnga stong gis don dam pa'i bden pa 
[\[307b.7\]]thob bo/_/don dam pa'i bden pa ni don dam pa'i stong pa nyid ces kyang bya/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces kyang bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri lnga stong snyed kyis nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya/_
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri lnga stong gis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa ni chos kyi bzod pa zhes kyang bya/_chos dbyings lta bu zhes kyang bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' drug 
[\[308a.2\]]khri lnga stong snyed kyis ni gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs de ni dran pa chen po'i sems zhes kyang bya/_thogs pa med pa'i ye shes zhes kyang bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong snyed kyis ni seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/seng ge'i sgra'i ting nge 
[\[308a.3\]]'dzin ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces kyang bya/_ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces kyang bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri lnga stong snyed kyis ni mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po zhes kyang bya'o/_/sems 
[\[308a.4\]]can grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/sems can grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed do/_/sems can grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni nyan thos 
[\[308a.5\]]su sems bskyed par gyur to/_/mi dang lha'i bu mo stong phrag nyi shu snyed ni mngon du bud med kyi lus las skyes pa'i lus su gyur to/_/shin tu bzang po ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe shin tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i 
[\[308a.6\]]chos shin tu zab mo thos nas chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur te/_yongs su dag pa'i chos mthong nas dam pa'i chos 'dod pas ngan par lta ba yongs su spangs te/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa shin tu brtan par gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa las rab tu 'byung bar 
[\[308a.7\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/shin tu bzang po legs par 'ongs pa'i dge slong yin te/_'phags pa rnams kyang dgyes pas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la legs par zhugs so/_/shin tu bzang po rab tu dga' mgu rangs nas mos pa tshad med 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]par gyur te/_de'i tshe skra dang kha spu rang byi nas dge slong du gyur to/_/chos nyid kyis ye shes kyi chu sems kyi dbye la bcus pas 'ching bas ma bcings te zag pa zad nas sems rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/shin tu bzang po dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas sangs rgyas la 
[\[308b.2\]]nye bar bsnyen te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/_mya ngan dang dga' ba dus gcig tu gyur nas sngon gyi nyes pa 
[\[308b.3\]]'gyod de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis gdug pa'i lus 'dis yun ring po nas bdag bslus pas/_yun ring por ma rig pa ngan pa lta bu'i nang du nub pas khams gsum du 'khor zhing mu stegs can gyi chos kyis glags par gyur to/_/kyi hud kyi hud shin tu 
[\[308b.4\]]gnod pa chen por gyur pa las/_nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' drin gyis dam pa'i chos la zhugs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i thugs rje chen po tshad ma mchis pa ni bskal pa'i bar du yang bka' drin la lan mi lon no snyam sems so/_/shin tu bzang pos 
[\[308b.5\]]de skad ces gsol nas mchi ma blags te/_yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgas 'khogs te sdug bsngal las ni rnam par ma grol gyi/_'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis ni rab tu gtse bar gyur na bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba'i slad du tshul 
[\[308b.6\]]khrims bstan te mgon dang skyabs mdzad cing /_re zhig mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol lo/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung nas mi gnang ngo /_/shin tu bzang pos gsol pa bzhin du ma gnang nas mya ngan gyis yid rab tu gdungs te skad chen pos 'di skad ces smras 
[\[308b.7\]]so/_/kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten stongs so/_/'jig rten stongs so/_/da ni 'jigs pa chen pos bsnyen nas shin tu gdung ba mngon du gyur to/_/kyi hud kyi hud sems can gyi bsod nams zad pas yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi mig mdongs so zhes smras nas rab tu cho nges rdung zhing skad 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]kyang mi phyin pa tsam du ngus nas lus khrag gis rgyas so/_/skad chen po phyung ste ngus nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lus sa la brdabs pas der brgyal nas ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sangs te ngu bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[309a.2\]]'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong mi bzod de/_sems rab tu gdungs nas shin tu gcags so/_/bdag kyang rdza so ma btang ba dang 'dra ba'i lus gdug pa can 'di dang 'grogs mi 'tshal te bdag sngar mchis/_bcom ldan 'das ni slad kyis mya ngan las 
[\[309a.3\]]'da' bar gshegs su gsol/_de'i tshe shin tu bzang pos de skad ces gsol nas/_cho nges rdung zhing de nyid du mya ngan las 'da' bar zhugs so/_/de'i tshe brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_
[\[309a.4\]]'jig rten du bcas pa'i lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyis sa skad 'thun par 'di skad ces smras so/_/kyi hud kyi hud yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis nang gcig tu bor bas gnas ma mchis/_rten ma mchis/_skyabs ma mchis/_mgon ma mchis te/_shin tu gcags 
[\[309a.5\]]so zhes smras nas thams cad ngus te/_gcig la gcig 'ju zhing brang du khu tshur gyis rdeg pas brgyal nas phyogs kyang bslad de/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang g.yos so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di 
[\[309a.6\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed bus pa chung ngu ltar ma ngu bar so so nas ngu ba thong la sems ma 'khrugs par gyis shig_/khyed 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir bsam pa dag pa la nan tan bya zhing rjes su dran pa'i shes rab ma brjed cig_/yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis srid pa las 
[\[309a.7\]]'byung ba la brtson par gyis shig_/khams gsum du lus myong ba ni sdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo mtha' med pa ste/_ma rig pa'i rje bo dang /_'dod pa'i bdud kyi rgyal pos lus dang sems bkol ba'i bran du mi 'gyur bar bya'o/_/spyod pa'i khams la dmigs pas 'khor ba'i las byed de/_'dod chags 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis skad cig skad cig tu rnam par gtses nas bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du sdug bsngal myong bar gyur na/_mkhas pa shes rab can su zhig de la mi rtog_/khyed rnams 'di ltar rig par gyis shig_/nga ni bskal pa 'das pa nas zhi ba chen po'i phung po dang khams dang 
[\[309b.2\]]skye mched med pa la zhugs te srid pa yongs su bcad nas rin po che rdo rje'i gter lta bu rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag pa thob kyang ngas 'dir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi chos dang 'thun par mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan te/_de yang so so'i 
[\[309b.3\]]skye bo dag lus glog lta bur shes par bya zhing gcags pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro/_/'khor ba'i 'od pa 'bab pa ni shin tu drag cing myur la/_'du byed rnams ni 'khor bar 'khor ro/_/chos nyid kyis de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba ni shin tu zab la bsam gyis 
[\[309b.4\]]mi khyab pas de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul yin gyi/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes pa ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shin tu bzang po 'di sngon sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[309b.5\]]bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur byas te/_sangs rgyas de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bskyed nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis rtag tu gcer bu pa mu stegs can gyi chos la rab tu byung ste spyad pa spyod cing /_thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab kyis ngan par lta ba log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[309b.6\]]yang dag pa'i ye shes la dgod par byed do/_/shin tu bzang po 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis mya ngan las 'da' kar nga dang phrad nas dam pa'i chos thos par gyur to/_/dam pa'i chos thos nas kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas kyang mya 
[\[309b.7\]]ngan las 'da' bar zhugs so/_/nga thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas nas tshe dang ldan pa cang shes kauN+Di n+ya rab tu phyung ngo /_/tha ma mya ngan las 'da' kar shin tu bzang po btul nas mdzad pa'i mthar phyin te/_mdzad pa med pas nga yun du bzhugs kyang de las mdzad pa gzhan med do/_/de'i tshe bcom 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]ldan 'das de skad ces gsungs nas shugs nar ces mdzad de/_legs so legs so/_/shin tu bzang po sangs rgyas kyi drin legs par glan to/_/khyed kyis de'i rus bu la mchod pa bya zhing mchod rten gyis shig_/de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams shin tu mi dga' ste mchi ma blags 
[\[310a.2\]]nas/_sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du spos kyi shing dang /_mar gyis de'i rus bu bsregs so/_/shin tu bzang po'i rus bu bsregs pa nas me'i nang na 'od chen po btang ste/_cho 'phrul rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mngon du bstan to/_/lus kyi stod nas chu 'bab na lus kyi smad nas me 'bar/_mchan khung 
[\[310a.3\]]g.yas nas me 'bar na mchan khung g.yon nas chu 'bab/_chung ngu las chen por gyur nas chen po las chung ngur gyur te/_nam mkha' yang yongs su gang bar byas so/_/de'i tshe 'khor tshad med pa rnams dang /_mu stegs can ngan par lta ba'i sems can dag byang chub tu sems bskyed nas yang 
[\[310a.4\]]dag par lta ba la zhugs so/_/shin tu bzang pos cho 'phrul mngon par bstan nas phyir me'i nang du zhugs so/_/der bsregs nas 'khor mang po rnams ring bsrel bsdus te/_mchod rten byas nas mchod pa byed do/_/'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las/_tshe dang 
[\[310a.5\]]ldan pa cang shes kauN+Di n+ya'i le'u'o//_//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo dang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga mya ngan las 'das nas khyed 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag nga'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po 'di 'dzin pa la brtson par gyis shig_/ngas ni bskal pa 
[\[310a.6\]]khrag khrig tshad med pa'i bar du shin tu thob dka' ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di bsgrubs nas da ltar bstan pa yin no/_/khyed rnams 'di ltar rig par gyis shig_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i chos kyi gzhung 'di ni phyogs bcu na dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[310a.7\]]thams cad kyi rin po che rdo rje'i gter rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa ma god pa ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'da' ba 'dis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste mthar phyin pa lhag ma ma lus pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyang sku tshe 'dir 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]gtong bas mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya'o/_/khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi drin la yang dag par lan glon zhing byang chub myur du thob par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing gang nas gang du skyes kyang yang dag par rjes su dran pa mi brjed par 'dod pa dang /_phyogs bcu'i 
[\[310b.2\]]sangs rgyas mngon sum du gshegs te nyin mtshan du skyob par 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyis 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i chos thob par 'dod na/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mdo sde 'di la brtson 'grus su nan tan bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[310b.3\]]nga mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa na yang mu stegs can ur tu lam pa'i bstan pa la zhugs te/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_ting nge 'dzin brgyad slob pa la zhugs nas de'i bstan pa bzhin du byas so/_/mngon par sangs rgyas nas de'i chos smad de mthar gyis shin tu bzang po yang btul nas sangs 
[\[310b.4\]]rgyas kyi bstan pa la bzhag go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i mes ngan par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan bsregs pa ni ji ltar shing lo skam po me chen po'i nang du bcug pa dang 'dra'o/_/dga' bo nga'i gnyen du gyur pa shAka rigs la shin tu thugs brtse'o/_/nga mya ngan las 'das nas khyod 
[\[310b.5\]]kyis brtson 'grus su legs par ston cing chos shig_/nga'i nye gnas rnams la dam pa'i chos bstan te/_rtsed mo dang bag med par spyod yul rnams la 'jug pa dang /_ngan par lta ba'i chos la spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang /_khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal las ni rnam par ma grol na myur du rnam 
[\[310b.6\]]par grol bar bya ba dang /_rnyog ma lnga'i 'dod pa la shin tu 'jigs pa bskyed de mgon med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ba dang /_mi'i lus lan cig stor nas phyir thob par dka' ba dang /_tshe gcig tu bag bya ba dang /_mi rtag pa'i gdon chen po las rnam par thar bar bya ba dang /_sems can la 
[\[310b.7\]]snying rje ba bskyed de sems can gyi srog mi gcod pa dang /_chung ngu na grog sbur gyi bar du mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /_lus kyi las yongs su dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams bzang por skye ba dang /_ngag gi las yongs su dag pas nyes pa'i skyon thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_sha mi za ba 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]dang /_chang mi 'thung ba dang /_sems kyi sbrul gdul zhing byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa dang /_dge ba dang sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa lus kyi grib ma bzhin du 'brang bar 'du byed kyi las la shin tu brtags pa dang /_dus gsum gyi 'bras bu yongs su 'khor ba med par mi 'gyur ba 
[\[311a.2\]]dang /_skye ba 'di chud gsan nas phyis 'gyod kyang mi phan par ston cing chongs shig_/nga mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab ste/_khyod la bstan pa 'di dag yin no/_/de'i tshe na dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas/_lus dang sems 'dar zhing g.yo ste/_shin tu 'khrugs 
[\[311a.3\]]nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te skad kyang ma phyin la/_brgyal ba tsam du 'khrugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar shi ba bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas ma 'gags pas dga' bo la spro ba bskyed de mya ngan bsangs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod de ltar mya ngan ma byed cig_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[311a.4\]]pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab ste/_deng bzhugs kyang sang mi bzhugs so/_/khyod kyis ngas smras pa bzhin du zhu ba rnam pa bzhi po 'di zhus shig_/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas dge slong drug sde khyim sun 'byin pa dang /_'dod ldan sdig to can dang /_ji ltar lhan cig tu gnas shing 
[\[311a.5\]]bstan pa bzhin du bgyi ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs na ston pa sangs rgyas kyis mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas ston pa sus bgyi ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas shing brten na mya ngan las 
[\[311a.6\]]'das pa'i 'og tu su la gnas shing rten pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi sde snod bsdu ba na/_mdo sde thams cad kyi mgo nan la ji skad bya ba zhus shig ces smras so/_/de'i tshe dga' bo'i rmi lam na ma 'gags pas smras pa lta bur zhu ba bzhi po zhus shig ces 
[\[311a.7\]]smras pa thos nas bags kyis sangs te/_zhu ba bzhi po bcom ldan 'das la zhus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar mi dga' zhing shin tu mya ngan byed/_sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba'i mdzad pa kun mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis 'di ltar gshegs pa yin 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]no/_/legs so legs so/_/dga' bo khyod kyis zhu ba bzhi po 'di ni nang gi tha mar zhus pa ste/_'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de bas na legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 
[\[311b.2\]]'das la slar nyan to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod 'dri ba ltar sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas dge slong drug sde dang /_'dod ldan sdig to can khyim sun 'byin pa dang /_ji lta bur lhan cig tu gnas shing bstan pa la gnas par 'gyur zhes dris pa ni/_dga' bo 
[\[311b.3\]]dge slong 'dod ldan rang bzhin gyis ma rungs pa nga mya ngan las 'das nas rang dul zhing nges par 'gyur te/_sdig to'i sems kyang spong bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo nga'i nu bo kun dga' bo 'dod pa dang ldan te ma rungs pa yang /_de bzhin gshegs pas thabs mkhas pas bstan cing bcos nas 
[\[311b.4\]]de'i dbang po dang shes rab ci lcogs pas rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis bstan to/_/'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa nas rga shi dang /_zlos pa'i mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa'i bar du thams cad kyang ma rig pa 'dod pa'i thibs po'o/_/'du 
[\[311b.5\]]byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis khams gsum du gang nas rgyud drug tu 'khor te/_sdug bsngal chen po'i rtsa ba ni ma rig pa yin no/_/de ltar shes rab kyis rang bzhin gyis dag pa brtags nas/_srid pa'i skyon ma rig pa yongs su gcod do/_/rtsa ba 'gags pas ma rig pa 'gag go/_/ma rig pa 'gags 
[\[311b.6\]]pas 'du byed 'gag pa nas/_rga shi dang /_zlos pa'i mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa'i bar du 'gag go/_/de ltar yang dag par spyod pa na sems gnas par gyur te/_ting nge 'dzin du zhugs so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs kyis bsam gtan dang po thob bo/_/de nas mthar gyis bsam gtan bzhi yang thob nas dran 
[\[311b.7\]]pa yang dag pa'i sems kyis de ltar nan tan byas nas 'bras bu bla ma yang rang thob ste/_khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo de'i tshe na dge slong kun dga' bos de ltar bsam pa shin tu dag pas ngas bstan pa bzhin du brtson 'grus su nan tan byed pas/_ring po mi thogs par 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo nga mya ngan las 'das nas khyod kyis ngas bstan pa bzhin du drug sde dang /_'dod ldan la ston cig dang /_dge slong de dag bsam pa dag pas rnam par dag pa'i dam pa'i chos 'di la brten te/_ring po mi thogs par 'bras bu mchog thob par 
[\[312a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/dga' bo de bas na ma rig pa las khams gsum du 'khor ba'i shing chen po skyes te/_'dod pa'i rlung gis khyer nas/_yun ring por sdug bsngal gyis nyin mtshan du gdungs te/_mun pa nag po'i 'khor ba'i ka ba la 'khor zhing rnam par shes pa drug gi yal ga dang ngan par rtog pa'i rtsa ba dang /_ma 
[\[312a.3\]]rig pa'i dba' rlabs dang /_sems dang rnam par shes pa khol po lta bus yul drug la rgyu zhing /_sdug bsngal gyi sa bon btab nas phyir zlogs pa med de/_rgyal po dang 'dra bar dbang che bas na ma rig pa ni rje bo lta bu ste skad cig tu gnon par byed par sems can gyis ma tshor bar 'khor ba na rgyun du 'khor 
[\[312a.4\]]bar gyur to/_/dga' bo sems can thams cad ni ma rig pa 'di'i dbang gis 'dod pa'i nyon mongs pa la zhugs te/_bdag tu lta bas zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa rje bo lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong gis lus bkol te lus zhig kyang rang dbang du mi 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo ma rig pa'i sdug bsngal 
[\[312a.5\]]'gags te khams gsum zad na de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'da' ba zhes bya'o/_/dga' bo gang gis rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis mthar bdag med cing yongs su dag pa'i spyod yul la zhugs par rtogs na/_des ni khams gsum gyi me chen po yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo de bzhin 
[\[312a.6\]]gshegs pa ni yang dag par gsung pa ste/_yang dag pa'i gsung gis khyod la gtams pa 'di khyod kyis legs par nan tan gyis shig_/dga' bo khyod kyis zhu ba ltar sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das te 'jig rten na mi bzhugs na ston pa sus bya zhes bya ba ni dga' bo tshul khrims ni khyod kyi ston pa 
[\[312a.7\]]chen po yin gyis de la gnas te nan tan byas na/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab thob par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo khyod zhu ba ltar sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas ci la gnas shing rten ces bya ba ni dga' bo dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas te sems brgyan nas gnas 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]par bya'o/_/lus la lus kyi rjes su brtags te nam mkha' dang 'dra bar rtogs na lus la lus kyi rjes su dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su dran par byas te/_tshor ba phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_nang na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka'i bar na yang mi gnas par rtogs na tshor ba 
[\[312b.2\]]la tshor ba'i rjes su dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/sems la sems kyi rjes su brtags te/_sems ni ming tsam du zad de/_ming nyid dang yang bral bar rtogs na sems la sems kyi rjes su dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/chos la chos kyi rjes su brtags te dge ba'i chos su 
[\[312b.3\]]yang mi dmigs/_mi dge ba'i chos su yang mi dmigs na chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/dga' bo khyod zhu ba ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi mdzod bsdus pa na/_mdo sde thams cad kyi mgo nan la ji skad gdags zhes bya ba ni dga' bo 
[\[312b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi mdzod bsdus pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi mgo nan la/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das che ge mo zhig na 'khor rnam bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_mdo sde 'di gsungs so zhes thogs shig_/de'i tshe dga' bos yang 
[\[312b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs kyang rung /_mya ngan las 'das kyang rung /_sbyin bdag dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa la gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che sna bdun dang /_longs spyod kyi yo byad mang po phul nas ji lta bur su la bzhag par bgyi bcom 
[\[312b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_gal te sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs na/_sangs rgyas la ci phul ba thams cad dge 'dun la gtad par bya'o/_/gal te sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas yon bdag dad pas sangs rgyas la bsngos shing phul ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang /_
[\[312b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi na bza' dang rin po che sna bdun gyi ba dan dang gdugs su bya zhing mar bsung can dang /_rin po che'i me tog nyos te sangs rgyas la mchod pa bya'o/_/sangs rgyas la mchod pa bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan du spyad du mi rung ngo /_/gal te gzhan du spyad na sangs rgyas kyi dkor brkus pa yin no/_/dga' 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]bos yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bzhugs pa na/_gal te skyes bu zhig gis gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che sna bdun dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran khol dang /_gos dang /_zas dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad phul nas bsti stang dang bcas 
[\[313a.2\]]pas phyag byas te/_mchod pa byas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas/_gal te skyes bu zhig gis gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che sna bdun dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran khol dang /_gos dang /_zas dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[313a.3\]]gzugs la phul te/_dad pa'i sems kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te mchod pa byas na/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar skyes bu de gnyis kyis dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa bgyis na bsod nams gang gis mang du thob/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu de gnyis kyis 
[\[313a.4\]]de ltar dad pa'i sems kyis mchod na bsod nams thob pa'i khyad par med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das kyang chos kyi sku ni rtag pa yin pas dad pa'i sems kyis mchod na bsod nams 'dra ste khyad par med do/_/dga' bos yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mngon du 
[\[313a.5\]]bzhugs pa la gal te skyes bu zhig dad pa'i sems kyis gong du smos pa dang 'dra bar bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas gal te skyes bu zhig dad pa'i sems kyis gong du smos pa dang 'dra bar bsti stang dang bcas pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung ril po la 
[\[313a.6\]]mchod pa bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de gnyis gang gis bsod nams mang du thob/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu de gnyis kyi bsod nams ni mnyam pas khyad par med de/_bsod nams tshad med dpag tu med par rgya che bas sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin pa'i 
[\[313a.7\]]bar du bsod nams mi zad do/_/dga' bos yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa la/_gal te skyes bu zhig dad pa'i sems kyis gong du smos pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas/_gal 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]te skyes bu zhig dad pa'i sems kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung phyed la mchod pa bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de gnyis gang gis bsod nams mang du thob/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu de gnyis dad pa'i sems kyis 
[\[313b.2\]]mchod na/_bsod nams la khyad par med de/_bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med dpag tu med do/_/dga' bo gal te skyes bu zhig gis dad pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bzhi cha gcig gam/_brgyad cha gcig gam/_bcu drug gi cha gcig gam/_brgya'i cha gcig gam/_stong 
[\[313b.3\]]gi cha gcig gam/_khri'i cha gcig gam/_klung gang gA'i bye ma'i cha gcig tsam nas chung ngu na yungs kar tsam gcig la dad pa'i sems kyis bsti stang dang bcas/_rim gro dang bcas pas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas pa dang /_gal te sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa la bsti stang dang bcas pas 
[\[313b.4\]]mchod pa byas na/_skyes bu de gnyis kyi bsod nams ni thams cad khyad par med par mnyam ste/_tshad med dpag tu med do/_/dga' bo sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs sam/_mya ngan las 'das kyang rung /_gang zhig dad pa'i sems kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/_bla mar byas/_bkur 
[\[313b.5\]]stir byas/_bstod pa byas na/_skyes bu de gnyis kyi bsod nams thob pa ni gnyis su med/_dbyer med par rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo dang 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_nga mya ngan las 'das nas gnam gyi steng ngam/_mi'i 'jig rten na sems can gyis nga'i sku gdung 
[\[313b.6\]]lag tu thob ste/_mya ngan dang dga' ba bcas pas bsti stang du phyag 'tshal te dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas na/_bsod nams tshad med dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mthong na/_des ni sangs rgyas mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas mthong ba des 
[\[313b.7\]]ni chos mthong ngo /_/chos mthong ba des ni dge 'dun mthong ngo /_/dge 'dun mthong ba des ni mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ngo /_/dga' bo de bas na dkon mchog gsum ni rtag pa gnas pa mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba ste/_sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs kyi gnas su 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/dga' 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bdag cag gis cho ga gang dang sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhugs la bzhen na sku gdung 'thob cing dad pas mchod par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_nga 
[\[314a.2\]]mya ngan las 'das nas khyed kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i thabs su sregs shig_/dga' bos yang gsol pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsreg pa'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni shi nas zhag bdun gyi bar du 
[\[314a.3\]]'jog ste/_gdod lcags kyi sgrom gyi nang du 'dzud do/_/sgrom du bcug nas 'bru mar bsung can gyis sgrom gyi nang du bkang nas/_kha legs par bcad de yang zhag bdun du 'jog go/_/de nas sgrom nas phyung ste spos chus bkru'o/_/spos chus bkrus nas bdug spos kyis mchod cing bdugs la 
[\[314a.4\]]shing bal gyis lus kun dkri'o/_/shing bal gyis dkris pa'i steng du ras dkar po bzang po yug stong gis mthar chags su dkri'o/_/de ltar dkris nas sgrom gyi nang du 'bru mar bsung can gyis bkang ste/_rgyal po'i rus bu phyir sgrom gyi nang du bcug la sgrom gyi kha legs par gcad do/_/shing 
[\[314a.5\]]bsung can gyi rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta'i steng du drangs te/_shing rta'i ngogs gzhi yang rgyan phyang dpyangs shing rin po che sna tshogs kyis kyang shing rta spra'o/_/grangs med pa'i me tog dang /_ba dan dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_spos bzang po sna tshogs dang /_lha'i rol 
[\[314a.6\]]mos bskor zhing mchod pa bya'o/_/de nas shing bsung can phyi nang ri mo dang ldan pa dang mar bsung can gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rus bu bsreg go/_/de ltar bsregs nas ring bsrel bsdus te grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten sgo bzhi bkod pa byas te/_
[\[314a.7\]]ring bsrel de'i nang du bzhag la 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bas bltar gzhug go/_/dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de bsod nams cung zad cig gis rgyal po'i thabs thob kyang srid pa las rnam par ma grol/_'dod pa lnga dang ldan te/_btsun mo dang pho 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]brang gi slas su bcas/_ngan par lta ba dang gdug pa gsum du bcas/_nyon mongs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa ba spu'i nyag ma tsam yang ma spangs pa shi nas 'jig rten du bcas pas de lta bu'i cho ga byed cing /_mchod rten brtsigs nas thams cad rjes su yi rang zhing blta na dga' bo de 
[\[314b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa lta ci smos te/_bskal pa tshad med mtha' yas dpag tu med grangs med pa nas btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas dang 'dod pa lnga yongs su spangs te/_'jig rten gyi chos la ba mo'am ser ba lta bur rtogs nas rtsol dka' ba btsal te shin tu spyod dka' ba spyad nas/_
[\[314b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i spyod dka' ba spyad de/_phyogs bcu na dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mdzad pa yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam 
[\[314b.4\]]par grol ba'i ye shes ston pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug ma bsgrubs pa gang yang med la/_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_stong pa nyid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_mngon par shes pa drug 
[\[314b.5\]]dang /_spyan lnga dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_ma 'dres pa'i chos [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku tshe dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[314b.6\]]yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_spyod dka' ba thams cad dang /_dge ba sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang /_yon tan thams cad dang /_ye shes thams cad dang /_rgyan thams cad dang /_smon lam chen po thams cad dang /_thabs 
[\[314b.7\]]mkhas pa thams cad dang /_de la sogs te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes thams cad yongs su rdzogs par lhun gyis grub ste/_mi dge ba thams cad kyang yongs su bcad/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su bcad/_nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad kyang 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]yongs su bcad de/_bden pa bzhi dang /_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis shin tu rtogs nas byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud rnam bzhi btul te/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur nas de lta bu'i dam pa'i chos thams cad la nan tan byas pas sangs rgyas thams 
[\[315a.2\]]cad kyis gsung 'thun par legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal nas/_'thun par chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi chu/_chos kyi sku'i spyi bor dbang bskur te/_gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so zhes bsgrags so/_/de bas na nga ni da ltar lha dang mi 
[\[315a.3\]]rnams kyi ston pa ste/_phyogs bcur rnam par sangs rgyas pa mthar phyin pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste/_lha dang mi'i nang na dpe zla med pa/_sems can thams cad la sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/_mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde 
[\[315a.4\]]bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten rig pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste/_'jig rten la thugs brtse bar mdzad pa kun mdzad nas sems can gyi phyir mya ngan las 'das na/_'jig rten gyi chos bzhin du 'khor los 
[\[315a.5\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar bya'o/_/dga' bo nga mya ngan las 'das nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar zhag bdun gyi bar du zhog la/_gdod lcags kyi sgrom du chug shig_/lcags kyi sgrom du bcug nas mar bsung can gyis khong la kha 
[\[315a.6\]]legs par chod cig_/sgrom yang rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu spras shing brgyan la sgrom 'khor bar rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_spos dang /_me tog gis mchod pa gyis shig_/de lta bur zhag bdun du mchod nas sgrom nas phyung la/_spos chus legs par khrus shig_/de ltar spos chus 
[\[315a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku legs par bkrus nas shing bal gyis sku khyab par dkris shig_/de'i steng du rin thang med pa'i ras dkar po yug stong gis dkris shig_/de ltar dkris nas phyir lcags kyi sgrom du chug la mar bsung can gyis bkang ste kha legs par chod cig_/de nas go shir Sha tsan dan 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]dang /_a ga ru dang /_shing bsung can thams cad dang bcas su rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta'i steng du zhog la/_rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan te sreg pa'i gnas su drongs shig_/rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang /_rin po che'i gdugs grangs med pa dang /_rin po che'i gos grangs med 
[\[315b.2\]]pa dang /_grangs med pa'i lha'i rol mo dang /_grangs med pa'i me tog dang spos kyis nam mkha' yang gang ba tsam du mchod pa gyis la ngus shig_/lha dang mi dang /_'khor thams cad kyis spos kyi shing tsan dan dang /_a ka ru dang /_mar bsung can gyis nga sregs la ngus shig_/de ltar bsregs nas lha 
[\[315b.3\]]dang mi dang /_'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus la/_rin po che sna bdun gyi bum par bcug ste/_grong khyer chen po'i lam gyi bzhi mdor rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas la/_ring bsrel mchod na sems can dag bsod nams chen po thob cing /_srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal spangs nas mya 
[\[315b.4\]]ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo 'khor rnam pa bzhi pos/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung gi rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas nas/_gzhan yang mchod rten gsum bya'o/_/gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang /_dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten dang /_'khor los 
[\[315b.5\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mchod rten te/_'jig rten du bcas pas skyabs su 'gro ba'i gnas shes par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du gshegs pa ni sems can la thugs brtse ba'i slad du stobs bcu dang /_thugs rje chen po dang /_mi 
[\[315b.6\]]bsnyengs pa bzhi dang /_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis dang /_bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs rnam pa brgyad kyis khams gsum du bsgrags pa dang /_kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i byams pa'i 'od kyis lam rgyud drug snang bar mdzad nas sems 
[\[315b.7\]]can gyi bsam pa bzhin du/_la la ni 'bras bu bzhi dang /_theg pa gnyis la spyod par gyur/_la la ni zag pa med pa 'dus ma byas pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur/_la la ni mi 'gog pa mi skye ba'i byang chub kyis non par gyur/_la la ni tshad med pa'i gzungs rnams thob par gyur/_la la ni spyan lnga 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]dang mngon par shes pa drug thob par gyur/_la la ni ngan song gsum las thar bar gyur/_la la ni mi khom pa brgyad dang bral bar gyur/_la la ni lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa'i shugs rnam par dag pa dang /_de 
[\[316a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i chos kyi gzhung bsam gyis mi khyab pas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'jig rten du bcas pa/_lha dang mi dang 'khor rnam pa bzhis rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas te ring bsrel la mchod na bsod nams chen po thob cing so so'i skye bo dag khams gsum 
[\[316a.3\]]gyi sdug bsngal las thar cing yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba la 'jug par 'gyur te/_de bas na sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi dang /_'khor thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa'i drin chen po dang /_byams pa tshad ma mchis pa rjes su bzung ba'i slad du 
[\[316a.4\]]rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten bgyid cing ring bsrel la mchod pa bgyid pa ni 'os na/_bcom ldan 'das mchod rten rnam pa gsum po bgyis pas sems can rnams la sman pa ci mchis na mchod rten bgyis shing mchod pa bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[316a.5\]]ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos shin tu zab mo rtogs nas srid pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/_nyes pa'i skyon thams cad bral nas lha dang mi'i bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur te/_de bas na mchod rten byas te mchod na bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'og tu 
[\[316a.6\]]'gro ba mang po 'bras bu mchog thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/dga' bo dgra bcom pa ni skye ba'i phyogs zad de srid pa phyi ma mi len la tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur te/_de bas na mchod rten byas te mchod na bsod nams thob pa ni rang sangs rgyas 
[\[316a.7\]]kyi 'og tu de mang ste/_des kyang 'gro ba rnam par grol bar byed do/_/dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa las rnam par ma grol mod kyi/_bsod nams kyi shugs kyis gling bzhi la dbang ste/_dge ba bcu'i las kyis sems can gyi srid byed pas sems can 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]de dag gi bkur sti'i gnas yin te/_de bas na 'khor rnam bzhis mchod rten byas te mchod na bsod nams tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bos yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas bdag cag 'khor rnam bzhis gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhugs la 
[\[316b.2\]]bzhen na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel thob par 'gyur ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas 'khor rnam bzhis gal te rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi nang du nga bsregs na/_grong khyer de'i mi dag 
[\[316b.3\]]rgyal po'i las kyi chad pa dang rtsod pa tshad med pa 'byung ste/_thams cad kyis bsod nams mnyam par mi thob bo/_/dga' bo gal te 'khor rnam bzhis grong khyer gyi phyi rol du nga bsregs na 'jig rten pa dag bsod nams mnyam par thob bo/_/dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs 
[\[316b.4\]]rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhugs la bzhen pa'i 'og tu 'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus te/_rin po che'i bum par stsal nas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gang du brtsigs na thams cad dad pa'i sems skye zhing mchod par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[316b.5\]]kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das te bsregs nas 'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi bum par chug la rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi nang du lam gyi bzhi mdor rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten bang rim bcu gsum dang ldan pa/_phang lo dang 
[\[316b.6\]]bcas pa/_rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan cing spras pa/_'jig rten pa thams cad kyis mchog tu bya ba'i ba dan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/_ngos bzhi'i pu shu yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_thams cad du rgyan gyis rab tu spras pa/_mchod rten de rim pa cig car yang ngos bzhir sgo re re btod 
[\[316b.7\]]pa/_skar khung thad kar 'bab pa'i nang du rin po che chen po'i bum pa bcug ste/_'khor rnam bzhis mchod pa bya'o/_/dga' bo rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni rim pa bcu gcig dang ldan pa/_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras par bya'o/_/dga' bo dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten ni rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]ste/_de yang rin po che sna tshogs kyis spra'o/_/dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mchod rten yang rin po che sna bdun las byas te/_rim pa dang bcas pa ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khams gsum gyi srid pa'i sdug bsngal las ma grol ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i tshe ma 'gags pas bcom ldan 
[\[317a.2\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das te zhugs la bzhen nas lha dang mi dang 'khor rnam bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel ji ltar bgos na thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga mya ngan las 
[\[317a.3\]]'das nas lha dang mi la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel bsdus te/_shin tu mnyam pa'i sems kyis khams gsum dang rgyud drug thams cad la yang bgos te mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar bya'o/_/de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[317a.4\]]bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi phyed gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar gzigs te/_de bas na khyod ring bsrel gyi phyed 
[\[317a.5\]]'dod do zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don snyoms par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_ngas khyod la 'gram pa g.yas pa'i tshems mche ba gcig sbyin gyis/_khyod kyis lha'i 'jig rten du mchod rten 
[\[317a.6\]]byos la mchod cig dang /_khyod kyis bsod nams zad mi shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe lha dang mi thams cad cho nges 'debs shing ngus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po la bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da' ba la lha dang mi la sogs pa khyed mya ngan ma byed cig_/de ci'i 
[\[317a.7\]]phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang ring bsrel rtag tu mchod du yod la/_gzhan yang bla na med pa'i chos kyi dkon mchog mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon pa yod do/_/de bas na dkon mchog gsum dang /_bden pa bzhi rtag tu 'jig rten na yod de/_sems can dag dad pas mchod 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]pa'i gnas yod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ring bsrel la mchod pa ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog mchod pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba des ni chos kyi sku mthong ngo /_/chos mthong ba des ni 'phags pa mthong ngo /_/'phags pa mthong ba des ni bden pa bzhi mthong ngo /_/bden pa bzhi mthong ba des ni mya ngan 
[\[317b.2\]]las 'da' ba mthong ngo /_/de bas na dkon mchog gsum ni rtag pa gnas pa mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba ste/_'jig rten gyi gnas dang rten du 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyed sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par 'gyur ba'i mya ngan chen po ma byed cig_/nga ni mya 
[\[317b.3\]]ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su nye'i/_tshul khrims sam/_gnas sam/_rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_dkon mchog gsum mam/_bden pa bzhi'am/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam/_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis las the tshom du gyur pa yod na/_myur du dris shig_/'dri ba 'di ni tha mar 'dri ba ste/_
[\[317b.4\]]sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas 'gyod pa med par bya'o/_/zhes lan gsum gyi bar du bka' stsal to/_/de'i tshe 'khor rnam bzhi la sogs pa mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/_skad brnangs nas yi chad pa tsam du yid la gcags te mya ngan gyis brgyal lo/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis mchi ma phyung nas 
[\[317b.5\]]cang mi smra ste zhu ba yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'khor bzhi po 'di dag thams cad ni tshul khrims dang /_gnas dang /_dkon mchog gsum dang /_bden pa bzhi mngon sum du rtogs te the tshom med par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po la the tshom med par thugs kyis mkhyen nas legs so shin tu 
[\[317b.6\]]legs so/_/'khor bzhi po khyed dkon mchog gsum dang /_bden pa bzhi shin tu rtogs te the tshom med pa ni ji ltar chu dang bas dri ma bkrus pa dang 'dra ste/_khyed kyang brtson 'grus gyis shig dang /_myur du 'byung ba'i lam thob par 'gyur gyis brgyal ba tsam du mya ngan ma byed cig_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la 
[\[317b.7\]]bzhugs bzhin du gser lta bu'i phyag gis na bza' sbyar ma bzhag nas gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu'i seng ge'i thong ka dpal be'u phyung ste 'khor mang po rnams la bstan nas lha dang /_mi dang /_'khor mang po rnams la nga'i sku kha dog gser btso ma lta bu la ltos shig ces bka' stsal to//_//
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po lnga bcu lnga pa/_de'i tshe 'khor rnam bzhi dang thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la mig mi 'dzums pas bltas pas rab tu bde ba ni ji ltar dge slong dag bsam gtan 
[\[318a.2\]]gsum pa la reg pa dang 'dra bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu'i sku 'khor mang po la bstan nas/_mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i 'od zer tshad med dpag tu med pa khrag khrig brgyad stong snyed bkye nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas 
[\[318a.3\]]pas nyi zla'i 'od kyang zil gyis non te/_de ltar 'od bkye nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyed kyi phyir bskal pa bgrangs pa'i bar du shin tu spyod dka' ba spyad de/_lus kyi yan lag lag pa dang /_rkang pa yang gtubs nas shin tu spyod dka' 
[\[318a.4\]]ba thams cad spyad de/_snying rje chen po'i smon lam gyi dbang gis rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/_rdo rje lta bur mi 'jig pa'i gser btso ma'i kha dog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang 
[\[318a.5\]]po brgyad cu dang ldan pa tshad med pa'i 'od zer gyis thams cad du snang bar byas pa thob ste/_'od zer gyis reg gam sku mthong ba tsam gyis kyang rnam par ma grol ba med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 
[\[318a.6\]]gshegs pa shin tu dka' ba ni me tog u dum ba ra dang 'dra ste shin tu mthong bar dka'o/_/khyed kyis nang gi tha mar nga'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ba 'di la don med par mi bya'o/_/sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus rnyog pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs te/_da ni gdul ba'i mdzad pa mdzad 
[\[318a.7\]]nas nga mya ngan 'dar nye'o/_/khyed la sogs pa sems rtse gcig tu nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la shin tu ltos shig_/khyed kyang yongs su dag pa'i las la nan tan byas na 'bras bu 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du yang dang yang lan gsum gyi bar du 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]bka' stsal nas/_gser btso ma lta bu'i sku 'khor mang po rnams la mngon du bstan to/_/de nas rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri las bzhengs te steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis 
[\[318b.2\]]khyed la sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig_/de bzhin du mthar gyis shing ta la gcig gi srid du 'phags nas nga ni mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams bsam pa shin tu dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha 
[\[318b.3\]]dog lta bu la ltos shig ces lan bdun gyi bar du bka' stsal to/_/de nas nam mkha' las babs te seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas yang 'khor mang po rnams la nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa bsam pa shin tu dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta 
[\[318b.4\]]bu la ltos shig ces bka' stsal te/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri las bzhengs nas steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la gcig gi srid du 'phags nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa 
[\[318b.5\]]bsam pa dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig_/de bzhin du shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas lan bdun gyi bar du nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[318b.6\]]de nas nam mkha' las phyir babs nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa bsam pa dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[318b.7\]]yang seng ge'i khri las bzhengs nas steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la gcig gi srid du 'phags nas 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa bsam pa dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig ces/_de bzhin 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]du yang dang yang shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas lan bdun gyi bar du nga ni yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa bsam pa dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig ces lan bdun gyi bar du bka' stsal to/_/de nas yang nam 
[\[319a.2\]]mkha' las babs nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa bsam pa dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[319a.3\]]gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu mngon par bstan te/_'khor mang po rnams la mngon sum du bstan pa'i phyir/_de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas/_lan gsum gyi bar du nam mkha' las phyir babs 
[\[319a.4\]]nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_de bzhin du yang dang yang lan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar du 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis nga'i sku rdo rje lta bur brtan pa mi 'jig pa gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu 'jig pa med pa la ltos 
[\[319a.5\]]shig_/me tog u dum bA ra ltar shin tu mthong dka' ba yin gyis khyed la sogs pas shes par gyis shig_/nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa sems rtse gcig tu nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la shin tu ltos shig_/dper na mi zhig tsha bas 
[\[319a.6\]]gdungs te shin tu skom pa chu grang mo 'thungs na ngoms par 'gyur ba las gzhan mi sems pa dang 'dra bar khyed la sogs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa bsam pa dag pas shin tu ltos shig_/'di ni nang gi tha mar mthong ba ste/_
[\[319a.7\]]mthong ba 'di las phyin chad mthong ba'i dus med kyi khyed la sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams phyin chad 'gyod pa med par lta bas ngoms par gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga mya ngan las 'das nas khyed la 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams srid pa gsum la myur du 'da' ba'i phyir rgyas par nan tan du spyod pa la le lo med par bag yod gyis shig_/de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang /_mi dang 'khor rnam pa bzhi la sogs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'od kyis reg nas sangs 
[\[319b.2\]]rgyas la lta ba thams cad kyi ngan song gsum dang mi khom pa brgyad dang /_'jig rten gyi lha dang mi'i nyon mongs pa dang /_rtsa ba bzhi dang /_mtshams med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su byang ste rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 
[\[319b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu'i sku phyung ste yang dang yang ltos shig ces/_'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal nas slar chos gos sbyar ma sku la gsol to/_/'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las/_bstan pa gzhag pa'i le'u'o//_//
[\[319b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga ni da dus la bab ste/_sku kun du gtse zhing na'o zhes bka' stsal nas bsam gtan dang po la 'jug cing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kun brtags te zhi zhing 'gog pa'i ting 
[\[319b.5\]]nge 'dzin la 'jug go/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de skad gsungs ma thag tu bsam gtan dang po la zhugs so/_/bsam gtan dang po las byung nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa las byung nas bsam gtan gsum pa la zhugs so/_/bsam 
[\[319b.6\]]gtan gsum pa las byung nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la zhugs so/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa las byung nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched stengs la zhugs so/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched stengs las byung nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched stengs la zhugs so/_/rnam 
[\[319b.7\]]shes mtha' yas skye mched stengs las byung nas cung zad med min skye mched stengs la zhugs so/_/cung zad med min skye mched stengs las byung nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs la zhugs so/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs las byung nas 'gog 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]pa zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/_/'gog pa zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung nas phyir yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs la zhugs so/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs las byung nas phyir yang cung zad med min skye 
[\[320a.2\]]mched stengs la zhugs so/_/cung zad med min skye mched stengs las byung nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched stengs la zhugs pa'o/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched stengs las byung nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched stengs la zhugs pa'o/_/nam mkha' mtha' 
[\[320a.3\]]yas skye mched stengs las byung nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la zhugs so/_/bsam gtan bzhi las byung nas bsam gtan gsum pa la zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gsum pa las byung nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa las byung nas bsam 
[\[320a.4\]]gtan dang po la zhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar yan man du bsam gtan du zhugs nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ngas shin tu zab pa'i shes rab kyis khams gsum gyi rgyud drug gi sems can thams cad dang /_ri dang /_rgya mtsho 
[\[320a.5\]]dang /_sa chen po la gnas pa'i srog chags thams cad la brtags na khams gsum 'di dag ni rang bzhin dang bral ba/_rab tu zhi ba/_nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang 'dra bas gdags su med pa/_rnam par shes pa med pa/_srid pa thams cad yongs su bcad pa/_thog 
[\[320a.6\]]ma nas mnyam pa/_mtho dman gyi 'du shes med pa/_mthong ba med pa/_thos pa med pa/_tshor ba med pa/_shes pa med pa/_bcings pa med pa/_rnam par grol ba med pa/_sems can med pa/_srog med pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma byung ba/_mi zad pa/_mi 'gog 
[\[320a.7\]]pa/_'jig rten ma yin/_'jig rten ma yin pa yang ma yin pa/_mya ngan las 'da' ba dang 'khor ba dmigs su med pa/_gnyis ka'i mtha' mnyam pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa'i phyir ro/_/bas mthar gnas pa/_ci yang mi byed pa/_mthar rnam par gzhag pa/_
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]nges par dmigs su med pa/_mi gnas pa'i chos las chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi bya ba byed pa/_mtshan ma thams cad yongs su bcad nas ci yang med pa ste/_chos kyi mtshan nyid ni de dag yin no/_/gang gis de ltar shes na 'jig rten las 'da' ba zhes bya'o/_/gang gis de 
[\[320b.2\]]ltar mi shes pa de ni 'khor ba'i thog ma'i mtha' zhes bya'o/_/de bas na khyed la sogs pa ma rig pa yongs su bcad de/_'khor ba'i thog ma'i mtha' dgag go/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_yang 'phar ba'i bsam gtan la zhugs so/_/
[\[320b.3\]]bsam gtan dang po las byung nas bsam gtan gsum pa la zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gsum pa las byung nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched stengs la zhugs so/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched stengs las byung nas cung zad med min skye mched stengs la 
[\[320b.4\]]zhugs so/_/cung zad med min skye mched stengs las byung nas 'gog pa zad pa'i 'du shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/_/'gog pa zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung nas phyir yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs la zhugs so/_/'du shes med 'du shes 
[\[320b.5\]]med min skye mched stengs las byung nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched stengs la zhugs so/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched stengs las byung nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la zhugs so/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa las byung nas bsam gtan gsum pa la zhugs so/_/bsam 
[\[320b.6\]]gtan gsum pa las byung nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa las byung nas bsam gtan dang po la zhugs so/_/de ltar na yan man du 'phar ba'i bsam gtan la zhugs nas yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ngas 
[\[320b.7\]]shes rab chen pos khams gsum na gnas pa ji tsam srog yod pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gang zag dang chos thams cad la brtags na thams cad mthar phyin pa ste/_rnam par bcings pa med pa/_rnam par grol ba med pa/_bdag po med pa/_gnas med pa/_gzung 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]du med pa/_khams gsum las 'das pa yang ma yin/_srid pa kun du 'jug pa yang ma yin te/_thog ma nas rnam par dag pa/_dri ma med pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/_mnyam pa med pa/_mi mnyam pa yang ma yin pa/_
[\[321a.2\]]rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa zad pa/_rtog pa thams cad zhi ba ste/_de ltar chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes bya ste/_chos 'di la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong na rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/_bus pa ma rabs kyis mi mthong bas na ma rig pa 
[\[321a.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas phyir yang 'phar ba'i bsam gtan la zhugs te/_bsam gtan dang po las byung nas 'gog pa zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang /_'gog pa zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba nas bsam gtan dang po la 'jug pa'i bar du de 
[\[321a.4\]]bzhin du yan man 'phar ba'i bsam gtan la zhugs nas/_yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis khams gsum gyi chos thams cad la brtags na/_ma rig pa'i thog ma'i mtha' ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba 
[\[321a.5\]]ste/_phyogs bcur btsal kyang dmigs su med pa ni rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i rgyur 'gyur ba yal ga dang lo ma yang rnam par grol ba ste/_ma rig pa rnam par grol bas rga shi'i bar du yang rnam par grol lo/_/de bas na nga ni rtag tu rab tu zhi ba'i snang ba la gnas 
[\[321a.6\]]pas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/de'i tshe dga' bo mya ngan gyis shin tu yid gdungs te myos 'khrugs nas mi dran pa ni ji ltar chang gis myos pa dang 'dra ste/_'khor rnam bzhi yang mi mthong mi shes la/_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das sam mya ngan 
[\[321a.7\]]las ma 'das pa mi shes mi rtogs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du 'phar ba'i bsam gtan la zhugs te chos kyi dbyings la thug gi bar du brtags nas 'khor mang po rnams la lan gsum du chos bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]du yang dang yang lan nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan du zhugs so/_/dga' bos mi shes pas sangs rgyas lan gcig bsam gtan du 'jug pa na lan gcig dris te/_de bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam/_mya ngan las ma 
[\[321b.2\]]'das zhes/_ma 'gags pa la dris so/_/de bzhin du ma 'gags pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan du zhugs te/_mya ngan las ma 'das so zhes lan nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bar du smras so/_/de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad 'khrug cing myos pas/_de bzhin 
[\[321b.3\]]gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das sam mya ngan las ma 'das mi shes mi rtogs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das lan gsum gyi bar du bsam gtan du zhugs nas lan gsum gyi bar du 'khor rnams la chos bstan te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi khri la glo g.yas pa phab nas 
[\[321b.4\]]gzims te/_dbu ni byang phyogs su bstan/_zhabs ni lho phyogs su bstan/_zhal ni nub phyogs su gzigs te/_rgyab ni shar phyogs su bstan nas gzims so/_/rin po che sna bdun gyi khri yang phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan to/_/sA la'i shing 
[\[321b.5\]]zung bzhi ya brgyad yod de/_nub phyogs kyi zung gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun/_shar phyogs kyi zung gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyab/_byang phyogs kyi zung gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu rol/_lho phyogs kyi zung gcig ni de bzhin 
[\[321b.6\]]gshegs pa'i zhabs rol lo/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shing sA la'i drung na rin po che'i khri la gzims nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la zhugs te/_cang mi gsung zhing nam gyi gung la yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas 
[\[321b.7\]]sA la'i shing shar dang nub kyi zung gnyis kyang shing gcig tu gyur/_lho dang byang gi zung gnyis kyang shing gcig tu gyur te/_rin po che'i khri la gdugs lta bur gyur nas/_de'i tshe shing de nyid kyang ngang pa'i gshog pa ltar skya bor gyur te/_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]me tog dang /_'bras bu yang lhags/_shun pa yang gogs/_shing nyid kyang gas nas mthar gyis skams te lhag ma ma lus par chag go/_/de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyis chen po shin tu g.yos nas skad 
[\[322a.2\]]chen po rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba las/_kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten stongs so zhes mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ri btang bzung dang /_ri btang bzung chen po dang /_ri kho ra khor yug dang /_ri kho ra 
[\[322a.3\]]khor yug chen po dang /_ri rab lhun po dang /_ri bsung can dang /_rin po che'i ri dang /_rdo rje'i ri dang /_ri nag po dang /_sa chen po la gnas pa'i ri thams cad dus gcig tu sgra byung nas thams cad rdib ste/_skad chen po 'jig rten gyi khams su grags pa las kyi hud kyi hud nang gcig tu 'jig 
[\[322a.4\]]rten la mgon med par gyur te/_shes rab kyi nyi ma nub nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i ri 'gyel to/_/sems can thams cad kyi byams pa'i yab yang dag par 'das te/_mchod pa bya ba'i lha yang mi mthong bar gyur to zhes grags so/_/de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[322a.5\]]thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po yang 'khrug cing khol te rnyog par gyur nas dba' rlabs drag po las skad rnam pa sna tshogs grags pa ni kyi hud kyi hud yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das nas sems can gyi kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa dang sdug bsngal ni srid pa'i gang chen mtshor 'khor zhing 
[\[322a.6\]]'bab par gyur te/_yang dag pa'i lam stor na/_nam zhig rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhes grags par gyur to/_/de'i tshe gtsang po dang /_chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lung pa dang /_lung phran gyi chu dang /_chu mig dang /_rdzing bu dang /_lteng ka dang /_khron pa thams cad kyang 'bo zhing chu skams 
[\[322a.7\]]par gyur to/_/de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po dang /_nam mkha'i khams kyang mun pa chen por gyur te/_nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun par gyur to/_/de ma thag tu rlung nag po g.yos nas skad chen po phyung ste/_rdul dang bye mas 'tshubs 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]par gyur to/_/de'i tshe sa chen po las skyes pa'i shing gel pa dang /_nags tshal dang /_rtsi shing la sogs pa'i me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo ma dang /_yal ga thams cad kyang chag nas sa la lhags te lhag ma tsam yang ma lus par gyur to/_/de nas de ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[322b.2\]]rten gyi khams kyi lha thams cad kyang steng gi nam mkha' la shin tu mi dga' bas ngus te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang rab tu g.yos nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha'i me tog dang /_lha'i spos brgya stong grangs med pa char bzhin du phab nas stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[322b.3\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab lhun po tsam du spungs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas so/_/steng gi nam mkha' la gzhan yang grangs med pa'i lha'i rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_lha'i phreng ba dang /_lha'i gdugs dang /_lha'i nor bu rin po che char bzhin du 
[\[322b.4\]]phab pa ni nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang ste/_rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs mar gyur nas ngos bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng bas shin tu brgyan pa/_me tog gi 'od dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas so/_/steng gi nam mkha' la gzhan yang lha'i rol mo rnga dang /_
[\[322b.5\]]gar dang /_glu rnam pa mang po las kyi hud kyi hud sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pas 'jig rten stongs so/_/sems can gyi mig mdongs pas nyon mongs pa'i srin mo dar te sdug bsngal gyi 'du byed rgyun mi 'chad pas na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rgyun du 'khor ro zhes grags so/_/de'i 
[\[322b.6\]]tshe dga' bo sems 'khrugs te myos brgyal nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das sam/_mya ngan las ma 'das pa mi rtogs mi shes kyi/_'jig rten gyi khams sngon las gyur pa 'ba' zhig mthong nas sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam zhes ma 'gags pa la dris so/_/ma 
[\[322b.7\]]'gags pas smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de'i tshe dga' bos de skad ces smras pa thos nas sa la brgyal te ro bzhin du gyur nas dbugs kyang mi rgyu ste/_ci yang mi tshor ro/_/de nas ma 'gags pas dga' bo'i gdong la chu grang mos 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]btab nas bslang ngo /_/de nas thabs mkhas pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed pa'i/_/phyir dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kyi hud kyi hud sdug go/_/mya ngan chen po ma byed cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dul ba'i mdzad pa kun mdzad nas/_lha dang /_mi la 
[\[323a.2\]]sogs pa thams cad kyis bzhugs su gsol kyang ma gnang gis/_mya ngan chen pos sems 'khrugs par ma byed cig_/kyi hud kyi hud ji ltar bya/_da ji ltar bya/_nang gcig tu lha dang mi'i ston pa mdzad pa'i mthar phyin nas bzhugs su ma gnang ngo /_/da bdag cag re zhig mya 
[\[323a.3\]]ngan bsang ngo zhes spro ba bskyed nas/_dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das mod kyi/_'on kyang ring bsrel dang /_bla na med pa'i chos kyi dkon mchog 'jig rten na rtag tu bzhugs te/_sems can gyi gnas dang /_rten du 'gyur ba yod de/_de bas na 
[\[323a.4\]]bdag cag gis brtson 'grus su sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog sems can la byin te/_sdug bsngal las rnam par bsgral bas sangs rgyas kyi drin la lan glan par bya'o zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe dga' bo spro ba bskyed pa thos nas bags kyis sangs te/_skad brnangs pa tsam du 
[\[323a.5\]]mchi ma blags nas mya ngan gyis non to/_/de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer shing sa la'i tshal kho ra khor yug dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang lha dang mis yongs su gang ba ni khab kyi rtse mo tsam la yang sems can tshad med pa snyed yod de/_bar nas stong pa med kyang gcig la gcig mi bde 
[\[323a.6\]]zhing phan tshun gnon par 'gyur ba med do/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig grangs med pa dang /_'khor mang po thams cad mi dran te brgyal nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das sam/_mya ngan las ma 'das pa mi rtogs mi shes kyi/_sngon dang mi 'dra bar ldeg cing g.yo 
[\[323a.7\]]ba 'ba' zhig mthong nas thams cad kyis ma 'gags pa la sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam zhes dris so/_/de nas ma 'gags pas 'khor mang po rnams dang /_'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams cad la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes smras 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]so/_/de nas 'khor grangs med pa thams cad kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas thams cad brgyal te sa la 'gyel nas/_sdug bsngal gyis shin tu gdungs pas skad kyang mi phyin te/_la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhabs 'bring du thal byung shi'o/_/la la ni sems stor bar gyur to/_/la la 
[\[323b.2\]]ni lus dang sems shin tu 'bar bar gyur to/_/la la ni gcig gi lag pa la gcig 'jus te skad brnangs pa tsam du mchi ma blags nas ngus so/_/la la ni brang la khu tshur gyis brdeg cing skad chen pos 'bod do/_/la la ni mgo la thal mos rdebs shing rang gi skra 'bal lo/_/la la 
[\[323b.3\]]ni 'di skad du kyi hud kyi hud sdug bsngal gyis gdungs so zhes smra'o/_/la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa ha cang yang snga ches so zhes smra'o/_/la la ni bdag cag gi lha stor to zhes smra'o/_/la la ni 'jig rten stongs te sems can gyi mig mdongs so zhes smra'o/_/la 
[\[323b.4\]]la ni nyon mongs pa'i srin mo mngon du byung ngo zhes smra'o/_/la la ni sems can gyi dge ba'i myu gu dang sa bon 'gags so zhes smra'o/_/la la ni bdud kyi sde rnams dga' ste go cha yang phud do zhes smra'o/_/la la ni bdag gi lus 'di mi rtag go zhes smod do/_/la la ni yang dag par spyod pas 
[\[323b.5\]]rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/la la ni mgon dang skyabs med par gyur to zhes smra'o/_/la la ni lus las khrag mngon du zag cing sa la 'bab par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgra skad chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams kun g.yos par gyur te/_de'i tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[323b.6\]]kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po yang /_sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes nas lha'i 'khor dang bcas te bsam gtan dang po nas babs nas skad chen pos ngus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to/_/ring zhig lon nas phyir sangs te/_
[\[323b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces ngus so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis/_/bdag cag phyir du mi mjed 'jig rten gshegs/_/tshad med dbang du 'gyur ba'i mthu bcas nas/_/phongs pa chos 'dod 'gro ba rnams kyang btul/_/mkhas pa'i thabs 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]kyis ci rigs chos bstan nas/_/sems can mi bder 'gyur ba gang yang med/_/srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal las bton te/_/mthar phyin mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam la bkod/_/bcom ldan sems can rnams la byams pa'i yum/_/sems can kun la snying brtse zho blud 
[\[324a.2\]]pa/_/ji ste thams cad nang gcig rab spangs nas/_/lha mi phongs pa'i mgon ma mchis par mdzad/_/kyi hud 'gro ba'i dge ba'i myu gu yang /_/skye ba'i char ni 'bab pa'i dus ma mchis/_/dge ba'i myu gu khad kyis 'gags nas su/_/sdug pa'i las kyis bsdus nas ngan song 'gro/_/
[\[324a.3\]]'jig rten stongs so da ni ji ltar bgyi/_/sems can yang dag shes rab mig mdongs so/_/ma rig mun par 'thom zhing 'gro bas na/_/srid pa gsum du ltung zhing 'khor bar gyur/_/sems can sdig pa mgon med ji ltar bgyi/_/ring bsrel dag la brten nas grol bar shog_/de 
[\[324a.4\]]bzhin gshegs la gsol ba'i snying rje'i mthus/_/sdug bsngal las ni grol ba'i skyabs su shog_/kyi hud ji ltar 'jig rten ngan pa 'dir/_/bcom ldan bdag cag spangs nas mya ngan 'da'/_/de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas te steng gi nam mkha' las babs 
[\[324a.5\]]nas kyi hud kyi hud ces skad chen po phyung ste ngus nas mchi ma blags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to/_/de nas ring zhig lon pa dang gdod phyir sangs te mya ngan gyis yid gdungs nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ngus so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[324a.6\]]bskal par dka' ba mdzad pa ni/_/bdag dang 'gro ba rnams kyi slad du ste/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub rab brnyes nas/_/'gro ba kun la bu gcig bzhin du gso/_/chos sbyin sman ni sman gyi nang na mchog_/nad gso sman pa'i nang na sman pa gtso/_/thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis kun 
[\[324a.7\]]bskyabs nas/_/bdud rtsi shes rab char ni kun la phab/_/shes rab nyi ma'i 'od kyis ma rig mun pa bsal/_/ma rig sems can 'phags pa'i lam yang mthong /_/'phags pa'i byams pa'i 'od kyis rgyud drug snang mdzad nas/_/srid pa rnam gsum 'od kyis reg nas rnam 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]par grol/_/ci yi slad du byams pa chen po'i thugs btang nas/_/mya ngan 'das so mi mthong ji ltar bgyi/_/sngon gyi thugs rje chen po yi dam ga re na/_/mchil ma bzhin du sems can yongs su spangs/_/bdag la sogs te sems can thams cad ni/_/ji ltar be'u dag mas bor 
[\[324b.2\]]nges par 'chi ba bzhin/_/'khor bzhi gcig gi lag la gcig 'jus nas/_/brang rdung ngu ba'i skad kyis 'jig rten gsum yang g.yos/_/kyi hud kyi hud srid par 'khor ba 'di thams cad/_/thams cad nang gcig tu ni skyabs ma mchis par gyur/_/re sdug bdag cag bsod nams 
[\[324b.3\]]zad pa'i rnams/_/dge ba'i myu gu tshig pa rlan pa'i dus ma mchis/_/dam chos dkon mchog ring bsrel 'od zer gyis/_/snang bar mdzad cing srid pa gsum las grol bar shog_/kyi hud shin tu sdug go bdag cag rnams/_/nam zhig slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[324b.4\]]de'i tshe ma 'gags pa yang mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te ngus nas lus kyang 'dar bar gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar pus mo btsugs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bstod do/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal pos bdag cag rab tu gsos/_/bdag cag chos kyi skom blud chos kyi 
[\[324b.5\]]sku yang bskyed/_/sems can chos kyi sku yang mngon par ma grub cing /_/shes rab 'tsho ba'i tshogs kyang yong ma bsags/_/rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis rab bstan cing /_/'khor rnams thos nas byang chub rtogs par mdzad pa'i rigs/_/rtag tu byams chen kha dog lnga yi 
[\[324b.6\]]'od bkye zhing /_/'khor rnams 'od kyis reg nas rnam par grol bar mdzod/_/ci yi slad du yongs su mya ngan 'das gshegs nas/_/sdug bsngal spyod pa'i sems can ci la 'jug par bgyi/_/kyi hud bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa chen po spangs/_/bdag cag mgon ma mchis 
[\[324b.7\]]pas nges par 'chi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs su bstan par 'tshal mod kyi/_/bdag cag mya ngan mi bgyid pa yi gtol ma mchis/_/'khor bzhi myos shing 'khrugs te brgyal nas sems kyang stor/_/ngu ba'i skad kyis gnam sa 'jig rten gsum yang 'gul/_/bcom 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]ldan nyag gcig bde ba chen po la bzhugs na/_/'gro ba mang po'i sdug bsngal chen po ji ltar bgyi/_/bcom ldan 'das pa'i dus na bdag cag rnams kyi phyir/_/bskal pa mang por dbu dang phyag dang zhabs kyang btang /_/bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs 
[\[325a.2\]]rgyas nas/_/ring por mi bzhugs mya ngan las ni 'da' bar gshegs/_/bdag cag 'khor bzhi ma rig thibs por gnas pas na/_/bdud kyi rgyal po dga' shing spro bas go cha'ang bor/_/kyi hud bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po yis/_/ring bsrel byams pa'i 'od kyis 
[\[325a.3\]]bdag cag bskyabs par shog_/'khor bzhi po la bcom ldan thugs brtse'i phyir/_/chos kyi dkon mchog phan pa zad mi shes par shog_/bdag cag rnams ni 'phral du 'chi bar ma gyur te/_/'tsho ba'i lhag ma 'di tsam gyis ni ci zhig nus/_/kyi hud shin tu sdug bsngal 
[\[325a.4\]]bzod par dka'/_/da ni slan cad bcom ldan mthong ba'i dus ma mchis/_/de'i tshe dga' bo bags kyis sangs nas/_thal mo mgo la rdebs shing brang la khu tshur gyis brdegs nas skad brnangs shing sdug bsngal lus kyis mi bzod pa tsam du ngus nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar pus 
[\[325a.5\]]mo btsugs te ngu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag sngon bcom ldan 'das dang smon lam mthu gcig pas/_/'thun par gcig tu shAkya'i rigs su skyes par gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par byang chub sangs rgyas nas/_/bdag gis lo ni nyi shu lhag cig 
[\[325a.6\]]g.yog kyang bgyis/_/dad pa'i sems kyis bsnyen par bgyi ba ma ngoms bzhin/_/nang gcig bor nas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs/_/kyi hud kyi hud sdug bsngal chen pos gdungs par gyur/_/yun du sdug bsngal gyis ni sems kyang rab tu gzir/_/bdag gi lus kyang 
[\[325a.7\]]srid pa'i dra ba las ma grol/_/ma rig pa yi sgo nga las kyang phyir ma byung /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig sgo nga ma bcag par/_/ci yi slad du yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs/_/bdag ni gsar du btsas pa'i bu dang mtshungs pa la/_/ma yis bor na gdon mi 'tshal bar 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]'chi bar 'gyur/_/ci yi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs spangs nas/_/nyag gcig khams gsum las ni 'das nas bde bar bzhugs/_/bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis 'gyod cing mthol ba ni/_/dgung lo nyi shu'i bar du zhabs 'bring 'tshal ba na/_/spyod lam bzhi po le lo'i 
[\[325b.2\]]dbang du gyur pas na/_/'phags pa'i thugs dang 'gal zhing mnyes par ma bgyis pa/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po yis/_/bdag la bdud rtsi stsal cing bde ba mdzad par shog_/bdag gis phyi ma'i bskal pa mtha' yi bar du yang /_/rtag tu bcom 
[\[325b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi zham ring byed par shog_/bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis/_/thams cad 'jig rten khams su bdag ni skyob par shog_/kyi hud kyi hud tshig gis brjod mi nus/_/'phags pa'i drin smrar skad kyang mi phyin to/_/de'i tshe klung gang gA grangs med pa bye ma 
[\[325b.4\]]snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams cad gcig gi lag pa la gcig gis 'jus nas shin tu ngu zhing cho nges 'don pa las so so nas spro ba bskyed de/_ci nus kyis grangs med pa'i lha'i spos dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen 
[\[325b.5\]]po dang /_man dzu Sha ka dang /_man dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_grangs med pa'i lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi rgya mtsho ngogs kyi tsan dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_rnam pa brgya stong snyed kyi spos sbyar ma dang /_grangs med pa'i byug spos dang /_spos chu dang /_rin po che'i 
[\[325b.6\]]gdugs dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i ba dan dang /_mu tig dang /_do shal nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phab nas mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad kyis kyang shin tu 
[\[325b.7\]]ngus nas so so nas grangs med pa'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs la sogs pa snga ma bas shin tu lhag par sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar phab nas mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi lha'i 'khor dang bcas te shin 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]tu ngus nas so so nas grangs med pa'i me tog dang spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas sum 'gyur gyis lhag pa bshams nas ngus bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags te mchod pa byas so/_/gnam rim pa lnga'i lhas kyang de bzhin du snga ma 
[\[326a.2\]]bas shin tu lhag pa bshams/_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas shin tu lhag pa bshams nas mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /_bud med mchi ma blags te ngus nas/_
[\[326a.3\]]mdang ji ltar btang ba mi shes nas dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das na ji lta bu'i tshul du mdang gtang bar bgyi/_de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug gis gong du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bzhin du/_'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[326a.4\]]rgyal po'i mdang gtang ba bzhin bya'o zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad ngus te grong khyer du zhugs nas lcags kyi sgrom byas te/_rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan nas/_/rin thang med pa'i ras dkar po bzang po yug stong dang grangs med pa'i shing bal shin tu 'jam 
[\[326a.5\]]pa yang bshams so/_/gzhan yang grangs med pa'i shing tsan dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_gzhan yang khri phrag brgya stong snyed kyi spos sbyar ma dang /_spos kyi 'dag gu dang /_spos chu dang /_gdugs dang /_ba dan dang /_me tog la sogs pa sprin ltar nam mkha' la yongs su gang ba mtho 
[\[326a.6\]]khyad ri rab lhun po tsam bshams so/_/de lta bu dag bshams nas mchi ma blags te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar phab nas/_mya ngan gyis yid gdungs bzhin du mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad dang /_'khor mang po thams cad kyang mchi 
[\[326a.7\]]ma blags te ngus nas/_gzhan yang tshad med pa snyed kyi spos dang /_me tog dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs la sogs te mchod pa'i yo byad sprin lta bur nam mkha' yongs su gang bar bshams nas gcig gi lag pa la gcig 'jus te/_brang la khu tshur gyis rdeg cing cho nge'i 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]sgras stong chen po yang g.yos te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar phab nas mchod pa'i yo byad kyis mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams skad brnangs pa tsam gyis ngus nas/_bkur stir bya ba'i phyir so so nas ras dkar po'i sleb mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[326b.2\]]bteg ste/_lcags kyi sgrom gyi nang du bcug nas mar bsung can gang bar blugs te sgrom gyi kha bcad do/_/de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi pho mos thams cad kyang bsod nams 'dod pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lha dang /_mi dang /_'khor mang 
[\[326b.3\]]pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom 'degs su ma bcug gi_/kun gyis bgros nas zla med pa'i gyad stobs po che bzhis 'degs par byas so/_/gyad bzhi pos gos dang rgyan bkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom 'deg pa'i phyir grong khyer gyi nang du 'ongs te/_mchod pa 
[\[326b.4\]]byas nas mthu ci yod pas bteg kyang ma theg go/_/de nas grong khyer de'i gyad stobs po che brgyad kyis pur sgrom bteg par byas te/_so so'i gos dang rgyan bkrol nas mchod pa byas te mthu ci yod pas rtsal kyang ma theg go/_/de nas grong khyer de'i stobs po che bcu drug 
[\[326b.5\]]gis 'deg par byas te gos dang rgyan bkrol nas/_sangs rgyas kyi sgrom bteg par rtsal kyang theg par ma gyur to/_/de'i tshe ma 'gags pas stobs po che rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ste grong khyer 'di'i nang gi skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad 
[\[326b.6\]]kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom grong khyer gyi nang du bkur bar rtsol yang mi theg na/_khyed 'ba' zhig gis mi theg pa lta ci smos te/_khyed rnams kyis 'khor mang po dang lha rnams kyi stobs kyis bstang bar gsol te sgrom bteg na/_grong khyer du bkur nus par 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[326b.7\]]ma 'gags pas smras ma thag tu/_de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dam pa dang /_grangs med pa'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lha'i rol mo bshams nas/_lha'i 'khor dang bcas te shin tu ngus nas nam mkha' las 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]'phags te/_'phags pa'i pur sgrom la mchod pa byed do/_/gnam rim pa drug gi lha dang /_gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyang brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug dang 'dra bar pur sgrom la mchod pa byed do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kun la thugs rjes khyab par mdzad 
[\[327a.2\]]cing /_'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyi mnyam par bsod nams khyad par med par mdzad pa'i phyir shing sA la'i tshal nas/_pur sgrom shing ta la gcig gi srid du steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas gshegs par gyur gyi/_rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad dang /_'jig 
[\[327a.3\]]rten du bcas pa lha dang /_mi dang /_'khor thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgrom bteg par ma gyur to/_/de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug 'khor rnams dang bcas te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs chen po/_rin po che'i ka ba bzhi dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun gyi do shal 
[\[327a.4\]]gyis ngos bzhi brgyan pa/_steng gi nam mkha' las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrom khebs par byas nas grangs med pa'i spos dang /_me tog dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_do shal dang /_lha'i rol mo dang /_dar gyi lda ldi sna tshogs kyis nam mkha' la mchod pa byas
