[\[327a.5\]]so/_/gnam rim pa drug gi bar gyi lha dang /_gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyang mchod pa'i yo byad brgya byin pas lhag par bshams nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom la mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[327a.6\]]pa'i pur sgrom steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags pa mthong nas brang brdungs te skad chen po phyung nas ngus so/_/de'i tshe lha dang mi thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun dang /_mu tig dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_
[\[327a.7\]]do shal dang /_dar gyi lda ldi rnam pa mang po sprin bzhin du nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bar byas te shin tu ngus nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi pur sgrom la mchod de/_thams cad skad 'thun par kyi hud kyi hud bdag cag la bsod nams ma mchis pas 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom ma theg ste/_bdag cag la mgon skyabs ma mchis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal ba ma mchis so zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi gser gyi pur sgrom shing sA la'i tshal gyi nam mkha' la dal gyis gshegs te/_rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi 
[\[327b.2\]]nub sgor zhugs so/_/de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer na gnas pa'i dge bsnyen ma thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos grangs med pa/_lha dang /_mi dang /_'khor mang pos steng gi nam mkha' dang /_sa la yongs su gang bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom gyi 
[\[327b.3\]]phyi bzhin dong nas/_gcig gi lag pa la gcig gis 'ju zhing skad chen po phyung ste ngus nas brang la khu tshur gyis rdegs te/_so so nas grangs med pa'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs kyis sa'i steng dang /_nam mkha' yang 
[\[327b.4\]]yongs su gang bar bshams te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom la mchod par byed do/_/rtswa mchog gi grong khyer ni ngos gcig kyang dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad yod do/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi pur sgrom steng gi nam mkha' la dal gyis 
[\[327b.5\]]gshegs te/_rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi shar sgo nas byung nas/_g.yas phyogs nas 'khor te grong khyer gyi lho sgor zhugs so/_/de nas bags kyis nam mkha' la gshegs te/_byang sgo nas g.yas phyogs su 'khor te nub sgor zhugs so/_/de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar 
[\[327b.6\]]du bskor nas steng gi nam mkha' la dal gyis gshegs te/_phyir yang nub sgor zhugs nas shar sgor byung ste/_g.yas nas bskor nas byang sgor zhugs so/_/de nas yang nam mkha' la dal gyis gshegs te/_lho sgor byung nas g.yas nas bskor te byang sgor zhugs nas 
[\[327b.7\]]lan bzhi bskor to/_/de bzhin du g.yas phyogs nas grong khyer rtswa mchog lan bdun gyi bar du bskor to/_/de'i tshe rin po che sna bdun gyi pur sgrom grong khyer gyi nang du zhugs pa na 'khor mang po thams cad mchi ma blags te ngus nas so so nas grangs med pa'i spos kyi shing tsan dan 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]dang /_rin po che'i spos kyi shing ri mo dang bsung du ldan pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun bro bar byed pa thogs shing gzhan yang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_do shal grangs med pa bshams te/_de bzhin 
[\[328a.2\]]gshegs pa'i mngad mdzad pa'i gnas su mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i mgon po chen po dang /_lha'i 'khor dang bcas te ngus nas lha rdzas kyi tsan dan dang /_a ga ru phyi nang kun bsung dang ldan pa/_bsung gis ma dad pa/_sboms shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam lnga brgya dang /_
[\[328a.3\]]de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i spos dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i gdugs dam pa dang /_me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa bshams te/_mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ma dad mdzad pa'i gnas su lhags so/_/gnam rim pa gnyis kyi lhas ni shing stong bshams so/_/gnam rim pa gsum pa'i lhas 
[\[328a.4\]]ni shing nyis stong bshams so/_/rim pa bzhi pa'i lhas ni shing sum stong bshams so/_/rim pa lnga pa'i lhas ni shing bzhi stong bshams so/_/rim pa drug pa'i lhas ni shing lnga stong snyed bshams te/_so so nas ba dan dang /_me tog la sogs pa thogs te ngus nas mchod pa bya ba'i 
[\[328a.5\]]phyir ma dad mdzad pa'i gnas su lhags so/_/de'i tshe gzugs yod pa'i khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams ni spos dang /_me tog 'ba' zhig thogs te/_ma dad mdzad pa'i gnas su lhags nas mchod pa byed do/_/de nas 'jig rten du bcas pa 'khor mang 
[\[328a.6\]]po rnams kyang /_so so nas spos tsan dan gyi shing dang /_a ga ru dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs la sogs pa thogs te/_ngus nas mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ma dad kyi gnas su lhags so/_/de'i tshe ma 'gags pa mig mchi mas gang ste drag tu ngus nas/_
[\[328a.7\]]lha dang mi rnams las shing tsan dan dang /_a ga ru drug stong snyed ri mo dang bsung du ldan pa/_kun du shin tu ma dad pa bslangs nas ma dad kyi gnas su bzhag go/_/mtsho ma dros pa ngos bzhi chu zheng gab pa dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de/_gtsang po chen po bzhi 'bab bo/_/bcom 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa na gtsang po gang gA'i byang phyogs kyi 'gram na tsan dan gyi shing drung cig skyes te/_sboms khyad shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam la gnam 'phang du shing ta la bdun srid de/_bsung shin tu mngad pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed do/_/shing 
[\[328b.2\]]de'i lha yang shing de dang cig car skyes te/_rtag tu spos des sangs rgyas kun la mchod par byed do/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa na tsan dan gyi shing de yang lo ma dang shun pa lhags nas skams te shing gi lha yang der shi'o/_/de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis shing de blangs nas mdad kyi 
[\[328b.3\]]gnas su bskyal te mchod pa byas so/_/sa gzhi de ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma dad kyi gnas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus gnas de nyid du mdad mdzad do/_/gnas de na sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi rin po che'i mchod rten yang grangs med pa 
[\[328b.4\]]zhig yod do/_/gnas de ni rdo rje ltar mi 'jig cing shin tu brtan pa'o/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom nam mkha' la dal gyis gshegs te ma dad kyi gnas su phyin pa dang /_bags kyis je dma' je dma' nas rin po che sna bdun gyi khri dar gyi lda ldi dang /_do shal yongs su brgyan 
[\[328b.5\]]pa la gshegs te/_de nas de'i bar du zhag bdun 'das so/_/de'i tshe rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi skyes pa dang /_bud med thams cad dang /_grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha thams cad mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te rab tu ngus nas/_
[\[328b.6\]]ba dan dang /_gdugs dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_spos dang /_me tog la sogs pa thogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi pur sgrom gyi phyi bzhin zhag bdun gyi bar du 'brang yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis lha dang mi thams cad la skom pa dang bkres pa'i 'du shes med de/_zas mi sems 
[\[328b.7\]]kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i phyir ngu ba 'ba' zhig byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur de ltar zhag bdun lon nas sgrom gyi nang nas phyir dbyung ba na rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_'khor grangs med pa thams cad kyis ngus pa'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams kyang 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]g.yos nas/_gzhan yang me tog dang /_spos dang /_lha'i rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs dang /_grangs med pa'i lha'i rol mo mang pos sangs rgyas kyi pur la ngus te mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams mchi ma blags nas ras dkar po 'jam pos lag pa dkris te bsti stang 
[\[329a.2\]]dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rin po che'i sgrom nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog dang ldan pa/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan pa/_rdo rje ltar mi 'jig pa'i chos can dal gyis phyung ste/_rin po che sna bdun gyi khri la bzhag go/_/de'i tshe na 'khor 
[\[329a.3\]]mang po rnams shin tu ngus pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun g.yos par gyur to/_/gzhan yang spos dang /_me tog dang /_gdugs dang /_rol mo la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas ngus so/_/des 'khor mang po rnams ngu zhing mchi ma blags nas so so nas spos chu dang /_byug spos 
[\[329a.4\]]grangs med pa snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_rdo rje lta bur mi 'jig pa/_gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu/_dbu dang zhabs kyi bar du bkrus so/_/de nas rin 
[\[329a.5\]]po che'i sgrom yang yongs su dag par bkrus so/_/de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams shin tu ngus te mchi ma blags nas lha'i spos dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis gtor nas grangs med pa'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs dang /_ba dan nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bas 
[\[329a.6\]]mchod pa byas nas ngus so/_/de nas 'khor mang po rnams ngus bzhin du grangs med pa'i shing bal thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma lta bu dkris so/_/de ltar shing bal gyis dkris pa'i steng du rin thang med pa'i ras dkar po yug stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dkris 
[\[329a.7\]]so/_/de ltar dkris nas 'khor mang po rnams brgyal ba tsam du shin tu ngus nas/_gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_lha'i rol mo la sogs pas mchod pa byas te ngus so/_/de nas 'khor mang po rnams ngus bzhin du so so 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]nas ras dkar po sleb mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bteg nas rin po che'i sgrom gyi nang du bcug ste/_mar bsung can gyis bkang nas sgrom gyi kha bcad do/_/de nas 'khor mang po rnams shin tu ngu ba'i sgra 'jig rten gyi khams kun du grags par gyur te/_gzhan yang me tog dang /_spos dang /_ba 
[\[329b.2\]]dan dang /_gdugs dang /_rol mo la sogs pas rin po che'i sgrom la mchod nas ngus so/_/de nas 'khor mang po thams cad kyis bsags pa'i spos kyi shing dri bsung shin tu mdad pa ri rab lhun po tsam brtsigs te bcer ba spos kyi khang pa brtsegs ma lta bur gyur nas ngos bzhi rin po che sna bdun 
[\[329b.3\]]gyis brgyan cing gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_do shal dang /_dar gyi lda ldi sprin lta bur nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang ba tsam gyis brgyan nas lha'i rol mo'i mchod pa byas so//_//'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo/_/
[\[329b.4\]]bam po lnga bcu drug pa ste tha ma/_de nas lha dang /_mi dang /_'khor rnams kyis pur sgrom bteg ste/_spos kyi khang pa brtsegs ma'i steng du bzhag pa na shin tu skad chen po phyung ste brang brdungs nas ngus pa'i sgra chen pos stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grags shing g.yos par gyur te/_gzhan 
[\[329b.5\]]yang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_lha'i rol mos mchod nas ngus so/_/de nas bsti stang bya ba'i phyir so so nas ras dkar po'i sleb mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom bteg ste/_shin tu brgyan pa'i spos kyi shing gi steng du bzhag nas cho nges 
[\[329b.6\]]'don zhing brgyal to/_/de nas phyir sangs nas 'di skad du kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten na mgon dang skyabs med par gyur to zhes smras nas mchi ma blags te/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs dang /_lha'i rol mos mchod pa byas so/_/de nas de bzhin 
[\[329b.7\]]gshegs pa'i pur sgrom spos kyi shing gi steng du bzhag ste/_me gtong ba na 'khor mang po thams cad shin tu ngus te/_stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grags par gyur te/_ngus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom de la mchod pa byas so/_/de nas 'khor mang po rnams ngus nas rin po 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]che sna bdun gyi spos kyi sgron ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas nas thams cad dus gcig tu skad chen po phyung ste ngus pas stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos nas me tog dang spos kyis yongs su mchod pa byas so/_/
[\[330a.2\]]de'i tshe rin po che'i sgron ma spos kyi shing brtsigs pa'i drung du phyin ma thag tu rang shi'o/_/de nas lha thams cad kyis kyang bla na med pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me chen po thogs te/_me'i 'od kyis kun du snang bar byas nas ngus bzhin du spos kyi shing brtsigs pa'i drung du phyin 
[\[330a.3\]]ma thag tu me de yang rang shi'o/_/de nas rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad kyang rgya mtsho'i nang gi me rin po che sna bdun gyi sgron ma'i 'od zer grangs med pa dang ldan pa thogs te/_spos kyi shing brtsigs pa la bsregs na me de yang rang shi'o/_/de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams 
[\[330a.4\]]shin tu ngus nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad pa ci'i mthar ma phyin na/_spos kyi shing la me mched du ma btub pa ma rtogs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po kun la khyab pa 'od srung gi 'khor la gzhes te 
[\[330a.5\]]gdod zhugs kyis bzhen to/_/de'i tshe na 'od srung chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang bya rgod 'phungs pa'i ri la 'khod do/_/ri de rtswa mchog grong khyer nas dpag tshad lnga bcu yod de/_de na lus dang sems rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa las dngangs nas lus kyang 
[\[330a.6\]]'dar zhing g.yos so/_/de nas ting nge 'dzin las byung ste bltas na sa dang ri kun rab tu g.yos pa mthong nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das par shes te/_'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/nga'i ston pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[330a.7\]]nas zhag bdun lon te/_sgrom gyi nang du yang bcug go/_/kyi hud kyi hud myur du de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bar dong ngo /_/gal te zhugs la bzhen par gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan pa yongs su 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]dag pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/_'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang bya ba'i phyir/_rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la ma song gi_/'khor dang bcas te lam du zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bar myur du ngus bzhin du song nas zhag 
[\[330b.2\]]bdun gyis rtswa mchog gi grong khyer du phyin to/_/grong khyer gyi shar sgor bram ze zhig lha'i me tog gcig thogs te 'ongs pa dang phrad nas/_'od srung gis de la kye ga las 'ongs zhes dris so/_/des smras pa/_bdag sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa zhugs la 
[\[330b.3\]]bzhen pa'i gnas nas 'ongs so zhes smras so/_/'od srung gis me tog 'di dag ga las rnyed ces dris na zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas su lha'i me tog 'di rnyed do zhes smras so/_/'od srung gis me tog 'di kho bo bslang ngo zhes smras na mi rung ngo /_/bdag 'di 
[\[330b.4\]]gnyen pa rnams bsten cing khyim du mchod pa byar 'gro'o zhes smras so/_/'od srung gis cung blta'o zhes smras nas lag gis blangs te/_spyi bo la bzhag ma thag der brgyal te sa la 'gyel to/_/ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sangs nas ngus te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[330b.5\]]pa'i sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa/_gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu da phyin chad mi mthong ngo zhes smras nas 'khor dang bcas te grong khyer rtswa mchog gi byang sgor zhugs te/_grong khyer gyi nang du phyin nas dge slong gi gnas zhig tu zhugs nas dge slong dag 
[\[330b.6\]]cig 'dus shing 'khod pa dag mthong ngo /_/dge slong de dag gis 'od srung la khyod lam ring po nas 'ongs na nyon mongs shing mi bde bar ma gyur tam/_bde bar 'dug la bsod snyoms sdod cig ces smras so/_'od srung gis smras pa/_kho bo'i ston pa chen po mya ngan 
[\[330b.7\]]las 'das na/_bdag brod pa ci zhig yod de/_'dir bde bar 'dug cing bsod snyoms bsdad du rung ngam/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod kyi ston pa su yin/_'od srung gis smras pa/_ci khyed mi shes sam/_kyi hud bdag gi ston pa ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]ldan 'das yin te/_da yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/dge slong rnams kyis de skad ces thos nas so so nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs so legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs na tshul khrims dam pas 
[\[331a.2\]]bdag cag mi bzod de/_bdag cag de bzhin du spyod mi nus pa las/_da mya ngan las 'das nas tshul khrims bsdams pa yang lhod par gyur gyis re zhig ma rings par bsod snyoms sdod cig ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis lha rnams dang /_
[\[331a.3\]]'od srung gi 'khor rnams rna ba 'gags par byas pas dge slong sdig can rnams kyis smras pa'i tshig thos par ma gyur gyi/_'od srung 'ba' zhig gis thos so/_/de nas 'od srung 'khor rnams dang bcas te shin tu ngus nas sangs rgyas ga na bar myur bar song ngo /_/
[\[331a.4\]]de'i tshe 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag cag gis ji lta bur mchod pa'i yo byad rnyed cing sangs rgyas la mchod par 'gyur snyam bsams nas 'od srung gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag kyang grong khyer 'dir skyes te/_mchod pa'i 
[\[331a.5\]]yo byad bslangs na rnyed par 'gyur yang dag snyam nas 'khor rnams dang bcas te grong khyer der mthar gyis bslangs so/_/mthar gyis bslangs nas ras dkar po bzang po yug stong yang rnyed/_de ma yin pa gzhan yang shing bal grangs med pa dang /_tshad med 
[\[331a.6\]]pa'i me tog rin po che dang /_byug spos dang /_spos chu dang /_spos kyi mar dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_ba dan dang /_rol mo dang /_do shal rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_dar gyi lda ldi la sogs pa rnyed do/_/de nas 'od 
[\[331a.7\]]srung 'khor dang bcas te mchod pa'i yo byad ci rnyed pa thogs nas myur bar grong khyer gyi nub sgor byung nas/_'od srung gis zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas na/_'khor mang po thams cad shin tu ngu zhing cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra yang thos/_kun gyis brgya byin dbang 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]phyug la da mchod pa ni byas na bzhen pa'i me ga las rnyed ces 'dri ba dang /_brgya byin gyis 'khor mang po rnams la re zhig 'od srung la bsdad dgos so zhes bya ba yang thos te/_brgya byin gyis 'khor mang po rnams la de skad ces smras pa thos ma thag tu 'od 
[\[331b.2\]]srung chen po 'khor dang bcas te ngu bzhin du der lhags so/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyis go phye nas/_'od srung gis rgyang nas sangs rgyas kyi pur sgrom mthong ba dang /_'khor dang bcas te phyag 'tshal nas shin tu ngus te cho nges btab nas brgyal lo/_/de 
[\[331b.3\]]nas ring zhig lon nas phyir sangs te bags kyis drung du bsnyen nas/_'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis ji lta bur 'phags pa'i pur sgrom dbye bar bgyi/_'khor rnams kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[331b.4\]]'das nas de ring du zhag bdun gsum lon te/_de tsam zhig pa snyam na ji ltar sgrom dbye bar bya/_'od srung gis smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rdo rje lta bur sra ba/_brtan pa/_rtag pa/_bde ba/_yongs su dag pa/_mi 'jig pa ste/_yon tan 
[\[331b.5\]]gyi bsung shin tu ma dad pa/_tsan dan gyi ri lta bu yin no zhes smras nas shin tu ngus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom gyi drung du bsnyen to/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po kun la snyoms pas 'od srung gi phyir pur sgrom gyi kha rang bye nas 
[\[331b.6\]]ras dkar po stong gis dkris pa dang shing bal gyis dkris pa yang rang grol te/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/_gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu/_sra zhing brtan pa'i sku 'od srung la mngon par bstan to/_/'od srung 'khor 
[\[331b.7\]]dang bcas pas de lta bu dag mthong nas shin tu ngus te brgyal nas 'gyel to/_/de nas ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sangs nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du 'khor rnams dang bcas te/_spos kyi shing brtsigs pa la 'dzegs nas/_pur sgrom la shin tu bsnyen te cho 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]nges btab nas me tog dang /_spos dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs dang /_ba dan dang /_do shal dang /_rol mo la sogs pas mchod de/_byug spos dang /_spos chus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu 
[\[332a.2\]]bkrus nas spos kyis bdugs shing /_me tog gis gtor te ngus nas mchod pa byas so/_/de ltar bkrus nas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te ci rnyed pa'i shing bal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dkris so/_/de'i steng du shing bal rnying gis kyang dkris 
[\[332a.3\]]so/_/de'i steng du bslangs pa'i ras dkar po yug stong gis dkris so/_/de'i steng du ras rnying pa stong gis kyang dkris so/_/de ltar rim pa du mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dkris nas pur sgrom gyi kha yang bcad de/_rin po che sna bdun gyis shin tu 
[\[332a.4\]]brgyan te/_de'i tshe 'od srung shin tu ngus nas 'khor dang bcas te g.yas phyogs nas lan bdun bskor te/_mig mchi mas gang bzhin du thal mo sbyar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/kyi 
[\[332a.5\]]hud kyi hud 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal shin tu gdungs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos bdag la mi gzhes par/_/ci yi slad du myur bar mya ngan 'das/_/bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_/kun du 
[\[332a.6\]]bltas kyang de bzhin gshegs ma mthong /_/bltas na bcom ldan mya ngan 'das mthong nas/_/shin tu 'dar te sems kyang dngangs par gyur/_/'jig rten khams kyang mun par gyur nas su/_/ri dang sa chen dag kyang rab tu g.yos/_/bcom ldan mya 
[\[332a.7\]]ngan 'das par der rtogs te/_/myur du mchis kyang bcom ldan 'das ma mthong /_/bcom ldan thugs rjes bdag la ma khyab pas/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das ma mthong /_/bdag la bstan pa gsung gcig ma bzhag pas/_/bdag la mgon ma 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]mchis na ci la gnas/_/bcom ldan bdag ni sdug bsngal shin tu gdungs/_/sems kyang myos nas shin tu bslad par gyur/_/bdag gis bcom ldan dbu la phyag 'tshal lam/_/'on te bcom ldan dpal be'u la phyag 'tshal/_/'on te 'phags pa'i 
[\[332b.2\]]phyag la phyag 'tshal lam/_/'on te bcom ldan rked pa la phyag 'tshal/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lam/_/'on te bcom ldan lte ba la phyag 'tshal/_/kyi hud bcom ldan mya ngan 'das ma mthong /_/bdag la phyag 'tshal gnas ni 
[\[332b.3\]]bstan du gsol/_/bcom ldan bzhugs na 'khor rnams kun la bde/_/mya ngan 'das na thams cad sdug bsngal non/_/kyi hud kyi hud sdug bsngal shin tu gdungs/_/thugs rje chen po phyag gnas bstan du gsol/_/de'i tshe 'od srung ngus nas tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[332b.4\]]de skad ces smras ma thag tu/_bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos zhabs gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan sgrom gyi phyi rol tu mngon par bstan te/_'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa las 'od zer stong snyed bkye nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun 
[\[332b.5\]]snang bar byas so/_/de'i tshe 'od srung 'khor rnams dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthong nas thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal te ngus nas brgyal lo/_/de nas ring mo zhig lon nas phyir sangs te 'khor dang bcas pas shin tu ngus te/_g.yas nas lan bdun 
[\[332b.6\]]bskor nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te/_ngu ba'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams kyang g.yos nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bder gshegs mthar phyin thugs rje chen po ni/_/snyoms par byams pa'i 'od ni gnyis 
[\[332b.7\]]su med/_/sems can rnam par smin na gar yang ston/_/zhabs gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs stong ldan pa mthong /_/bdag gis dang ba'i sems kyis gus phyag 'tshal/_/'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i zhabs gnyis la'o/_/'khor lo'i mtshan las 'od 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]stong rab bkye nas/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun snang bar mdzad/_/bdag gi spyi bos gus par phyag kyang 'tshal/_/'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'od zer la'o/_/skye bo 'od kyis phog nas rnam par grol/_/ngan song gsum 
[\[333a.2\]]dang bgegs brgyar sdug bsngal spangs/_/bdag gi spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal ba/_/'khor lo'i 'od kyis ngan song sgrol ba la'o/_/bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa grangs med par/_/bdag cag slad du shin tu dka' ba mdzad/_/de dbang rdo rje lta bu'i 
[\[333a.3\]]sku rnyed nas/_/zhabs kyi 'og nas 'od zer stong yang bkye/_/skyabs gsol spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal ba/_/sems can bde bar mdzad pa'i 'khor lo la'o/_/thams cad phyir du bsod nams kun bsags nas/_/byang chub shing drung rnam bzhi bdud kyang 
[\[333a.4\]]btul/_/bdud bzhi btul nas mu stegs can yang phab/_/de bas sems can yang dag lta bar gyur/_/bdag gi spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal ba/_/sems can yang dag lta ba'i 'od zer zhabs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi byams pa'i pha dang mtshungs/_/
[\[333a.5\]]zhabs kyi 'od kyang mnyam par sems can sgrol/_/bdag gis skyabs gsol gus par phyag 'tshal ba/_/sdug bsngal spong ba'i zhabs kyi 'khor lo la'o/_/bdag gis zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od mthong nas/_/dga' dang mi dga' sems kyang shin tu gdungs/_/
[\[333a.6\]]bdag gis smre sngags 'don cing phyag 'tshal ba/_/rtsibs stong ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i mtshan la'o/_/skyabs gsol phyag 'tshal zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od/_/mthar phyin theg pas 'jig rten gsum las 'da'/_/gus par phyag 'tshal lha mi skyabs mchi bas/_/'khor 
[\[333a.7\]]lo'i 'od kyis srid gsum sdug bsngal snang /_/skye bo sdug bsngal sgo las ma grol rnams/_/zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od la skyabs kyang gsol/_/bdag cag 'khor ba las ni yongs su ma grol ba/_/zhabs kyi 'khor los yongs su grol bar mdzod/_/kyi hud 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]re sdug so so'i skye bo rnams/_/yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od mi mthong /_/mthol lo bcom ldan thugs rje chen po yi/_/rtsibs stong ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i zhabs kyi 'od/_/kyi hud deng 'dir 'khor lo'i mtshan mthong ba/_/de ni slan chad mthong ba'i dus ma 
[\[333b.2\]]mchis/_/de'i tshe 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te tshigs su bcad pa de skad ces smras nas yang brgyal te sa la 'gyel to/_/de nas ring zhig lon nas phyir sangs te mya ngan bsangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsibs stong ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i mtshan gyi zhabs gnyis 
[\[333b.3\]]kyang phyir sgrom gyi nang du nub nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_lha dang /_mi mang po thams cad kyis 'od srung chen po de ltar gyur pa mthong nas/_yang brang brdungs te ngud mo chen po de skad phyung ste ngus nas ngud mo'i sgras stong 
[\[333b.4\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par grags te/_so so nas mchod pa'i yo byad kyis yang mchod do/_/de'i tshe na rtswa mchog gi grong khyer na gnas pa'i gyad stobs po che bzhi zhig lus yongs su brgyan te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi me shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam thogs nas/_
[\[333b.5\]]spos kyi shing bcer ba bsregs na me rang shi'o/_/de la 'od srung gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa chen po'i rin po che'i pur sgrom ni khams gsum gyi mes tshig par mi nus na gyad khyed kyi mes tshig pa lta ci smos/_grong khyer de na gzhan yang gyad stobs po che brgyad 
[\[333b.6\]]kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi me chen po thogs te/_pur sgrom gyi drung du bzhag na me de yang rang shi'o/_/gzhan yang gyad stobs po che bcu drug gis rin po che sna bdun gyi me chen po thogs te/_spos kyi shing bsregs na me de yang rang shi'o/_/gzhan yang gyad sum cu rtsa 
[\[333b.7\]]drug snyed kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi me chen po thogs te bsregs na me de yang rang shi'o/_/de'i tshe 'od srung chen pos gyad rnams dang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed 'di ltar rig par gyis shig_/gal te lha dang mi la sogs pa'i me thams cad 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom tshig par mi 'gyur gyis/_mi nus bzhin du las sto bar 'gyur ba ma byed cig_/de'i tshe grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_lha dang mi la sogs pa 'khor mang po thams cad kyis shin tu ngus nas mchod 
[\[334a.2\]]pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis yang mchod de/_dus gcig tu phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor te/_ngus pa'i ngud mo'i sgras stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su grags par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis thugs ka nas me 
[\[334a.3\]]mched de/_sgrom gyi phyi rol du 'bar nas bags kyis spos shing brtsigs pa la mched de/_zhag bdun lon nas me shi bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po rnams zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad 
[\[334a.4\]]par ngu zhing mchod pa yang rgyun du byed do/_/de'i tshe na phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi'i yid la 'di snyam bsams so/_/bdag cag gis spos kyi chus me bsad de/_sku gdung myur du bslangs la lha'i 'jig rten du mchod pa bya'o snyam bsams nas so so nas rin po che sna 
[\[334a.5\]]bdun gyis spras pa'i gser gyi bum pa spos chus yongs su bkang ba thogs te/_gzhan yang ri rab lhun po'i ngos bzhi na bdud rtsi'i 'o ma zag pa'i shing sboms khyad 'dom stong gis 'khor ba/_mtho khyad dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa yang dus gcig tu mgon po bzhi dang bcas te 
[\[334a.6\]]zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas su phyin nas shing gi 'o ma dang spos chu cig car du me'i steng du blugs na me sngar bas cher mched de ma shi'o/_/de'i tshe na rgya mtsho'i lha klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho mching rnam dang /_gtsang po'i lha dang /_chu klung gi lha rnams kyis de ltar me ma shi ba mthong nas/_de dag 
[\[334a.7\]]kyang so so nas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag cag gis spos chu thogs la me bsad de/_sku gdung myur du bsdus te bdag cag gi gnas su mchod pa bya'o snyam bsams nas so so nas rin po che'i bum pa spos chu tshad med pas bkang ba thogs nas dus gcig tu zhugs 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]la bzhen pa'i gnas su lhags te chus blugs kyang me shi bar ma gyur gyi phyir mched do/_/de'i tshe ma 'gags pas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_rgya mtsho'i lha la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed spos chu thogs te me gsod pa 'di sku gdung 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin 
[\[334b.2\]]nam/_de dag gis de bzhin no zhes smras so/_/ma 'gags pas rgyal po chen po bzhi la smras pa/_khyed ni shin tu yang 'dod pa che'o/_/khyed gnam gyi steng du lha'i khams su gnas te/_sku gdung kun khyod 'dod pa ltar lha'i khams su bskur na sa la gnas pa'i 
[\[334b.3\]]mi rnams kyis der mchod pa byed du 'gror rung ngam/_rgya mtsho'i lha rnams la yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed ni rgya mtsho'i nang dang gtsang po'i nang na gnas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ril gyis khyed la bskur na sa la gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis ji 
[\[334b.4\]]ltar de dag tu mchod pa bya bar 'gyur zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi nyes pa bshags nas phyir lha'i gnas su dong ngo /_/de'i tshe rgya mtsho'i lha dang /_gtsang po'i lha rnams kyang nyes pa bshags nas 'phags pa khyod gsung ba bzhin no zhes smras 
[\[334b.5\]]nas phyir gnas su dong ngo /_/de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa dang /_mchod pa'i yo byad thogs te/_zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas su lhags ma thag tu me yang rang shi bar gyur to/_/de nas brgya byin gyis rin po che'i pur sgrom dbye zhing de bzhin 
[\[334b.6\]]gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba bslang bar stsal pa las ma 'gags pas brgya byin la khyod ci byed ces smras so/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba lha'i 'jig rten du mchod pa bya'o zhes smras so/_/ma 'gags pas smras pa/_de ltar khyod gcig pus sngar 
[\[334b.7\]]bslang du mi rung gis 'khor rnams tshogs te gdod bgo bar bya'o zhes smras so/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar ring bsrel tshems mche ba gcig gnang bas na bdag mchis ma thag tu me yang rang shi bar gyur to zhes smras nas/_rin po che'i pur sgrom phye ste/_sangs rgyas kyi 'gram 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]pa g.yas pa'i tshems mche ba gong ma gcig lha'i 'jig rten du spyan drangs nas mchod rten byas te mchod do/_/de'i tshe na srin po shin tu myur ba dang ldan pa gnyis shig lus mi snang bar sbas nas brgya byin gyi phyi bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi tshems mche ba gnyis brkus na/_'khor 
[\[335a.2\]]mang po kun gyis ma tshor ro/_/de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_'khor mang po thams cad kyis ring bsrel rtod du cha ba las ma 'gags pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed rnams re zhig sdod cig_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i lung bzhin du 
[\[335a.3\]]legs par bgos te mchod pa bya'o/_/de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_'khor mang pos ma 'gags pas smras pa ma thos pa rnams so so nas mtshon shag ti dang /_mda' gzhu dang /_ral gri dang /_zhags pa la sogs te mtshon mang po thogs nas 
[\[335a.4\]]ring bsrel rtod du chas so/_/de nas grong khyer de'i mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom phye na shing bal dang /_ras dkar po yang cang ma tshig par 'khor rnams kyis mthong nas lhag par mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te mchi ma blags nas ngus so/_/de nas ngus bzhin du 
[\[335a.5\]]mchod de phyag 'tshal nas/_pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang sgyur chen po'i shugs/_/'jig rten thams cad kun la dbang sgyur mdzad/_/thugs rje chen po sngon gyi smon lam gyis/_/srid pa'i rgya mtshor sems 
[\[335a.6\]]can yongs su sgrol/_/tshad med ye shes mngon par shes pa'i mthu/_/thogs pa med pa srid pa'i 'khor bar 'jug_/sku gcig las ni sku mang rnam par ston/_/sku mang sku gcig de bzhin tshad kyang med/_/'dul bar 'gyur ba byin gyi brlabs kyis mthong /_/rgyu med pa la mya ngan 'da' ba ston/_/
[\[335a.7\]]bdag cag bsod nams zad de rgyu med pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su btang bar gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin chen pur sgrom ni/_/gyad kun bzlog ste bteg kyang bskyod ma nus/_/thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis 'phags pa ni/_/steng gi nam mkha' ta la gcig gi srid/_/mkha' las rtswa 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]mchog grong khyer bskor cing gshegs/_/zhag bdun gyis ni grong khyer lan bdun bskor/_/de ltar bskor nas zhugs bzhen gnas su gshegs/_/ma 'dres pa yi rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa ni/_/lha mir bcas pa thams cad dpog mi nus/_/bcom ldan yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ni/_/rdo rje lta bur 
[\[335b.2\]]mi 'jig dbang sgyur mthu/_/thams cad mes ni bzhen par ma gyur to/_/thugs ka nas ni byams pa'i me phyung nas/_/zhag bdun bar du bzhen par gyur pa bstan/_/lha mir bcas pas sod par ma gyur gyi/_/bcom ldan thugs rje chen po'i shugs bstan pas/_/brgya byin lhags ma thag tu me yang shi/_/
[\[335b.3\]]shing bal bzang pos sangs rgyas sku dkris pa/_/me chen mang bsregs tshig par ma gyur to/_/ras dkar rin chen pur sgrom bcug pa yang /_/me yi nang na tshig par ma gyur pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang sgyur mthus rtogs so/_/chos kyi dbang sgyur chos kyi rgyal po las/_/phyag 
[\[335b.4\]]'tshal thugs rje 'jig rten mgon po la'o/_/'phags pa'i nang na bsnyengs med phyag kyang 'tshal/_/phyag 'tshal kun du thugs rje chen po'i stobs/_/phyag 'tshal byin gyis brlabs pa dbang sgyur ba/_/bdag cag slan cad bcom ldan 'das dang bral/_/sdug bsngal nang du nub kyang mgon 
[\[335b.5\]]skyabs med/_/kyi hud kyi hud 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das/_/yun du bral nas mthong ba'i dus ma mchis/_/de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/_shin tu ngus te so so nas mchod pa'i yo byad thogs te mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe na ma 'gags pas 'jig rten du bcas 
[\[335b.6\]]pa lha dang /_mi dang /_'khor mang po dang /_grong khyer de'i mi thams cad kyi phyir pur sgrom gyi drung du bsnyen te/_ras dang shing bal gyis dkris pa la bltas na/_'od srung gis dkris pa'i ras dkar po yug stong dang /_grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis phul ba'i ras dkar po yug stong la tha ma gnyis dang 
[\[335b.7\]]shing bal ni ma tshig gi_/gzhan thams cad ni mes tshig go/_/de nas ma 'gags pas ras dkar po rnams dang /_shing bal gyi rnams dum bur gshegs te/_'khor mang po rnams la bgos nas rin po che'i mchod rten byas te mchod do/_/ma 'gags pas ras tshig pa'i gzhob kyang so sor bgos 
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]nas rin po che'i mchod rten byas te mchod do/_/thal ba gzhan ni bgor yang mi khom par so sor bslangs nas mchod rten byas te mchod do/_/grong khyer de'i mi rnams kyis snga nas mgar ba la gser gyi sgrom seng ge'i khris bteg pa rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su brgyan pa brgyad 
[\[336a.2\]]byas so/_/rin po che'i sgrom brgyad po de dag re re yang khal phyed phyed shong ba ste/_rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag go/_/rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po de re re zhing yang gyad sum cu rtsa gnyis snyed rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan pa/_lus la dar sna 
[\[336a.3\]]tshogs kyis dkris pa dag gis rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri bteg go/_/seng ge'i khri de re re'i steng yang rin po che'i rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo brgyad brgyad kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi sgrom 'dzin to/_/khri de re re'i steng yang rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo 
[\[336a.4\]]brgyad brgyad kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thogs te/_gser sgrom yang yongs su bkab bo/_/khri de re re'i steng na gzhan yang lus yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo brgyad brgyad kyis so so nas rin po che sna bdun gyi ral gri thogs te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi sgrom srung ngo /_/khri de re re'i steng 
[\[336a.5\]]na gzhan yang lus yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo brgyad brgyad kyis/_so so nas bya bum thogs te sgrom gyi ngos bzhin 'greng ngo /_/khri de re re la yang mi tshad med pa snyed kyis so so nas lha'i rol mo dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_do 
[\[336a.6\]]shal thogs te 'khor bar bskor nas mchod pa byed do/_/khri de re re la gzhan yang mi tshad med pa snyed so so nas mda' gzhu dang /_mtshon shag ti dang /_zhags pa dang /_lcags kyu dang /_dgra cha yang tshang bar thogs te yongs su bskor nas rtswa mchog gi grong khyer nas byung ste/_zhugs la bzhen 
[\[336a.7\]]pa'i gnas gang na bar dong ngo /_/rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po song ba'i rjes bzhin du grong khyer de'i mi dag gis so so nas grangs med pa'i spos kyi 'dag gu dang /_spos chu thogs te gyad rnams song ba'i rjes bzhin du spos kyi 'dag gus byugs te/_grong khyer nas zhugs la bzhen pa'i bar du 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]spos kyis lam yongs su dag cing shin tu yangs pa byas so/_/lam de'i g.yas g.yon na grangs med pa'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_mu tig dang /_do shal dang /_dar gyi lda ldi dang /_rol mo dang /_glu gar la sogs pa thams cad kyis lam g.yas 
[\[336b.2\]]g.yon brgyan te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel slar gshegs pa sdod do/_/de nas gyad rnams kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po bteg ste zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas su phyin nas thams cad kyis skad kyis brnangs pa tsam du shin tu ngus nas ngud mo'i sgra stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[336b.3\]]khams su grags par gyur te/_so so nas dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis rdo rje lta bu'i sku ring bsrel phra mor bsil te/_tshems mche ba bzhi ni so bzhin du bzhag go/_/de nas 'khor mang po rnams kyis de ltar sku gdung phra mor gyur pa mthong 
[\[336b.4\]]nas/_lhag par mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te ngus nas mchod par byas so/_/de nas ma 'gags pa dang grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis mig mchi mas gang bzhin du ring bsrel rnams bsdus nas seng ge'i khri'i steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi sgrom du blugs te/_sgrom brgyad po gang nas sku gdung yang zad par gyur to/_/de'i 
[\[336b.5\]]tshe 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams cad kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gser gyi sgrom gyi nang du gshegs pa mthong nas/_lhag par mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te ngus nas mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer de na gnas pa'i stobs po che rnams dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi ring 
[\[336b.6\]]bsrel gyi sgrom rtswa mchog gi grong khyer du gshegs pa na/_'khor mang po rnams lhag par shin tu ngus nas mchi ma blags te mchod pa byas so/_/de nas stobs po che rnams 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu ngus nas rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po bteg ste spos kyi 'dag gus bskus pa'i lam thog thag tu 
[\[336b.7\]]rtswa mchog gi grong khyer du gshegs so/_/de nas lha dang mi dang 'khor mang po rnams shin tu ngus te/_ngud mo'i sgra 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu grags par gyur te/_so so nas ci thogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod nas grong khyer gyi nang du lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag go/_/
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]de'i tshe grong khyer rtswa mchog na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis dmag grangs med pa bzhi bshams nas/_go cha dang mtshon cha sna tshang bar thogs te/_grong khyer rtswa mchog gi ngos bzhi 'khor bar rim pa grangs med par bskor nas sdod pa yang ring bsrel gzhan gyis phrogs kyis dogs nas bsrung ba tsam 
[\[337a.2\]]gyis phyir dmag bshams kyi/_'thab pa'i sems ni med do/_/gzhan yang sngags mkhan chen po lnga brgya snyed kyis bgegs mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi bsrungs so/_/gzhan yang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_bya bum la sogs pa grong 
[\[337a.3\]]khyer gyi grwa bzhir mchod pa'i rgyal mtshan du btsugs so/_/de nas grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_lha dang /_mi la sogs pa 'khor mang po thams cad skad chen por rgyun mi chad par ngus te/_mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor pas dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas so/_/rin po che sna bdun gyi 
[\[337a.4\]]seng ge'i khri brgyad po de re re la yang sngags mkhan lnga brgyas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_srin po la sogs pas phrogs kyis dogs nas bsrungs so/_/de ltar zhag gcig lon nas de bzhin gshegs pa sngon bltams pa'i yul ser skya'i rgyal po 'khor shAka 
[\[337a.5\]]gi rigs la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma tshor te/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon pa dang /_gdod tshor nas/_yul ser skya'i rgyal po shAka gi rigs dang bcas te rab tu ngus nas myur bar grong khyer 
[\[337a.6\]]rtswa mchog gang na bar lhags te/_dmag grangs med pa rnams kyis bskor ba dang /_grong khyer gyi grwa bzhir rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs pa yang mthong /_grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir sngags mkhan mang po 'dug pa yang mthong nas/_rgyal po dang shAka gi rigs rnams kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[337a.7\]]mya ngan las 'das so zhes smras so/_/sngags mkhan gyis smras pa/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun bzhi lon te/_zhugs la bzhen nas da ltar ring bsrel 'god do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gnyen lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs 
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]kyis bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma tshor na/_da bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bltar 'gro na/_khyed kyis ma 'gags par lam dang sgo phye shig_/sngags mkhan dang dmag rnams kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_rgyal po dang shAka gi rigs 
[\[337b.2\]]rnams nang du btang ngo /_/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung mthong nas skad brnangs pa tsam du ngud mos btab ste/_g.yas phyogs nas lan bdun bskor nas/_mchi ma phyis te 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel cha gcig tsam bdag cag gi mchod pa'i gnas 
[\[337b.3\]]su byin cig ces smras so/_/'khor mang po rnams kyis smras pa/_khyed shAka gi rigs kyang yin la gnyen du yang shes na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni khyed la ma byin te/_ring bsrel 'di dag kyang so so nas bdag po yod pas khyed kyis mi thob kyis phyir deng shig ces smras so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po dang 
[\[337b.4\]]shAka gi rigs rnams kyis ring bsrel gyi skal ba ma thob pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/_ngus nas sa la brgyal lo/_/de nas ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sangs nas mi dga' bzhin du 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bdag cag gi shAka gi 
[\[337b.5\]]rigs yin te/_khyed la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'dir mya ngan las 'das na/_ci'i phyir bdag cag la ring bsrel gyi shas tsam yang mi sbyin zhes smras nas/_ring bsrel la phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor nas ngus bzhin du khros te phyir dong ngo /_/de'i tshe yul dbus 'gyur 'chang gi rgyal po 
[\[337b.6\]]ma skyes dgra pha bsad nas shin tu 'gyod de/_lus la 'brum bu ma rungs pa byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer zla ba zhes bya ba lus la reg nas 'brum bu yang bags kyis sos te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te mthol tshangs byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs 
[\[337b.7\]]rje chen pos bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sman gyis lus bkrus te/_kha na ma tho ba'i sdig byang nas phyir pho brang du dong nas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma tshor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i nub mo rmi lam 'di dag rmis so/_/zla ba sa la ltung nas sa la nyi 
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]ma shar te skar ma sprin la char bzhin du 'bab pa dang /_dud pa sa las byung nas skar ma'i gza' bdun po gnam la mngon du snang ba dang gnam la me'i phung po chen po 'bar te mkha' la mngon du 'bar nas dus gcig tu sa la ltung ba snyam rmis nas/_de ma thag tu sad de shin tu dngangs 
[\[338a.2\]]nas blon po rnams bsdus te/_'di lta bu zhig rmis na ci la lta zhes bka' stsal to/_/blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/_'di ni sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ltas lags te/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas khams gsum na lam rgyud drug gi sems can la nyon mongs pa 
[\[338a.3\]]kun nas ldang bas me chen po gnam las ltung ba lags so/_/sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_zla ba lta bu'i thugs rje'i 'od dang kun la snyoms par khyab pa'i shes rab nub par 'gyur bas zla ba sa la ltung ba lags so/_/skar ma sa la ltung ba ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las 
[\[338a.4\]]'das nas/_spyod lam brgyad khri dang /_tshul khrims thams cad las skye bo thams cad 'gal bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du mi byed kyi/_log pa'i chos spyod pas sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/nyi ma sa la ltung ba ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas/_ngan song gsum 
[\[338a.5\]]gyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po nyi ma lta bur 'jig rten du shar bas rmi lam 'di dag rmis pa lags so/_/rgyal pos de skad ces thos nas nam gyi gung tshigs na blon po'i 'khor dang bcas te/_grong khyer rtswa mchog dang nye ba zhig tu lhags nas/_dmag gi tshogs grangs med pa rnam bzhis rtswa 
[\[338a.6\]]mchog gi grong khyer rim pa grangs med par bskor ba dang /_sgo bzhi na bgegs srung ba'i sngags mkhan la sogs pa yang mthong nas sngags mkhan la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam/_sngags mkhan gyis smras pa/_sangs rgyas yongs su 
[\[338a.7\]]mya ngan 'das nas deng du zhag bdun bzhi lon te/_'khor mang po rnams da ltar sku gdung 'god do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bdag gis sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa ma thos te/_rmi lam du ltas ngan pa mthong nas blon po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]ltas yin no zhes smras nas bdag cag 'dir lhags na/_bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i sku gdung la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba'i lam phye shig ces smras so/_/sngags mkhan rnams kyis rgyal po grong khyer gyi nang du btang ngo /_/lam gyi bzhi mdor seng ge'i khri'i steng na gser 
[\[338b.2\]]gyi sgrom du ring bsrel bzhag nas/_'khor mang po thams cad kyis ngu bzhin du mchod pa byed pa mthong nas/_rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te phyag byas nas ngus te/_g.yas phyogs nas lan bdun bskor nas mchod pa byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos 'khor mang po la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[338b.3\]]ring bsrel shas kyis ci gnang zhes gsol nas/_'khor rnams kyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po 'phyis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bgo ba yang su la gnang ba sngar bka' stsal pas/_rgyal po'i skal pa med kyis slar deng shig_/rgyal po ma skyes dgras de skad ces smras pa thos 
[\[338b.4\]]nas gsol pa bzhin du ma rangs pas mi dga' bzhin du ring bsrel la phyag 'tshal te phyir dong ngo /_/de'i tshe yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal po yang sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon nas gdod rtogs te/_'khor dang bcas su rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi drung du 
[\[338b.5\]]lhags so/_/rtswa mchog gi grong khyer la dmag gi tshogs grangs med pas rim pa grangs med par bskor ba mthong ngo /_/de'i tshe yul a ka leg gi rgyal pos sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon nas gdod tshor te/_myur bar rtswa mchog gi grong khyer du lhags nas grong 
[\[338b.6\]]khyer rtswa mchog na dmag gi tshogs grangs med pas rim pa grangs med par bskor ba mthong ngo /_/de'i tshe yul byi nu ti'i rgyal po mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba yang sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon nas gdod tshor ro/_/de'i tshe yul tsa la ka'i rgyal po yang 
[\[338b.7\]]sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon nas gdod tshor ro/_/de'i tshe rgyal po shi ka na zhes bya ba yang sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon nas gdod tshor ro/_/de'i tshe pa sha la mu stegs can gyi rgyal po yang sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]bdun gsum lon nas gdod tshor te/_blon po'i 'khor dang bcas nas grong khyer rtswa mchog tu lhags te/_grong khyer rtswa mchog la dmag gi tshogs grangs med pas bskor te srung ba dang /_sgo bzhir yang sngags mkhan gyis sgo srung ba mthong nas sngags mkhan la 'di 
[\[339a.2\]]skad ces smras so/_/ci sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam/_sngags mkhan gyis smras pa/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon te/_da ltar 'khor mang po sku gdung bgo ba'i las byed do/_/bdag cag gis sangs rgyas yongs su 
[\[339a.3\]]mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma tshor te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel la phyag 'tshal du 'gro na/_khyed lam phye shig ces smras so/_/sngags mkhan gyis rgyal po grong khyer gyi nang du btang nas/_lam gyi bzhi mdor seng ge'i khri'i steng na rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i 
[\[339a.4\]]gser gyi sgrom du ring bsrel bzhugs pa mthong nas thams cad kyis dus gcig tu phyag 'tshal te/_ngus nas g.yas phyogs su lan bdun bskor te/_mchod pa ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas mya ngan 
[\[339a.5\]]las 'das pa sngar ma tshor na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la shas kyis mchod pa'i rten du ci gnang zhes gsol to/_/'khor rnams kyis smras pa/_sku gdung bgo ba'i cho ga sngar bka' stsal te/_rgyal po skal ba med kyis slar deng shig_/rgyal po 'khor 
[\[339a.6\]]dang bcas te sku gdung ma thob pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/_sku gdung la phyag 'tshal nas ngus bzhin du phyir dong ngo //_//'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//mdo mya ngan las 
[\[339a.7\]]'das pa chen po rgya nag nas bsgyur ba 'di/_rgya nag gi mkhan po wang phab zhun dang /_d+harma'i gzhi 'dzin dge ba'i blo gros dang /_lo ts+tsha ba rgya mtsho'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//
